name: River City Bangkok

Regular art auctions and immersive digital showcases create a dynamic atmosphere, attracting both locals and visitors. With its modern setting and monthly rotating exhibitions, this destination embodies Charoenkrung's creative spirit.
address: 23 Soi Charoen Krung 24, Khwaeng Talat Noi, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Pesca Mar & Terra Bistro
summary: Pesca Mar & Terra Bistro brings a vibrant energy to seafood and grill lovers, expertly pairing oysters, fish, and steaks. Dishes are designed for sharing, allowing guests to explore a variety of flavors with balanced herbs and citrus. The welcoming staff ensures that newcomers can tailor their spice experience while enjoying quick service from a focused kitchen.
address: 39 Ekkamai alley soi 12, แขวงคลองตันเหนือ Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Thailand

name: BKK Social Club
summary: BKK Social Club offers a refined cocktail experience along the riverside, showcasing Latin American flavors through a Thai lens. With its lush courtyard and elegant glassware, this venue is perfect for dressy dates or client meetings. Reservations are recommended to enjoy their signature spirit flights and attentive table-side service during peak hours.
address: 300/1 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Bar Us
summary: Bar Us offers a sleek, all-black environment where fermentation and distillation are elevated to an art form. Cocktails are crafted with precision, emphasizing clean flavors and aromatic presentation, while the atmosphere encourages engaging conversations with expert bartenders. With rotating thematic menus designed for side-by-side comparisons, this venue is a must-visit for cocktail enthusiasts and industry insiders.
address: Opposite side of security kiosk ( Glass door) Floor 1, 61/37 Floor, 1 สุขุมวิท 26 แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: E‑Gokart Monowheel – Chula 28
summary: Experience thrilling electric go-kart racing at E-Gokart Monowheel, located conveniently near Chulalongkorn University. With separate tracks for kids and adults, this venue is perfect for both beginners and group events. Enjoy hassle-free gear rental and easy access from Siam or National Stadium.
address: 187, 27 Banthat Thong Rd, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Jim Thompson House Museum
summary: A visit to the Jim Thompson House Museum offers an enchanting glimpse into traditional Thai architecture and art. Guided tours reveal a rich collection of Asian artifacts alongside the fascinating history of Jim Thompson and his silk revival efforts. The serene atmosphere, complemented by an adjacent café and boutique, makes it an ideal stop near BTS National Stadium.
address: 6 Soi Kasem San 2, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Mae Sri Ruen
summary: Mae Sri Ruen at CentralWorld offers a harmonious dining experience where flavor and hospitality shine. The flexible menu caters to diverse tastes, making it perfect for shared meals that transition from light to rich. Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere that transforms everyday moments into special occasions.
address: Room B 307 - 309 999/9 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: King Prajadhipok Museum
summary: Explore the life and reign of King Rama VII at the King Prajadhipok Museum, housed in a beautifully restored heritage building. Interactive media and personal memorabilia enhance understanding of Thailand's constitutional history. Educational programs and special exhibits make this museum a must-visit for history enthusiasts.
address: 2 Lan Luang Rd, Khwaeng Ban Bat, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Messenger Service
summary: Messenger Service blends a minimalist grocer aesthetic with an intimate home bar vibe, nestled in a restored Chinatown shophouse. Thoughtfully designed interiors feature pale woods and soft lighting, creating a calm atmosphere for art enthusiasts. Unique drinks crafted from familiar ingredients make it perfect for evenings spent between nearby galleries.
address: 306 Thanon Santiphap, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Samut Sakhon Aquarium
summary: Located southwest of Bangkok, Samut Sakhon Aquarium offers a glimpse into local aquatic life with its collection of regional fish species. Admission is affordable, making it an accessible option for families and school groups. A visit pairs well with a coastal day trip, perfect for those looking to explore the area further.
address: Khok Kham, Mueang Samut Sakhon District, Samut Sakhon 74000, Thailand

name: E‑Gokart Monowheel – Central Village
summary: Family-friendly karting awaits at E-Gokart Monowheel in Central Village, featuring two tracks for both kids and adults. Located near the airport, it offers ample parking and nearby dining options for a full day of fun. Expect queues on weekends as casual racers flock to this exciting outlet.
address: 98/1 Thanon Suvarnabhumi 3, Tambon Bang Chalong, Amphoe Bang Phli, Chang Wat Samut Prakan 10540, Thailand

name: Page Seven
summary: Page Seven offers a playful cocktail experience within a theatrical setting, complete with moody lighting and reflective surfaces. The menu features creatively crafted drinks inspired by pop culture, making it an exciting choice for pre-dance gatherings or late-night dates. Reservations are recommended on weekends to secure your spot in this upscale alcove.
address: 3rd Floor, 233 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: NOVA CONTEMPORARY
summary: NOVA CONTEMPORARY showcases thought-provoking exhibitions by Thai and international artists, blending history with contemporary culture. The gallery emphasizes diverse mediums, including painting, sculpture, and installation, while fostering meaningful dialogue. Centrally located, it offers extensive archives and bilingual support for art enthusiasts and researchers alike.
address: 86 Si Phraya Rd, Khwaeng Maha Phruttharam, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Al Saray
summary: Al Saray offers a unique fusion of Lebanese and Indian cuisines, celebrated for its freshly baked bread and expertly grilled meats. The ambiance is warm and inviting, perfect for both business dinners and intimate date nights. A well-curated bar complements the meal with a selection of whiskeys and bold reds, ensuring an enjoyable dining experience.
address: 4th floor, Bangkok Plaza Building Bangkok General Hospital, Soi Soonvijai 7 Bangkapi Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: ATT 19
summary: A restored Sino-Siamese compound houses ATT 19, where contemporary art meets design and fashion. Exhibitions celebrate the layered architecture and rich neighborhood heritage, showcasing Thai and international artists. With curated retail corners and a café, this space invites leisurely exploration near the Creative District.
address: 19 Charoen Krung 30, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku
summary: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku offers a unique dining experience where pristine sushi meets premium yakiniku in a thoughtfully designed space. Enjoy expertly grilled beef and fresh fish, perfect for mixed groups seeking variety. Attentive service enhances your culinary journey, making it a cozy spot to gather with friends.
address: ชั้น 7, Helix Sky Dining, The EmQuartier เลขที่ 699 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Kathmandu Photo Gallery
summary: Located in a charming restored shophouse, Kathmandu Photo Gallery showcases rotating photography exhibitions by both Thai and international artists. Renowned for its thoughtful curation, the gallery also features a specialty photobook shop and hosts occasional evening salons. Its intimate atmosphere makes it a must-visit for art lovers exploring the Silom area.
address: 87 Thanon Pan, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Cartel Artspace
summary: Cartel Artspace showcases politically engaged exhibitions and performance programs, making it a vital part of Bangkok's contemporary art scene. With thematic cycles featuring collaborations that spark civic discourse, the venue invites thoughtful engagement from its visitors. Located conveniently near other galleries and cafés, it's an enriching stop for art enthusiasts.
address: 2198/10, 2198/10 นราธิวาสราชนครินทน์ 22 แขวงช่องนนทรี เขตยานนาวา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10120, Thailand

name: Tropic City
summary: Tropic City stands out in Bangkok's Creative District with its vibrant, tropical ambiance and expertly crafted cocktails. The bar's menu features house infusions that balance sweetness with aromatic complexity, ensuring a unique drinking experience. With a lively atmosphere and photogenic setting, it's a perfect spot for late-night gatherings, but arrive early on weekends to beat the crowd.
address: 672, 65 Soi Charoen Krung 28, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Nourish Cafe
summary: Nourish Cafe is an ideal stop for those recovering from intense training at Bangkok Fight Lab. This plant-based spot serves energizing dishes made from fresh, whole ingredients, including a standout barbecue jackfruit burger. Enjoy a wholesome meal in a relaxed atmosphere that promotes healthy living.
address: 2 Thanon Witthayu, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Sing Sing Theater
summary: Sing Sing Theater captivates with its neo-Chinoiserie décor and immersive performances, making it a standout nightlife destination in Thonglor. The club features a dynamic mix of music genres, from house to disco, ensuring a vibrant atmosphere. With theatrical elements and stunning visuals, each night promises an unforgettable experience.
address: 45 Soi Sukhumvit 45, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Vesper
summary: Vesper offers a refined cocktail experience, blending timeless classics with modern interpretations in an elegant setting of marble and warm wood. The carefully crafted drinks are complemented by artful decor and intimate lighting, creating a perfect ambiance for both dates and post-dinner chats. Reservations are recommended during peak hours due to its popularity.
address: 10/15 Soi Convent 2, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Polo Fried Chicken
summary: Polo Fried Chicken (Witthayu) captures Bangkok's essence with vibrant flavors and fresh herbs. Enjoy a variety of dishes, from wok-tossed noodles to rich curries, perfect for sharing among friends. Quick service and a lively atmosphere make it an ideal spot for both casual lunches and celebratory meals.
address: 137/1-3 Soi Polo, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Queen Sirikit Museum of Textiles
summary: The Queen Sirikit Museum of Textiles showcases the rich heritage of royal dress and textile traditions from Thailand and Asia. Permanent exhibitions highlight court couture and weaving techniques, complemented by rotating temporary displays that enhance the educational experience. Most visitors enjoy this cultural gem alongside a tour of the Grand Palace complex.
address: The Grand Palace, Na Phra Lan Rd, Khwaeng Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Roti Mataba
summary: Roti Mataba (Phra Athit) captures Bangkok's vibrant culinary spirit with fresh herbs and balanced flavors. A dynamic menu invites sharing, featuring dishes like crunchy salads and rich stir-fries, making each visit feel like a celebration. Quick service ensures a comfortable experience for both newcomers and regulars alike.
address: 136 Thanon Phra Athit, Khwaeng Chana Songkhram, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: National Museum of Royal Barges
summary: Preserving Thailand's regal heritage, the National Museum of Royal Barges showcases ceremonial vessels along the tranquil Bangkok Noi canal. Visitors can marvel at iconic barges like the Suphannahong while learning about their craftsmanship and royal significance. Accessed by boat or road, this museum offers a unique glimpse into royal traditions and seasonal activities.
address: 80, 1 Thanon Arun Amarin, Khwaeng Arun Amarin, Khet Bangkok Noi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10700, Thailand

name: Lily Fu's
summary: Lily Fu's redefines the Soi 11 nightlife with its classy yet lively atmosphere, featuring a vibrant bar and DJs. The menu showcases inventive takes on classic Chinese and Southeast Asian dishes, with must-tries like the shrimp and truffle dumplings and a flavorful tomahawk steak. Don't miss out on unique cocktails like the Thai negroni, perfect for pairing with their creative desserts.
address: 18 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Thai National Theatre
summary: Experience the rich tapestry of traditional Thai performing arts at the National Theatre, where khon masked dances and classical music come to life. Set in a heritage venue near Sanam Luang, performances span a seasonal calendar with weekend matinees and evening shows. Pair your visit with the nearby Bangkok National Museum for a deeper cultural immersion.
address: 4 Thanon Rachini, Khwaeng Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Mustache Bangkok
summary: Mustache Bangkok offers an inviting atmosphere where house and techno music reign supreme, perfect for those who love to dance. With a lineup that includes both local talent and international acts, the club promises nights filled with pulsating beats until sunrise. Its welcoming crowd and reasonable cover charges make it a go-to spot for music enthusiasts.
address: Decho Rd, Suriyawong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Taproom
summary: Taproom on Sukhumvit 26 serves a wide variety of craft beers from rotating taps, making it a go-to spot for enthusiasts. The casual atmosphere is complemented by simple bar food and collaborations with local breweries, perfect for enjoying time with friends. Centrally located, it's easy to pair a visit here with nearby dining options.
address: Unit 6, Ground Floor, 1 Sukhumvit Soi 22, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: LAX RCA
summary: LAX RCA offers a vibrant clubbing experience that blends mainstream dance, hip-hop, and party anthems. With a layout of standing and table seating, it attracts large groups and features lively promotions throughout the week. Reservations are advisable on busy nights to enjoy the energetic atmosphere in this central RCA hotspot.
address: 29, ROYAL CITY AVENUE (RCA), 70-72 ซอย เพชรบุรี 47 Bangkapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: SIWILAI Radical Club
summary: SIWILAI Radical Club offers a vibrant nightlife experience in Thonglor, merging cutting-edge design with an eclectic DJ lineup. Expect an atmosphere filled with house, disco, and innovative tracks that attract a stylish crowd. Limited standing space near the booth enhances the intimate vibe of this trendy venue.
address: 148 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Fillets
summary: Fillets (The Portico) offers a harmonious blend of flavor and hospitality, creating an inviting atmosphere perfect for any occasion. The menu encourages sharing, allowing diners to craft a meal that balances light and rich dishes seamlessly. With thoughtfully considered drinks and a lively yet unobtrusive ambiance, this restaurant transforms ordinary moments into memorable experiences.
address: One Bangkok ศูนย์การค้า วัน แบงค็อก ชั้น3 (Zone The Storeys, Witthayu Rd, แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Just A Drink Maybe
summary: Just A Drink Maybe offers a cozy retreat for Sathorn-Silom locals, known for its gin-based cocktails and customizable breakfast options. The standout dish, 'the GOAT' bagel sandwich, combines crispy bacon with rich cream cheese and fresh vegetables. A perfect spot to start your day or unwind with friends after hours.
address: 37 Soi Silom 9, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Jiaozi Jiuba
summary: Jiaozi Jiuba brings its beloved dumplings to Gaysorn Amarin, delighting guests with signature dishes and an exciting cocktail menu. The Hutong Bay cocktail offers a unique twist, combining sweet and sour flavors with spicy bay leaves and mala powder for a refreshing experience. Open daily from 11am to 9pm, this spot is perfect for a casual meal or an after-work drink.

name: Kalwit Studio & Gallery
summary: Kalwit Studio & Gallery showcases contemporary art and mixed media by emerging Thai artists. Regular exhibitions are complemented by artist talks and community workshops, creating a vibrant cultural hub. Conveniently located near BTS Phloen Chit, it’s an ideal stop for art enthusiasts exploring the city.
address: 119/14 Soi Ruamrudee Community, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Opium Bar
summary: Opium Bar offers a unique speakeasy experience above Yaowarat, enveloped in apothecary aesthetics and soft lighting. The carefully crafted drinks promise a sensory journey, ideal for intimate conversations. Perfectly complements a meal in Chinatown; reservations are recommended for weekends due to its premium pricing.
address: 422 Soi Wanit 1, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku
summary: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku in Ekkamai excels at precision dining, where every element is crafted for an unforgettable experience. The engaging counter seats offer a front-row view of the skilled chefs, while seasonal specials invite adventurous choices alongside reliable favorites. With a thoughtful drink selection complementing the meal, guests can savor each moment without feeling rushed.
address: 88 36 ซอย สุขุมวิท 55 แขวง คลองตันเหนือ Klongton Nua Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mahaniyom Cocktail Bar
summary: Mahaniyom Cocktail Bar transforms local Thai ingredients into innovative, zero-waste cocktails that highlight hydrosols and ferments. An intimate counter layout fosters engaging conversations about sourcing and mixology techniques. Perfect for curious drinkers seeking a thoughtful experience in the early evening.
address: 2nd floor, 104 ถนน มหาเศรษฐ์ แขวงสี่พระยา เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Asia Today
summary: Asia Today offers a vibrant oasis where cocktails blend foraged ingredients with native botanicals, showcasing the essence of Thai terroir. The intimate and music-driven atmosphere invites guests to enjoy an eclectic experience, complete with jars of ferments lining the shelves. Arrive early to secure a coveted spot at the counter and immerse yourself in this charmingly chaotic bar.
address: 35 ซ. นานา Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Yuzu Omakase
summary: Dining at Yuzu Omakase in Thonglor is an immersive experience where precision meets hospitality. Each dish showcases meticulous craftsmanship, from the knife work to the seasonal specials that invite culinary exploration. The thoughtfully paired drinks enhance the flavors, creating a relaxed atmosphere perfect for savoring every moment without feeling rushed.
address: 335 Soi Thong Lo 17, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Shichi Japanese Restaurant
summary: Shichi Japanese Restaurant (Rama 9) offers a meticulous dining experience where every detail, from temperatures to textures, enhances each bite. The counter seats provide an intimate view of the chefs' craft, while tables invite leisurely conversations. Seasonal specials encourage adventurous choices alongside classic favorites, complemented by a thoughtful selection of drinks.
address: ชั้น 1, เซ็นทรัลชิดลม โซน public lane, แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: ICONSIAM — White Plate Thai Row
summary: White Plate Thai Row at ICONSIAM offers a vibrant palette of Thai flavors, harmonizing herbs and spices for an exquisite dining experience. The menu encourages sharing, featuring a delightful mix of salads, soups, grilled dishes, and curries that highlight contrasting tastes. Staff expertly guide spice levels to enhance enjoyment, creating a memorable atmosphere where friends can savor diverse bites together.
address: ICONSIAM PIER 4 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Ton Sai, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: So am I Coffee and Bakery
summary: So am I Coffee and Bakery offers a charming escape with mid-century decor and photogenic drinks. Nestled on Kanchanaphisek Road, this hidden gem serves delightful coffee and fresh bakery treats in a cozy atmosphere. The inviting space is perfect for a relaxing weekend coffee break or an impromptu photo session.
address: 1605 Kanchanaphisek Rd, Khwaeng Bang Phai, Bangpai Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10160, Thailand

name: J.Boroski
summary: J.Boroski offers a unique cocktail experience where bartenders craft bespoke drinks tailored to your mood. The intimate, dark setting features sculptural lighting and plush accents, creating a theatrical atmosphere perfect for special occasions. Expect attentive service and personalized cocktails in an exclusive environment designed for small gatherings or romantic dates.
address: 16, 125/13 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Samyan Mitrtown — Eatery Cluster
summary: Samyan Mitrtown — Eatery Cluster showcases Thai cuisine with a focus on fresh herbs and balanced spices. A communal dining experience encourages sharing, allowing guests to enjoy a variety of flavors from crunchy salads to aromatic curries. The staff expertly guide spice levels, ensuring each dish is a delightful revelation for newcomers and regulars alike.
address: Fl. G, Samyan mitrtown 952 Phaya Thai Rd, Wangmai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: 4th WallPhoto: 4th Wall / BK Magazine
summary: 4th Wall excels in Bangkok's cocktail scene with a dynamic menu that features rotating classic drinks and niche favorites. The venue pairs its beverages with creative snacks, like a local twist on guacamole that incorporates Thai seafood sauce. Experience the vibrant atmosphere where each visit offers something new to savor.
address: ชั้น 7 โซน B ใกล้MK Center 444 M.B.K. Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Khongsittha Muay Thai
summary: Khongsittha Muay Thai offers a welcoming environment for both travelers and locals to engage in structured training programs. With options for group sessions, private training, and intensive camps, the gym caters to all skill levels while emphasizing fundamentals and fitness. This community-oriented camp continues to thrive post-2022, making it a reliable choice for anyone looking to dive into Muay Thai in Bangkok.
address: 23 Thanon Sukhonthasawat, Khwaeng Lat Phrao, Khet Lat Phrao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Studio Lam
summary: Studio Lam is a cherished music club that celebrates vinyl culture with an eclectic mix of live sets and DJs. The intimate venue showcases everything from molam to global dance rhythms, attracting Bangkok's left-field selectors. Check the listings for varied concepts and start times to experience unique musical nights.
address: 3/1 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sugar Ray You’ve Just Been Poisoned
summary: Step into a retro-styled speakeasy that exudes neighborhood charm and sophisticated cocktails. A menu featuring clarified punches, dessert-adjacent sours, and classic highballs pairs perfectly with a warm ambiance and easy conversational pace. Expect a lively atmosphere with queues during peak hours, making it a favorite for cocktail enthusiasts.
address: 37 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Salon du Japonisant
summary: Salon du Japonisant offers a serene experience with an impressive selection of Japanese spirits, including shochu and whisky. The cocktails focus on precision and flavor, crafted with minimal garnish to highlight the ingredients. A warm ambiance created by vinyl music and wood accents makes it a perfect spot for contemplative drinking.
address: 36/5 Soi Sukhumvit 39 Sukhumvit Rd., Klongton Nua, เขตวัฒนา Bangkok 10110, Thailand

name: HOMU ほむ (Sathorn)
summary: HOMU ほむ offers a serene Japanese café experience, showcasing the delicate pairing of wagashi and matcha. The warm, wood-rich ambiance is complemented by soft music and a courteous pace, making it an ideal place to unwind. Enjoy mellow milk drinks that highlight the essence of premium tea in a cozy setting.
address: 14, 7 Soi Sathon 2, แขวง ยานนาวา, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Ging Grai
summary: Ging Grai offers a culinary journey through four Thai regions in Chiang Mai's Nimman neighborhood, blending traditional flavors with an upscale twist. Highlights include seasonal grilled fish in banana leaf and papaya salad with field crabs, complemented by unique mocktails. The space also features a homeware shop showcasing local handicrafts, adding a creative touch to your dining experience.
address: เลขที่ 18 Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 11, Tambon Su Thep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand

name: Ginzado Yakiniku
summary: Ginzado Yakiniku in Thonglor offers an immersive dining experience where precision meets hospitality. The focus on craft and seasonal ingredients invites guests to explore familiar dishes alongside exciting specials. Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere with thoughtfully paired drinks, ensuring every meal sharpens the senses without haste.
address: 22/1, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: ABar Rooftop
summary: ABar Rooftop offers a unique sky-deck experience with expertly crafted martinis and an extensive tonic selection. Enjoy stunning skyline views during golden hour while savoring flights that explore various botanicals without excessive sweetness. Crisp service and perfectly cut ice enhance this elevated drinking experience, but remember to bring a light jacket for the evening breeze.
address: 199 Sukhumvit Soi 22, Klongton, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: The COMMONS Saladaeng — Dining Deck
summary: Thai flavors shine at The COMMONS Saladaeng — Dining Deck, where herbs and citrus enhance every dish. A focus on sharing encourages a delightful culinary journey with crunchy salads, aromatic soups, and rich curries that balance spice and taste. Regulars appreciate the attentive staff who help tailor spice levels for an enjoyable dining experience.
address: 126 Saladaeng Soi 1, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: The Never Ending Summer
summary: A dramatic, glass-walled warehouse offers polished Thai comfort food by the river. Flavors balance herbs, citrus, and sweetness over clean textures, with a menu designed for sharing. Staff assist in adjusting spice levels, ensuring a welcoming experience for first-timers.
address: 760 1 Lat Ya Rd, Khwaeng Khlong San, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Cru Champagne
summary: Cru Champagne offers an extraordinary experience atop the Centara Grand at CentralWorld, featuring a stunning 360-degree view of Bangkok from the 59th floor. Accessed via a private elevator, this bar specializes in Champagne, making it an ideal spot for celebrations. Savor the elegance of G.H. Mumm Cordon Rouge Brut while soaking in the vibrant cityscape.
address: Centara Grand at CentralWorld, 999/99 Rama 1 road,, Phatumwan, เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Tsu Japanese Restaurant
summary: Tsu Japanese Restaurant offers a refined dining experience where precision meets hospitality, ensuring each bite is perfectly crafted. The counter seats provide an intimate view of skilled chefs at work, while seasonal specials invite adventurous choices. A carefully curated drink menu complements the cuisine, creating a harmonious atmosphere for both casual and extended meals.
address: JW Marriott Hotel 4 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Fitness First – Platinum Siam Paragon
summary: Fitness First – Platinum Siam Paragon offers a premium workout experience in the heart of Bangkok, perfect for shoppers and office workers. Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, including cardio zones and group classes, it caters to fitness enthusiasts looking to stay active. Its convenient location with direct BTS access makes it an ideal choice for after-work workouts.
address: 4th Floor No, Siam Paragon Shoping Center, 991 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Bangkok’s top 8 dog cafes
summary: Pet lovers will find joy at Bangkok's top dog cafes, where furry friends greet you in cozy settings. Enjoy high-quality coffee and unique pastries while interacting with over 50 dogs at Big Dog Cafe or visiting the charming dachshund cafe in Thonglor. Each venue offers a delightful experience for animal enthusiasts and coffee aficionados alike.
address: Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: The Loft
summary: Sophistication meets modern flair at The Loft, where early-20th-century cocktails are expertly crafted. Marble and brass decor provide an elegant backdrop for enjoying stunning city views. Knowledgeable bartenders elevate your experience with unique off-menu options upon request.
address: 56th Floor, 151 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Peace Oriental Teahouse (Langsuan)
summary: Experience a serene retreat at Peace Oriental Teahouse, where zen aesthetics and ritualistic tea ceremonies create a tranquil atmosphere. The elegant pairing of mochi and light wagashi enhances the tasting experience, making it perfect for a refined pause. Located near Lumpini, this teahouse offers a unique blend of tradition and calm in the heart of the city.
address: 87 Lang Suan Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: The Bamboo Bar
summary: The Bamboo Bar at Mandarin Oriental offers a unique blend of tropical modernism and nightly live jazz, creating an inviting atmosphere. Its menu creatively incorporates Thai botanicals into classic cocktails, served in a timeless setting with rattan and teak decor. An enforced dress code and early arrivals are recommended to avoid the line at this evolving bucket-list destination.
address: 48 Oriental Ave, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Stella
summary: Stella offers an enchanting riverside lounge experience where exquisite garnish meets Asian botanicals. Each dish is a work of art, with stunning presentations and a theatrical service style that elevates every visit. Perfect for romantic evenings, the ambiance is enhanced by river reflections and a curated atmosphere.
address: 300/2 ถ. เจริญกรุง เเขวง ยานนาวา Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Silpakorn University Art Centre
summary: Silpakorn University Art Centre showcases a blend of Thai art history and contemporary practices through exhibitions and public programs. Situated on the serene riverside Wang Thapra campus, it fosters an academic atmosphere that encourages dialogue between students and masters. Collaborations with national museums enhance its curatorial breadth, making it a vital part of Bangkok’s art scene.
address: 31 Na Phra Lan Rd, Khwaeng Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: WARPOINT VR Club
summary: WARPOINT VR Club at Gateway Ekamai offers an immersive VR entertainment experience with expansive arenas for team battles and a variety of games. Families can enjoy tailored experiences, while corporate events are also accommodated in this dynamic space. Advance bookings are recommended to secure your spot in this vibrant venue accessible via BTS.
address: 982, เเขวง พระโขนง, 22 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงพระโขนง เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: LAZGAM Laser Games
summary: Experience the thrill of laser tag at LAZGAM, a vibrant arena near Asok. Engage in team games under captivating fog and neon lights, where safety briefings ensure a fun environment. Enjoy quieter weekday afternoons for a more relaxed gaming session.
address: 5th Floor Holiday Inn Hotel Sukhumvit Soi 22, Klongton Klongtoey Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sushi Den
summary: Sushi Den at CentralWorld elevates dining into an art form with precision in every bite. The counter seats offer a front-row view of skilled knife work, while the seasonal specials invite adventurous choices. A well-curated drink list complements the experience, ensuring a relaxed atmosphere even amidst the hustle.
address: 4 Ratchaprasong Road, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Penthouse Bar + Grill
summary: Penthouse Bar + Grill offers a multi-level experience at Park Hyatt, seamlessly blending a cocktail bar, whisky room, and rooftop. The drink menu highlights spirit-forward creations with subtle smoke and sweetness, while the atmosphere shifts from intimate conversations to vibrant DJ sets. AvroKO's sophisticated design invites exploration and encourages dressing sharp for an unforgettable night out.
address: 34th - 36th Floor, Park Hyatt Bangkok, 88 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Havana Social
summary: Step into Havana Social, a captivating speakeasy that transports visitors to pre-revolution Cuba with its vintage decor and lively ambiance. Enjoy an impressive rum selection while dancing to salsa nights and live music, creating an unforgettable experience. Each visit feels like being part of a cinematic scene, complete with a cover charge on peak nights.
address: 41, 3 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Khlong Toei Youth Center – Public Pool
summary: A 25-meter outdoor public pool located within the Khlong Toei Youth Center offers an affordable option for lap swimming. Clean lanes and straightforward membership paperwork enhance the experience, making it accessible to all. This centrally located facility also features courts and multipurpose areas for those looking to diversify their workouts.
address: PHH8+PWF, Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Crimson Room
summary: Step into the Crimson Room, a Gatsby-era cabaret adorned in red velvet that exudes big-band glamour. Champagne cocktails and floral sours accompany live performances in an intimate setting perfect for conversation. Reserve a booth near the stage for an immersive experience that invites dressing up and lingering between sets.
address: 87 Lang Suan Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Iron Balls Distillery & Bar
summary: Iron Balls Distillery & Bar offers a unique industrial-nautical ambiance with a working gin still at its heart. Enjoy house gin and tonics enhanced by kaffir-lime, all served in stunning glassware that complements the venue's design. As night falls, DJs create a low-simmer energy, perfect for unwinding with friends or enjoying a creative drink experience.
address: G/F, Park Lane Ekkamai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Explore the latest culinary gems in town, featuring unique offerings at The Shoyu Stand, Kiri Tsukemen, and Tsu Na Gu. Each restaurant brings a fresh take on traditional flavors, inviting food lovers to discover new favorites. Ideal for adventurous diners seeking a taste of the unexpected.

name: Sorn — 3 stars
summary: Sorn, a three-star MICHELIN restaurant, showcases the artistry of Southern Thai cuisine through a meticulously crafted tasting menu. Each course is designed to elevate regional seafood and produce while honoring authentic flavors. The intimate setting in a restored townhouse enhances the experience, with service that is both choreographed and attentive.
address: 56 Sukhumvit 26, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Ten Suns
summary: Ten Suns, a Bib Gourmand pick, serves intensely flavored beef soup in Bangkok’s old town. Diners can choose between clear or dark broths, with tender cuts like brisket and tendon highlighting the dish's depth. Quick service and limited seating add to its charm, making it a cult favorite among noodle enthusiasts.
address: 456 ถ. วิสุทธิกษัตริย์ Khwaeng Ban Phan Thom, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: The Key Room No.72
summary: Discover The Key Room No.72, a hidden speakeasy tucked inside Josh Hotel's retro ambiance. Here, cocktail crafting is an art form, with every detail from dilution to glass temperature receiving meticulous care. An intimate setting invites personal interaction with bartenders, making for a memorable experience—reservations are recommended.
address: 19/2 Soi Ari 4 Nua, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Tobaki Korean Restaurant
summary: Tobaki Korean Restaurant on Sukhumvit 39 offers a harmonious blend of flavor and hospitality, perfect for any occasion. The menu emphasizes shareable portions, allowing groups to enjoy a variety of dishes that cater to different tastes. With a relaxed atmosphere ideal for both casual lunches and festive dinners, this dining spot transforms everyday meals into memorable experiences.
address: 595 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Electric Sheep (Talat Noi/Charoenkrung)
summary: Retro-futurist dining at Electric Sheep combines Mediterranean flair with Thai ingredients, creating a unique culinary experience. Guests can enjoy shareable plates and an impressive selection of wines and cocktails while taking in stunning views of the riverfront. Ideal for date nights or small gatherings, reservations are recommended for golden-hour seating.
address: 4th Floor, 867 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Talat Noi, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Chenin (Sukhumvit 31/Phrom Phong)
summary: Chenin offers a unique blend of a natural-wine bar and a chef-driven small-plates kitchen, perfect for adventurous palates. The ambiance is cozy and intimate, with counter seating that encourages interaction among guests. Expect innovative dishes paired with rare wines in a casual-chic setting; reservations are recommended on weekends.
address: 1st floor, 29/4 Soi Sukhumvit 31, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: SPACEPLUS Bangkok
summary: SPACEPLUS Bangkok stands out as a premier nightclub in the RCA entertainment zone, featuring impressive LED displays and an electrifying atmosphere. The venue hosts both renowned international DJs and local talent, ensuring vibrant weekends filled with EDM and hip-hop beats. With its grand scale and immersive shows, this hotspot attracts a diverse crowd looking to dance late into the night.
address: 31/10 3rd floor, RCA plaza, Soi Phetchaburi 47, Bangkapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Levels Club & Lounge
summary: Levels Club & Lounge offers a vibrant nightlife experience in Sukhumvit with mainstream EDM and stunning LED visuals. The rooftop terrace vibe complements the energetic atmosphere, ideal for both locals and travelers looking to enjoy a big night out. With VIP tables and guest DJs, this club guarantees a lively evening filled with bottle-service excitement.
address: 6th Floor of the Aloft Hotel เลขที่ 35 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Charmgang Curry Shop (Talat Noi/Charoenkrung 35)
summary: Charmgang Curry Shop offers a vibrant twist on modern Thai curries in a compact, artfully designed space. With its Bib Gourmand recognition and a focus on bold flavors, this lively canteen is perfect for curry enthusiasts. Reservations are recommended as it fills up quickly due to its popularity.
address: 14 ซ. เจริญกรุง 35 Khwaeng Talat Noi, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Ojo (Silom/Mahanakhon 76F)
summary: Experience modern Mexican cuisine at Ojo, a stunning rooftop venue in Bangkok with sweeping skyline views. Chef Paco Ruano elevates traditional dishes in a chic, geometric setting, perfect for sunset cocktails and dinner. Reservations are recommended to secure prime seating in this stylish space.
address: 76th Floor, The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon, 114 Thanon Naradhiwat Rajanagarindra, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Gaggan Anand
summary: Gaggan Anand offers a unique take on Indian cuisine, blending nostalgia with innovative storytelling. The menu adapts seasonally, ensuring each dish reflects the freshest ingredients and techniques. An attentive yet relaxed service enhances the experience, allowing for engaging conversations about the culinary journey.
address: 68 Sukhumvit 31, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Char
summary: A rooftop gem at Hotel Indigo, Char offers a stylish dining experience alongside breathtaking views of Bangkok's greenery. The grill specializes in premium beef sourced from Australia's Darling Downs, promising a top-notch culinary adventure. Open daily from 5 PM to 1 AM, it's perfect for evening relaxation or socializing under the stars.
address: 25th & 26th Floor, Hotel Indigo Bangkok, 81 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Seoulchon
summary: Seoulchon (Ari) in Bangkok offers a thoughtful dining experience that balances flavor and hospitality. The menu is designed for sharing, allowing small groups to create meals that transition seamlessly from light to rich. With a welcoming ambiance, this restaurant transforms everyday moments into special occasions.
address: 388 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Oasis Spa
summary: Oasis Spa offers a calm and sophisticated retreat in Phrom Phong, focusing on intricate details that enhance your relaxation experience. Treatments range from affordable traditional Thai massages to luxurious couples' packages featuring hydrotherapy and personalized services. High-tech options like the Hydrafacial ensure a modern touch to classic wellness.
address: 64 Sukhumvit 31 Yaek 4, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Haoma (Phrom Phong/Sukhumvit 31)
summary: Haoma offers a unique neo-Indian tasting menu, emphasizing sustainability through its urban farm and circular kitchen ethos. The plant-filled dining room provides a tranquil setting for serious food enthusiasts to indulge in innovative dishes. Reservations are essential to secure a spot at this acclaimed culinary destination.
address: 231, 3 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: 80/20 (Charoenkrung 26)
summary: Experience contemporary Thai cuisine in a sleek warehouse setting, where chef's-bar energy meets meticulous sourcing. Tasting menus invite culinary enthusiasts to indulge while enjoying a vibrant atmosphere. Counter seats offer an engaging view of the kitchen action, perfect for food lovers.
address: 1052, 1054 Soi Nai Loet 1, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Villa Frantzén (Yen Akat/Sathorn)
summary: Experience a unique blend of Nordic and Asian cuisine in a serene villa setting, complete with a garden and open kitchen. The elegant bar and set-menu format offer a refined yet welcoming atmosphere, perfect for special occasions. Reservations are highly recommended for weekends due to its popularity.
address: 7 Soi Yen Akat 3, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Lloyd’s Club
summary: Lloyd’s Club, nestled in the Metropole Bangkok, offers a cozy escape with its private bar and seasonal cocktails. The intimate second floor features private chambers ideal for personalized gatherings. Experience a unique atmosphere crafted by the creators of popular local spots like Tichuca and Bar Scofflaws.
address: Skhumvit 55 Khlong Tan Nuea Subdistrict, แขวงบางกะปิ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Igniv — 1 star
summary: Igniv, a MICHELIN-starred restaurant, showcases a contemporary shared-plate dining experience rooted in Swiss culinary traditions. Clean flavors and playful presentations invite conversation among groups, making each meal a delightful journey. With a modern ambience and well-timed service, reservations are recommended to enjoy this unique tasting adventure.
address: 159 Rajadamri Road, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Sühring (Yen Akat)
summary: Sühring offers an exquisite modern German dining experience within a luxurious, glass-lined villa. Each tasting menu showcases technique-driven plates inspired by childhood memories, perfect for special occasions. Though jackets are not required, dressing up enhances the elegant atmosphere.
address: 10 Soi Yen Akat 3, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Baan Tepa Culinary Space (Ramkhamhaeng/Hua Mak)
summary: Baan Tepa Culinary Space offers a unique dining experience with its garden-wrapped campus dedicated to modern Thai cuisine. The focus on biodiversity and terroir reflects a commitment to sustainable practices in an inviting setting of warm woods and contemporary design. Reservations are essential for this exclusive destination dining.
address: 561 Ramkhamhaeng Rd, Khwaeng Hua Mak, Khet Bang Kapi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10240, Thailand

name: Côte by Mauro Colagreco (Riverside/Capella Bangkok)
summary: Côte by Mauro Colagreco offers a Riviera-inspired dining experience with exquisite menus and a polished wine selection. The serene, sun-drenched design enhances views of the Chao Phraya River, making it perfect for leisurely meals. Reservations are recommended to enjoy this smart casual gem.
address: 300/2 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Hanwoori
summary: Hanwoori (Sukhumvit 63) offers a delightful dining experience that prioritizes flavor and hospitality. The menu is adaptable, making it perfect for sharing among friends or family, while the drink selections enhance both casual lunches and festive evenings. A warm ambiance ensures conversations flow effortlessly, turning any visit into a memorable occasion.
address: 3 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Fantasia Lagoon – The Mall Ngamwongwan
summary: Fantasia Lagoon offers a delightful escape for families with its rooftop water park features, including slides and lazy rivers. This suburban gem attracts local visitors, especially on weekends, making it a perfect stop after shopping at The Mall Ngamwongwan. With modest prices and convenient facilities, it promises a fun day out without the crowds of larger parks.
address: VG4R+7RM, Bang Khen, Mueang Nonthaburi District, Nonthaburi 11000, Thailand

name: Studio Lam
summary: Studio Lam is a vibrant world-music bar that showcases an eclectic mix of molam, Afro, and disco sounds. The venue's custom sound system creates an immersive experience, attracting a music-loving crowd ready to dance. With late-night hours and special events featuring guest DJs, it stands out in Bangkok's alternative nightlife scene.
address: 3/1 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mezzaluna (Riverside/Lebua 65F)
summary: Experience a unique blend of Japanese ingredients and French techniques at this sky-high tasting room. With stunning river views and a modern, elegant atmosphere, it's perfect for special occasions. Reservations are recommended for those seeking the best seats.
address: 65th Floor State Tower Bangkok 1055 Si Lom Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Nusara
summary: Nusara offers an intimate dining experience that elevates heirloom Thai recipes into a thoughtfully curated course menu. Seasonal ingredients inspire dishes, and the unhurried service invites conversation and storytelling. Attention to detail creates a calm ambiance, ensuring every aspect of your meal feels special.
address: 336 Thanon Maha Rat, Khwaeng Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Aksorn (Charoenkrung/Central: The Original Store)
summary: Aksorn presents a refined dining experience that highlights mid-20th-century Thai recipes in a beautifully restored setting. The interior features elegant wood accents reminiscent of the 1950s, creating a charming atmosphere. Reservations are essential to enjoy their thoughtfully curated set menus.
address: Aksorn 1266 charoen krung rd 5th Floor, Central:, The Original Store, 1266 ถ. เจริญกรุง แขวงบางรัก เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Côte by Mauro Colagreco — 2 stars
summary: Côte by Mauro Colagreco, boasting two MICHELIN stars, invites diners to experience contemporary Riviera cuisine. Seasonal ingredients and elegant pairings create a refined atmosphere perfect for celebrations. Reservations are recommended for lunch and dinner to savor its exquisite tasting menus and à la carte offerings.
address: 300/2 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Enoteca Italiana
summary: Enoteca Italiana offers a serene dining experience, blending traditional Italian flavors with modern culinary techniques. The seasonal tasting menu and thoughtful pairings ensure each visit feels unique and special. With an emphasis on intimate service and attention to detail, this hidden gem invites guests to savor every moment.
address: 39 ถนน สุขุมวิท Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mapo Galbi
summary: Mapo Galbi offers a delightful Korean BBQ experience in Sukhumvit, focusing on flavor and hospitality. The menu is designed for sharing, allowing groups to enjoy a meal that transitions from light to rich dishes effortlessly. With a vibrant yet conversational atmosphere, this restaurant transforms ordinary moments into memorable occasions.
address: 71 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: GAA — 2 stars
summary: GAA, a two-MICHELIN-star restaurant, offers a unique fusion of Indian and Thai cuisines through inventive tasting menus. Each dish surprises with layered textures and temperatures, complemented by carefully curated beverage pairings. The intimate and elegantly designed space enhances the dining experience, making advance bookings essential for prime evenings.
address: 46 Soi Sukhumvit 53, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Vistro
summary: A bright vegan bistro filled with greenery and natural light creates a refreshing atmosphere. Dishes like the kimchi-dilla showcase vibrant flavors that elevate plant-based dining. Open daily, Vistro invites guests to enjoy creative meals in a positive setting.
address: 46/1 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Klongton Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Giglio Trattoria Fiorentina
summary: Giglio Trattoria Fiorentina offers a taste of Tuscany with its focus on seasonal Florentine dishes like bistecca. The rustic elegance and unhurried service create a calm atmosphere perfect for savoring thoughtfully paired meals. Attention to detail in ambiance and menu ensures a dining experience that feels both personal and refined.
address: 149 Sathon Soi 12, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Seven Spoons
summary: Seven Spoons (Old Town) offers a cozy townhouse experience with Mediterranean-inspired small plates perfect for sharing. The menu encourages exploration, featuring dishes that balance flavors and textures, complemented by a well-curated wine list. Regulars appreciate the attentive staff who enhance the dining experience without overpowering the food.
address: 22-24 Thanon Chakkraphatdi Phong, Khwaeng Wat Sommanat, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Gaggan Anand (Sukhumvit 31)
summary: Experience a groundbreaking culinary journey at Gaggan Anand, where over 20 courses of Indian-inspired cuisine are paired with music and performance. This sleek townhouse setting elevates dining into an immersive event, perfect for special occasions. Secure your reservation well in advance for this high-end tasting experience.
address: 68 Sukhumvit 31, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Two Hands Coffee
summary: Two Hands Coffee in Silom offers a serene atmosphere perfect for solo work or intimate conversations. The specialty bar emphasizes meticulous espresso and clean, fruit-forward pour-overs, showcasing the craft of its skilled baristas. With a minimalist design featuring concrete and pale wood, it creates a refined space that highlights the quality of the drinks.
address: 190 ซอย พิพัฒน์2 Thanon Naradhiwat Rajanagarindra, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Benares
summary: Benares on Sukhumvit 26 offers a seamless blend of flavor and hospitality, perfect for both casual lunches and festive dinners. The flexible menu encourages sharing, allowing small groups to create a meal that transitions from light bites to rich dishes. A lively yet intimate atmosphere ensures conversations flow easily, making every visit feel special.
address: Ground Floor, 15 Sukhumvit Residences, ซ. สุขุมวิท 13 แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Explore new culinary delights at the latest restaurants in town. Each spot offers unique dishes that promise to tantalize your taste buds. Discover your next favorite meal in an exciting atmosphere.

name: Amritsr Restaurant
summary: Amritsr Restaurant on Sukhumvit 11 offers a flavorful journey through Indian cuisine, featuring everything from tandoori dishes to rich curries. The inviting aroma of spices and warm service create a comforting atmosphere for sharing meals with friends or family. Pair your meal with refreshing drinks like lassi or masala chai to enhance the experience.
address: 26/13 Soi Sukhumvit 11, แขวง คลองตันเหนือ, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Meathead
summary: Meathead serves up a playful take on classic Americana with its retro burger and sandwich bar. Enjoy expertly crafted patties and cheeky shakes in a lively atmosphere, perfect for grabbing a quick bite before the game. The combination of Thai flavors and traditional comfort food makes it a unique dining experience.
address: 138 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Khua Kling Pak Sod
summary: Khua Kling Pak Sod showcases the vibrant flavors of southern Thai cuisine, emphasizing dry curries and expertly balanced spices. The bright atmosphere complements a menu designed for sharing, featuring dishes that highlight herbs and citrus without overwhelming heat. A welcoming staff assists in customizing spice levels, ensuring first-time visitors can enjoy their culinary adventure comfortably.
address: 98/1 Soi Pai Di Ma Di Klang, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Salone Di Vita
summary: Experience the glitz of Salone Di Vita, a luxury nightclub in Ekkamai that blends hip-hop and pop vibes with a runway afterparty aesthetic. With international and Thai DJs set to perform in 2025, expect electrifying bottle shows and exclusive VIP platforms. Glamorous photo opportunities abound, making it a must-visit for nightlife enthusiasts.
address: 217, 8 Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sauce Coffee at Friend Friend
summary: A unique transformation of a former parking lot into a vibrant community hub offers an unexpected blend of creativity and great coffee. Sauce Coffee serves aromatic brews made from Gem Forest Coffee beans, while the adjacent Colorama delights with colorful, healthy dishes. An open art zone enhances the experience with creative installations and cozy corners for relaxation.

name: Saravana Bhavan
summary: Experience the vibrant flavors of Saravana Bhavan in Silom, where dishes burst with herbs and spices. A diverse menu invites sharing, allowing guests to explore a range of textures and tastes from salads to rich curries. Quick service and a warm atmosphere make it perfect for both casual lunches and celebratory meals.
address: 793 Si Lom Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Rossini’s
summary: Rossini’s offers a refined Italian dining experience with handmade pasta served in a warm, inviting atmosphere. Vaulted brick arches create an elegant setting, complemented by attentive staff who guide you through the seasonal menu. Perfect for lingering over bread and shared dishes, this restaurant promises a memorable meal.
address: 250 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Kuang Heng Kaiton Pratunam
summary: Kuang Heng Kaiton Pratunam is a must-visit for Hainanese chicken rice enthusiasts, offering tender chicken paired with fragrant rice and a zesty ginger sauce. Efficient service complements the vibrant atmosphere, making it an ideal stop on your Bangkok food crawl. This restaurant exemplifies the city's rich culinary culture and hospitality.
address: 930 Thanon Phetchaburi, Khwaeng Makkasan, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Sky On 20
summary: Sky On 20 offers a relaxed rooftop bar experience with stunning views and affordable cocktails. The ambiance is enhanced by a low-key house soundtrack, creating an inviting space to unwind. Ideal for those seeking a hidden gem in the city, this spot combines quality drinks with great value.
address: 26th floor, Novotel Bangkok, 19/9 Soi Sukhumvit 20, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Spice & Barley
summary: Spice & Barley (Riverside) offers a thoughtful dining experience where flavors and hospitality intertwine effortlessly. The menu caters to diverse tastes, encouraging sharing and creating a meal that flows from light to rich. With a cozy atmosphere perfect for both casual lunches and special celebrations, this restaurant transforms ordinary moments into memorable occasions.
address: 257, 1-2 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Samre, Khet Thon Buri, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10160, Thailand

name: Chai
summary: Chai stands out as a MICHELIN-listed gem, specializing in Thai-Chinese rice and noodle dishes. The menu emphasizes clean, slightly sweet sauces and reliable quality, making it a local favorite for fast meals. With counter seating and a bustling atmosphere, this spot is perfect for a quick yet satisfying dining experience.
address: 265/2 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Nitra Serenity Centre at 137 Pillars
summary: Experience a unique blend of modern spa design and Thai exotic art at Nitra Serenity Centre. Enjoy the signature Nitra Raya treatment in a tranquil environment that feels both homey and clinical. Open daily from 10am to 8pm, it's a perfect escape in the bustling city.

name: Restaurant POTONG (Yaowarat/Chinatown)

With bilingual instruction and themed series aimed at enhancing strength and mobility, it caters to the local community. Regular updates ensure that residents stay informed about ongoing schedules through 2024–2025.

Ideal for runners and fitness enthusiasts, the park promotes community gatherings with its inviting evening lighting. This space also serves as an educational landscape focused on climate resilience, making it a unique addition to the Samyan neighborhood.

Each gallery is designed to provide scientifically accurate yet accessible explanations, making it an educational experience for all ages. Located by the river, the museum invites visitors to explore its fascinating displays while enjoying ferry access from nearby piers.

name: Kuang Sea Foods

name: On Lok Yun Breakfast Café

With a selection that ranges from local Thai microbrews to cult international imports, this bar is perfect for those looking to discover unique flavors. Knowledgeable staff enhance the experience, making it a must-visit for beer lovers in Bangkok.
address: Ground Floor, SK Tower, 858 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงพระโขนง เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Brut
summary: Brut is a hidden speakeasy in Ari, where brutalist architecture inspires both the ambiance and the cocktail menu. The drinks reflect influences from film and literature, with unique creations like the Boise cocktail, featuring fruity notes and jasmine syrup. A visit promises an artistic experience that blends culture with mixology.

name: Adhere the 13th Blues Bar
summary: Nestled near Phra Athit, Adhere the 13th Blues Bar is a cozy venue where live blues music fills the air, creating an inviting atmosphere. The eclectic decor features posters and vinyl memorabilia, enhancing its lived-in charm. With affordable drinks and a welcoming staff, this bar offers an intimate experience that brings you close to the heart of the performance.
address: 13 Thanon Samsen, Khwaeng Wat Sam Phraya, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Aimée Petit Bistro
summary: Aimée Petit Bistro offers a slice of Montmartre in Bangkok's north, creating an intimate ambiance perfect for romantic evenings. The menu showcases comforting French classics, expertly plated in a cozy setting adorned with brass and banquettes. Ideal for those seeking a quiet escape from the bustling city center.
address: ชั้น 1 โรงแรมโนโวเทล กรุงเทพ ฟิวเจอร์พาร์ค รังสิต เลขที่ 114 Phahon Yothin Road, ประชาธิปัตย์ Amphoe Thanyaburi, Chang Wat Pathum Thani 12130, Thailand

name: Man Ho Chinese Restaurant
summary: Cantonese cuisine takes center stage at Man Ho Chinese Restaurant, where refined roasts and delicate dim sum delight the palate. Enjoy a festive atmosphere on weekends with rolling baskets, while weekdays offer a more serene dining experience. The focus on texture and timing makes every dish a memorable shared experience.
address: JW Marriott Hotel 4 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Aksorn
summary: Aksorn offers a unique culinary journey through forgotten Thai recipes, curated by renowned chef David Thompson. Nestled in Central: The Original Store, the restaurant's design pays homage to its mid-century bookstore heritage. Bold flavors and unusual dishes create an exciting dining experience unlike any other in Bangkok.
address: Aksorn 1266 charoen krung rd 5th Floor, Central:, The Original Store, 1266 ถ. เจริญกรุง แขวงบางรัก เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: The Greenhouse
summary: The Greenhouse offers a fresh take on Cantonese-Thai comfort food in a polished yet inviting setting. Signature dishes like silky congee with abalone and wok-tossed noodles cater to any meal, day or night. Perfect for late-night cravings and family gatherings, this vibrant dining hall welcomes all.
address: 185 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Cupping Coffee & Baker
summary: Cupping Coffee & Baker offers a bright, design-focused café experience within The Quad. Precision espresso and pastries like shokupan French toast create a perfect mid-shop pick-me-up. Mornings are mellow while afternoons bring a lively buzz.
address: The Quad Sukhumvit Eatery, Ground floor, The Landmark Bangkok Hotel, 138 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Pastaio
summary: Pastaio delivers a vibrant atmosphere with freshly made pasta and a neighborhood pizzeria vibe in The Quad’s stylish hall. An open kitchen and warm brick oven enhance the experience, showcasing classic dishes alongside creative specials. Ideal for casual dining with friends before a night out.
address: Ground floor, The Quad, 138 Soi Pha Suk, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: CuCu Bar & Terrace
summary: CuCu Bar & Terrace offers a relaxed cocktail experience with highballs and spritzes served amidst an urban backdrop. The soft industrial decor and outdoor seating create an inviting atmosphere, perfect for walk-ins and hotel guests. Visit at dusk to enjoy the refreshing breeze and city lights in a smart casual setting.
address: The Quad Sukhumvit Eatery, Ground floor, The Landmark Bangkok Hotel, 138 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: 1872 Lounge Bar
summary: 1872 Lounge Bar boasts a serene atmosphere highlighted by Japanese-inspired design and plush seating, perfect for intimate gatherings. The cocktail and whiskey menu features both classic recipes and rare pours, all served with attentive hospitality. Ideal for quiet business meetings or a relaxing nightcap, the bar seats are highly sought after.
address: Aman Nai Lert Bangkok, 1 Soi Somkid, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Sushi Ichizu
summary: Sushi Ichizu offers a refined Edomae sushi experience where precision reigns in both preparation and ambiance. Guests can savor seasonal specials at the counter or share plates in a calm, minimalist setting, ideal for solo diners or groups. A measured pace ensures that every bite is appreciated without feeling rushed, making it a perfect spot for sushi aficionados.
address: 1982 New Petchaburi Rd, Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Sesui
summary: Experience disciplined Edomae techniques at Aman’s omakase counter, where the focus is on market-fresh fish and perfectly seasoned rice. In a hushed, timber-lined room, diners enjoy a ritual of mindful pacing without any distractions. Limited seating ensures an intimate atmosphere, making advance booking essential.
address: 19th Floor, Somkid Aman Nai Lert Bangkok, 1 Soi Nai Loet, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Bar Marco
summary: Bar Marco offers a refined cocktail experience in the heart of Sukhumvit, where modernist techniques meet classic flavors. Each drink showcases a single element, crafted with precision and served in an intimate setting that encourages conversation. The curated playlist of soul and disco complements the atmosphere, making it a hidden gem for cocktail enthusiasts.
address: 946/9 ถนน สุขุมวิท Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mil Social Club
summary: Mil Social Club in Thonglor offers an inviting atmosphere with a mid-century design, perfect for enjoying live music. The lounge features seating tiers and velvet drapes that enhance the performance experience while serving expertly crafted cocktails. Ideal for date nights or small gatherings, arriving early ensures prime seating options.
address: 3rd Floor, J Avenue, 15 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Custard Nakamura
summary: Custard Nakamura has been a beloved fixture in Phrom Phong for nearly thirty years, renowned for its authentic Japanese-style pastries. Highlights include a crispy fried pork cutlet sandwich and a refreshing strawberry sandwich, both made with imported ingredients that elevate their flavors. Despite its fame, this bakery remains affordable, making it an essential stop for both locals and visitors.

name: Cactus
summary: Cactus offers a breezy rooftop and indoor lounge that exudes a mid-century California vibe. Enjoy bright, flavorful cocktails while DJs set a lively backdrop with balearic beats and disco tunes. Perfect for sunset gatherings or late-night celebrations, reservations are recommended on weekends.
address: 15 Thanon Yen Akat, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Wallflowers Upstairs
summary: A rooftop bar above a cherished Chinatown cafe, Wallflowers Upstairs features a lush garden atmosphere and vintage decor. The floral and herbaceous cocktails are crafted for the Bangkok heat, making it an inviting spot from sunset to late evening. With views over the laneway and a romantic vibe, it's perfect for those seeking a cozy escape in the city.
address: 37 39-41 Soi Ram Maitri, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: IMPACT Speed Park
summary: IMPACT Speed Park offers an exhilarating karting experience with electric Sodi karts in a scenic lakeside setting. Known for its pro-level timing, it's perfect for both corporate events and casual racing enthusiasts. Conveniently accessible by taxi or car, prepare for thrilling sessions, albeit weather permitting.
address: 121 M.6 Banmai Sub-districut, ตำบลบ้านใหม่ อำเภอปากเกร็ด นนทบุรี 11120, Thailand

name: Groove 55
summary: Groove 55 channels the charm of a retro jazz club, featuring polished wood and brass accents. A lively venue with stage-forward acoustics offers a small plates menu ideal for late-night music lovers. Dress to impress and call ahead for weekend performances.
address: 308 อาคาร Ten ห้อง (A5-A6 Soi Thong Lo 10, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Early BKK
summary: Nestled in a tranquil corner, Early BKK invites morning enthusiasts and pet lovers to enjoy a serene atmosphere filled with natural light. The eco-conscious cafe features minimalist decor, offering wholesome brunch plates and locally sourced coffee in reusable cups. With its welcoming vibe for four-legged friends, this spot embodies a slower, greener lifestyle.

name: Colorama
summary: Colorama offers a vibrant dining experience with its focus on vegetable-forward dishes in a lively pop-art setting. The open kitchen and dining bar create an engaging atmosphere where plating is part of the show. Ideal for light lunches, it pairs perfectly with coffee from the adjacent Sauce.
address: 99/101, Jutrzenki, 02-231 Warszawa, Poland

name: Bianca
summary: Bianca offers a contemporary Italian dining experience with a stylish atmosphere and an impressive wine selection. The menu emphasizes seasonal produce, making it perfect for both business lunches and romantic dinners. Reservations are recommended during peak hours to enjoy this design-district gem.
address: GM Floor, Empshere, ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Mitsukoshi Depachika
summary: Mitsukoshi Depachika showcases Thailand's first depachika with exquisite kiosks and regional delicacies in a beautifully designed space. Explore a variety of bento, confectionery, and specialty pour-over coffee from curated stalls. Visit during weekday afternoons for a more relaxed experience away from the crowds.
address: 41 Thanon Witthayu, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Homey Coffee
summary: Nestled by the canal near the Reclining Buddha, Homey Coffee offers a serene escape with its neutral tones and gentle playlists. Enjoy balanced coffee and a selection of pastries in a friendly atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after temple visits. Mornings here are particularly tranquil, inviting leisurely conversations over cups of coffee.
address: 1041, 20 Soi Nai Loet, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Milin
summary: Milin offers a cozy escape in Ari, showcasing modern Thai cuisine with an emphasis on regional flavors and seasonal ingredients. The warm, terracotta decor creates an intimate atmosphere perfect for date nights. Reservations are recommended for weekends, with prices in the approachable $$$ range.
address: 15 ซอยสุขุมวิท 61, 15 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Khwan Jai
summary: Khwan Jai presents a modern twist on Isaan cuisine, focusing on charcoal grilling in a stylish timber-steel environment. The menu showcases house ferments and local greens, ideal for sharing with friends or family. Signature offerings like grilled chicken, laab, and sticky rice promise to enhance your dining experience.
address: เลขที่31 Soi Loet Punya, Khwaeng Thung Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Room 55
summary: Room 55 is a cocktail den that prioritizes an immersive listening experience with its vinyl-focused sound system. The ambiance features low lighting and mid-century chairs, perfect for enjoying clarified cocktails and seasonal infusions. Ideal for those seeking a moody, intimate setting with hush-level service.
address: 55 Soi Nuan Chan 34, Khwaeng Nuanchan, Khet Bueng Kum, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Field Note
summary: Field Note offers a unique slow-coffee experience in Bangkok's lush green lung, inviting guests to savor hand-brewed coffee like an art form. The wooden deck and shaded canopy create a tranquil setting perfect for long sips and leisurely breaks, especially after a bike ride. Limited seating enhances its charm, making it ideal for early weekend visits.
address: 41 Neil Rd, Singapore 088824

name: Midori Room
summary: Midori Room offers a serene tea-led experience that combines the art of Japanese matcha with exquisite patisserie. The elegant setting features moss-green decor and tatami hints, creating a quiet atmosphere for learning about matcha grades and temperatures. Reservations are recommended on weekends to ensure a spot in this unique culinary salon.
address: 3rd Floor, RR Space, Soi Sukhumvit 33, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Silver Waves Dim Sum Weekend
summary: Experience the refined artistry of Cantonese dim sum at Silver Waves, where each bite is a testament to precision and texture. Weekend dining transforms into a festive affair with rolling baskets, while weekdays offer a more tranquil atmosphere. The carefully matched tea service enhances the culinary journey, making every visit memorable.
address: 36th Floor, Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok, 28 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Wat Phraya Krai, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Plantiful
summary: Plantiful, a pet-friendly cafe founded by a UCLA graduate, serves scientifically-backed dishes free from refined sugar and chemicals. The menu features unique offerings like spicy kimchi soba, catering to health-conscious diners. Open daily from 8 AM to 5 PM, it's a perfect spot for a nutritious meal in a cozy atmosphere.
address: 27 Sukhumvit 61, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: The Bar Upstairs
summary: Perched above Brasserie Cordonnier, The Bar Upstairs offers a serene escape with lush greenery and wooden walkways. A knowledgeable staff assists in selecting wines from various regions while classic cocktails provide an alternative for non-wine drinkers. Enjoy cozy seating or balcony views, perfect for a relaxed gathering without the party atmosphere.
address: 3rd floor, 33/30 Sukhumvit Rd. Soi 11, Klong Toey Nua, เขตวัฒนา Bangkok 10110, Thailand

name: Playa
summary: A vibrant seafood bar with a Latin twist awaits just off the river walk, featuring fresh crudos and ceviches. Bright cocktails complement the breezy atmosphere, making this a perfect spot for golden hour. Opt for terrace seating to fully enjoy the scenic views and relaxed vibe.
address: 436/541 Moo 9 Beach Road Amphur, เมืองพัทยา อำเภอบางละมุง ชลบุรี 20150, Thailand

name: Silica
summary: Silica stands out as a futuristic cocktail lab where innovation meets mixology. The bar features unique presentations of Thai botanicals in clarified, carbonated, and smoked formats, appealing to cocktail enthusiasts. With limited seating and a focus on quality, reservations are recommended for an unforgettable experience.
address: 16/6 Soi On Nut 74/1, Khwaeng Prawet, Khet Prawet, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10250, Thailand

name: House of Rice
summary: House of Rice offers a cozy ambiance with a focus on Thai-Japanese comfort food, featuring dishes like donburi and ochazuke. Ingredients are thoughtfully sourced, ensuring that each bowl is crafted to highlight the best flavors of the season. This neatly styled spot is perfect for affordable, homestyle dining.
address: 45 Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: WWA Hua Lamphong
summary: WWA Hua Lamphong merges cafe culture with a polished aesthetic, featuring clean lines and abundant natural light. The drink selection showcases a variety of beans from local and international roasters, paired with thoughtfully crafted food options. Experience a tranquil atmosphere perfect for enjoying everything from silky drips to hearty kimchi fried rice.

name: Studio 12
summary: Studio 12 offers an exquisite dessert experience in a minimalist setting, where plated sweets are crafted with precision. Monthly tasting flights present a harmonious balance of texture and temperature, elevating each bite to an art form. Reserve a counter seat for an intimate view of the finishing touches on these culinary creations.
address: ร้าน 12 Club Hair Studio ; Room 33/4 (B Floor), G Tower, ถ. พระราม 9 แขวงห้วยขวาง เขตห้วยขวาง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10310, Thailand

name: Mickey’s Diner
summary: Mickey’s Diner brings American classics to life with hearty meals inspired by Chef Chalee Kader’s time in San Francisco. Indulge in comfort food favorites like fried chicken and waffles or a robust breakfast featuring Canadian bacon and homemade fries. This cozy spot invites families for a satisfying meal in a welcoming atmosphere.
address: GF Floor, Amarin Plaza, Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Baan Suan Pi
summary: Baan Suan Pi in Lat Phrao offers a vibrant dining experience where dishes are designed for sharing, allowing guests to explore flavors together. The attentive service guides newcomers while maintaining the lively essence of Thai cooking. Weeknights feel cozy and neighborly, while weekends buzz with families enjoying the culinary delights.
address: 93, 3 Thanon Nak Niwat, Khwaeng Lat Phrao, Khet Lat Phrao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Daisie May's Home Cafe
summary: Classic breakfast offerings like croissants and hearty full breakfasts create a delightful menu at this charming café. The cute design and outdoor seating evoke an English garden atmosphere, perfect for families and friends to relax. Located in Ekkamai, it’s an inviting spot that combines comfort with quality food.

name: Toby’s
