summary: Breakfast at Toby's on Sukhumvit Soi 38 offers a delightful start to the day with a menu featuring favorites like the Egg Mikado and breakfast bruschetta. The Ploenchit location boasts a more corporate interior yet retains the charm that fans love. Enjoy house-cured salmon and poached eggs in a cozy atmosphere perfect for brunch enthusiasts.
address: Noble, 1035 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: The Beer Cap
summary: Beer enthusiasts will find a haven at The Beer Cap, a lively bar that showcases both local craft and imported brews. Its industrial decor, featuring recycled furniture and beer cap art, enhances the focus on quality drinks. Open daily from noon until midnight, this Sukhumvit gem is perfect for after-work gatherings or weekend hangouts.
address: 335 ถนน สุขุมวิท Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Pah Jong
summary: Pah Jong offers a unique twist on fried rice with over 64 customizable combinations. Choose from bases like jasmine or Japanese rice and pair them with sauces such as squid ink or truffle for a personalized dish. This innovative approach elevates a classic favorite into an exciting dining experience.
address: 169 Thanon Samsen, Khwaeng Wat Sam Phraya, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Kwann
summary: Kwann offers an innovative take on Thai fine dining, showcasing firewood-cooked dishes crafted by acclaimed chefs. Seasonal ingredients from local producers ensure a menu that evolves with every visit, creating a unique culinary experience. Try the Thai Wagyu Beef Tartare for a surprising delight that redefines raw meat.
address: 73/7-8, 73 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Pa Ma Heng The Eatery
summary: Pa Ma Heng The Eatery offers a chic yet homey atmosphere, perfect for breakfast lovers and pet owners alike. The menu features unique twists on classic Thai breakfast dishes, including ka-prow with Australian beef ribeye and salmon. With a spacious setting that resembles a cozy family home, it's an inviting spot to start your day.
address: 420 Sukhumvit 71 Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Fathom Bookspace
summary: Fathom Bookspace offers a cozy café atmosphere perfect for book lovers and creatives. With a curated selection of books and comfortable seating, it invites visitors to relax or work in a tranquil environment. Events like book launches enhance the community feel, making it a hidden gem in Sathorn.
address: 572/3 Soi Sathon 3, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Street Pizza
summary: Located on the vibrant Thonglor streets, Street Pizza specializes in artisanal pizzas that promise a delightful experience. The classic margherita features sourdough fermented for 36 hours, creating a soft, fluffy crust complemented by a sweet tomato base and fresh basil. This spot is perfect for pizza lovers seeking quality in an emerging culinary area.
address: PHJ8+VM9 Emsphere Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Finalist: Penthouse Bar + Grill
summary: Perched on the 32nd floor of the Millennium Hilton, this rooftop bar offers stunning 360-degree views of the Chao Phraya River. Enjoy classic cocktails like the French 75 and Grand Cosmopolitan while lounging under the stars or near the helipad. DJs and garden accents create a vibrant atmosphere perfect for celebrations.
address: 34th - 36th Floor, Park Hyatt Bangkok, 88 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: BEAM
summary: BEAM reclaims its position in Bangkok's nightlife with a focus on house and techno, enhanced by a powerful VOID sound system. The dancefloor is designed for freedom of movement, allowing guests to lose themselves in the music. With immersive LED lights and visuals, every night promises an exhilarating sensory experience.

name: Kokugura Ramen
summary: Ari's culinary scene welcomes Kokugura Ramen, a haven for ramen enthusiasts. Chef Kulapol “Air” Samsen brings his Michelin-star experience to craft exceptional bowls, drawing inspiration from 23 renowned ramen shops in Japan. As night falls, the space transforms into a sake bar offering classic Japanese dishes, perfect for an evening out.
address: 1, 7 Soi Ari 2, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Raze Arcade
summary: Raze Arcade brings a vibrant nightlife experience to EmWonder, blending retro New York vibes with thrilling Formula 1 elements. Guests can enjoy high-energy tunes and creative cocktails while engaging in the main attraction: an F1 simulator arcade game. A large TV screen ensures race fans won't miss a moment of the action.
address: Empshere, 5th Floor, 628 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Kavee
summary: Kavee redefines fine dining in Bangkok with a poetic approach to Thai cuisine, showcasing underappreciated ingredients. Chef Tae's 10-course experience features creative dishes like wild-caught frogs and winged-ants, transforming traditional flavors into unexpected delights. A contemporary setting complements the culinary artistry, making each visit a unique journey of taste.
address: 88/1, 88/2 Soi Santi Suk, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Klongtoey, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: BeerVault Annex Pop‑ups
summary: BeerVault Annex Pop-ups offers an ever-evolving selection of craft beers, featuring collab kegs and themed flights that entice repeat visits. The casual atmosphere allows for easy reconfiguration for events, making it a versatile space for beer enthusiasts. Quick service and knowledgeable staff enhance the experience, providing insights into current and upcoming brews.
address: Unit 6, Ground Floor, 1 Sukhumvit Soi 22, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: A Book With No Name
summary: A Book With No Name offers a cozy escape in Bangkok, blending a café with a bookstore for the perfect literary retreat. The artistic interior, adorned with local artwork, creates a warm atmosphere ideal for relaxation and community events like book readings. Visitors can indulge in diverse literature while sipping their favorite coffee, making it an inviting spot for both book lovers and casual readers alike.
address: 721, 723 Soi Sophon, Khwaeng Thanon Nakhon Chai Si, Khet Dusit, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10300, Thailand

name: Cento
summary: Cento is one of the exciting new restaurants making waves in Bangkok's culinary scene. Offering a vibrant selection of New Orleans cuisine among other dishes, it caters to diverse foodie tastes. Discover what makes this spot a must-visit as the year progresses.
address: 120 Soi Sala Daeng 1/1, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Baan Nual
summary: Baan Nual (Old Town) offers a vibrant dining experience with a focus on lively Thai flavors. Dishes are designed for sharing, making it easy to explore the menu while adjusting spice levels to suit everyone at the table. The atmosphere shifts from neighborly weeknights to bustling weekends, catering to families and food enthusiasts alike.
address: 37 Thanon Fueang Nakhon, Khwaeng Wat Ratchabophit, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Gaggan at Louis Vuitton
summary: Fine dining meets high fashion at Gaggan in Ratchaprasong, where Chef Gaggan Anand redefines progressive Indian cuisine. Expect a culinary journey that plays with the five essential tastes: sweet, sour, salty, spicy, and surprise. This unique blend of haute cuisine and luxury offers an unforgettable dining experience.
address: Unit 2F-S01-B, Second Floor, Unit A, 5th Floor Gaysorn Amarin, 502 ถนน เพลินจิต แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Montagne
summary: Montagne stands out in Bangkok's ice cream scene with its artisan creations crafted by chef Bhupar Choonharas, a Sweet Chef competition winner. Unique flavors like Fleur de Benjamas and Ananas Shiso showcase a blend of tradition and innovation, while signature desserts elevate the experience. Mocktails curated by Supawit Muttarattana add a refreshing touch to this delightful dessert destination.
address: 106/1 Thanon Charoen Rat, Khwaeng Bang Khlo, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Samut
summary: Chef Thitid 'Ton' Tassanakajohn's latest venture, Samut, elevates local Thai seafood with a commitment to fresh coastal ingredients. The eight-course dining experience showcases Southern specialties in an elegant setting inspired by traditional Thai-Chinese decor. Anticipate a revamped menu soon, promising even more delightful dishes from the South.
address: 14 120, Tambon Rawai, Amphoe Mueang Phuket, Chang Wat Phuket 83100, Thailand

name: Appia
summary: Experience the warmth of Appia, a Roman-leaning trattoria where handmade pasta and porchetta take center stage. The inviting atmosphere, complemented by soft lighting and wooden accents, encourages leisurely meals with friends or family. A thoughtfully curated wine list enhances your dining experience, making it easy to savor each moment.
address: 20/4 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Klongton Nua Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Resonance
summary: Resonance offers a unique fine dining experience in Bangkok, blending Japanese influences with a seasonal 14-course tasting menu. The minimalist decor allows the exquisite dishes to shine, featuring ingredients like firefly squid and crab spring rolls that burst with flavor. Chef Shunsuke Shimomura's innovative creations invite curiosity and satisfaction, making every visit worthwhile.
address: 108, 4 สุขุมวิท 65 Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Culture Cafe
summary: Culture Cafe serves as a vibrant hub for Bangkok's vinyl enthusiasts, featuring an eclectic mix of jazz, soul, disco, and house music. The intimate space fosters connections over quality drinks like highballs and seasonal cocktails while igniting conversations about music discoveries. Expect to leave with new artists to explore after a night of engaging tunes and community spirit.
address: 249 Thanon Samsen, Khwaeng Wat Sam Phraya, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Lava Asian Bistro and Bar
summary: Lava Asian Bistro and Bar offers a vibrant fusion of dining and nightlife, featuring live Thai singalongs and a DJ spinning nostalgic hits. The menu highlights easy-to-enjoy Asian dishes alongside expertly cooked steaks, complemented by signature cocktails and an accessible wine selection. Perfect for those who want to indulge in good food before dancing the night away, this spot is ideal for social gatherings.
address: 137/1 Soi Thong Lo 10, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Saxophone Pub
summary: Saxophone Pub offers a vibrant atmosphere with live jazz, blues, and soul music every night. The old-school décor and lively crowd of locals and musicians create a warm, welcoming vibe. Enjoy cold beers and simple cocktails while soaking in the energetic performances from seasoned bands.
address: 3, 8 Soi Ratchawithi 11, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Seen Restaurant and Bar
summary: Seen Restaurant and Bar offers a stunning rooftop experience with breathtaking 360-degree views of Bangkok. While the bar may not boast top-tier mixologists, its vibrant atmosphere and popularity speak volumes. Perfect for those seeking an unforgettable night out in the city.

name: Pimp My Salad x Sarnies
summary: Pimp My Salad x Sarnies offers a fresh take on clean eating with bold flavors and thoughtful ingredients. Highlights include the Pork Kim-cheese Toastie and the Nutty Acai Bowl, perfect for brunch or a casual catch-up. The bright, inviting space is ideal for enjoying nutrient-dense meals in good company.
address: 622 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Udon Sakaba Kitaro Labo
summary: Udon Sakaba Kitaro Labo offers a delightful escape with its thick udon noodles and premium sukiyaki featuring Okinawa's aguu pork. A cozy two-storey shophouse, it boasts traditional low tables on the first floor and private rooms upstairs for larger groups. Perfect for winding down after work, this spot serves Japanese beer daily to complement your meal.
address: 1, 2 Soi Saeng Mukda, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Groovin’ High Jazz Bar & Café
summary: Groovin’ High Jazz Bar & Café offers an intimate setting in Silom where live jazz takes center stage. Enjoy a range of performances from duos to classic swing combos while sipping on reasonably priced drinks and light bites. The welcoming atmosphere invites you to linger and savor the musicianship in a relaxed environment.
address: บริษัท กรู๊ฟวิน ไฮ จำกัด เลขที่ 118 Si Lom Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Good Roots
summary: Good Roots in Sukhumvit offers a unique dining experience with its focus on functional, nutrient-dense meals crafted from locally sourced ingredients. Signature dishes like Miso Yuzu Salmon highlight the restaurant's commitment to flavor and health, catering especially to the health-conscious diner. Open daily, this chill cafe invites guests to savor delicious food while feeling good about their choices.
address: 49 99 Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Building: CC1, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Veganisto
summary: Veganisto offers a delightful selection of vegan ice creams made from coconut milk, providing a creamy treat without the guilt. Indulge in unique flavors like lemon cheese pie and banoffee pie, or revisit childhood with vanilla pecan Horlicks. Nationwide delivery is available via Line and Robinhood for those craving a sweet escape.
address: 170 Phahon Yothin 14, Khwaeng Samsen Nai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Soma
summary: Soma redefines casual fine dining in Bangkok with its innovative take on traditional Thai cuisine. The talented chefs craft seasonal dishes, highlighted by a rich beef masaman curry and grilled spicy river prawn salad. Located at Siam Patumwan House, it's an ideal spot for lively dinners from Monday to Saturday evenings.

name: Holey Mothership Bakery and Cafe
summary: Holey Mothership Bakery and Cafe stands out in Phra Khanong, offering a delightful breakfast experience. Signature dishes like the three egg Pan Eggs and Mighty Shakshuka pair perfectly with an array of pastries and cakes. This cozy spot is a must-visit for brunch enthusiasts looking for quality eats in the neighborhood.
address: 29 Soi Mi Suwan 3, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Jazz Happens
summary: Jazz Happens on Phra Athit Road is a cozy haven for jazz lovers, where both students and professionals share the stage. The laid-back atmosphere encourages lingering over evening sets, making it ideal for conversation amidst the music. This unpretentious bar offers a bohemian vibe, attracting a knowledgeable crowd while remaining welcoming to newcomers.
address: 126, 9 Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Maze
summary: Maze offers a unique dining experience that intertwines bold Thai flavors with elegant design. Chef Phattanat “May” Thongthong crafts creative tasting menus inspired by her northern heritage, featuring innovative dishes like squid sai oua and ravioli khao soi. The restaurant stands out for its artistic approach to traditional cuisine, making it a must-visit for food enthusiasts.
address: 114/3 Setsiri R, Khwaeng Samsen Nai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Kataru
summary: Kataru is one of the hottest new eateries to emerge in 2024, showcasing a diverse menu that caters to every type of foodie. From New Orleans specialties to innovative ramen dishes and homemade pizzas, there's something for everyone. This vibrant spot promises to satisfy culinary cravings and keep diners coming back for more.
address: 67 Soi Ekkamai 30, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Phed Mark
summary: Phed Mark offers a unique dining experience that captivates with its flavorful dishes and ambiance. The restaurant's unpretentious charm makes it a hidden gem worth exploring. A visit promises delightful culinary surprises in an inviting setting.
address: 300 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Bar 335
summary: Bar 335 offers an intimate escape in Phrom Phong, echoing the charm of Japanese neighborhood bars. With soulful tunes transitioning to disco and boogie, the ambiance is perfect for easy conversation and lingering over classic cocktails. A hidden gem that invites return visits, it's where one drink often leads to many more as the night unfolds.
address: 5/9 ซอยพร้อมศรี 1 Soi Sukhumvit 39, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Speakerbox
summary: Speakerbox stands out as a vibrant live music hub in Thonglor, showcasing a mix of indie, funk, and jazz. The venue transitions seamlessly from a cozy café during the day to an energetic stage at night, featuring both local talents and touring acts. With its inviting atmosphere and affordable drinks, it's the perfect spot for an unforgettable night of live performances.
address: 1000/39 Soi Sukhumvit 55 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Acqua
summary: Acqua offers a luxurious dining experience in Bangkok, combining swank ambiance with attentive service. Chef Alessandro Frau presents a refined a la carte menu featuring dishes like ceviche of scallops and roasted quail atop foie gras. With an impressive wine selection and quality cuisine, this restaurant is ideal for special occasions despite its higher price point.
address: 16/18 Soi Somkid, ถนน เพลินจิต แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Zao Larb
summary: Zao Larb elevates Isaan cuisine with adventurous dishes like fermented ox feet and raw beef delicacies in a stylish Thonglor setting. The thoughtfully designed space combines rustic elements with a modern twist, creating an inviting atmosphere. Daring eaters will appreciate the unique flavors that challenge traditional notions of northeastern Thai food.
address: 11, 7 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Apron Bar
summary: Apron Bar in Bangkok's old town offers a unique pour-your-own craft beer experience amidst an artistic ambiance inspired by analogue photography. With around 18 local and international craft beers on tap, patrons can enjoy hearty dishes while surrounded by film equipment. This venue is perfect for both beer lovers and those with a passion for photography, making it a distinctive spot to unwind.

name: Sarnies Sourdough
summary: Sarnies Sourdough in Charoenkrung offers a delightful array of pastries and sourdough loaves made with sustainable flour. Signature bites like the cruffins and hearty salmon chowder bread bowl showcase their commitment to quality. With plans for an evening pizza menu alongside craft drinks, this bakery is set to become a neighborhood favorite.
address: 55, Sub-district, 14 Soi Charoen Krung 42/1, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Kiri Tsukemen
summary: Kiri Tsukemen specializes in tsukemen, offering freshly made noodles paired with rich dipping sauces served in a unique burning stone bowl. This compact spot allows diners to watch chefs craft their dishes right at the L-shaped counter bar. With hearty portions and a variety of flavors, it's sure to become a favorite for lunch or afterwork meals in Thonglor.
address: 64 Soi Thong Lo, Thonglor, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Kenny's
summary: Kenny's in the Ari area offers comfort food with a twist, inviting guests into its cozy two-floor space. The standout pizzas and beef burgers are complemented by an impressive craft beer selection, perfect for late-night cravings until 3am. Accessible from BTS Ari, this spot combines delicious flavors with a laid-back atmosphere that feels like home.
address: 24, 1 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Opium Spa
summary: Indulge in a luxurious pampering experience at Opium Spa with their Serenity at the Siam package. This 240-minute treatment features Himalayan salt exfoliation, a soothing steam session, and a full-body massage using premium Sodashi oils. Complete your visit with a rejuvenating French clay body mask and thermal infusion facial for ultimate relaxation.
address: The Siam 3, 2 Khao, Vachirapayabal, Khet Dusit, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10300, Thailand

name: Funky
summary: Funky brings the vibrant flavors of South America to Bangkok with its homemade arepas crafted by a Thai-Venezuelan duo. Each dish, like the classic Reina Pepiada and hearty Pelua, showcases meticulous preparation using quality ingredients. Vegan options ensure there's something for everyone, available for order via Line from 10am to 7pm daily.
address: 1, 39 Soi Sukhumvit 37, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Backroom
summary: Nestled in the bustling Sathorn district, Backroom offers a serene escape with expertly crafted cocktails and high-quality seafood sourced from across Thailand. The bar's innovative clarification technique ensures smooth sips that elevate the drinking experience. Enjoy a moment of tranquility amidst the city's chaos while indulging in delightful flavors.
address: 35/5 - 35/7, second floor, Soi Si Bamphen, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Kenny’s BKK Sukhumvit 31
summary: Kenny's BKK Sukhumvit 31 offers a welcoming atmosphere perfect for enjoying delicious food and drinks. Located in the vibrant Sukhumvit area, it serves as an ideal spot for friends and family gatherings. The inviting vibe makes it a cozy choice for any occasion.
address: 24, 1 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Beer Pradith
summary: Beer Pradith stands out in the vibrant Banthat Thong area, offering a unique selection of 24 Thai craft beers. The venue captures the spirit of the neighborhood with its blend of old-school street food and modern café culture. A must-visit for beer enthusiasts looking to explore local brews from across Thailand.

name: Chim Chim
summary: Chim Chim offers a trendy dining experience in the vibrant Pathum Wan area of Bangkok, blending local and international cuisines. The lively atmosphere is enhanced by chic decor and fresh ingredients, catering to diverse palates. With both indoor and outdoor seating, it’s an ideal spot for enjoying events and live music while exploring nearby attractions.
address: 865 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Omi Tteok
summary: Omi Tteok offers a modern twist on traditional Korean rice cakes, known as tteok, in a sleek white and wood setting near MRT Ratchadapisek. Freshly made each morning, the cafe features unique flavors like creamy injeolmi and hearty tteokbokki served with various accompaniments. Pair your treats with refreshing yuzu sorbet or sugar-free roasted corn tea for a delightful experience.
address: Next to Parking Lot, Soi Ratchadapisek 19 &, ซ. วิภาวดีรังสิต 16 แขวงรัชดาภิเษก เขตดินแดง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10400, Thailand

name: Ore
summary: Explore the vibrant culinary scene with 50 new restaurants that have emerged in Bangkok this year. From New Orleans specialties to unique ramen dishes, there's something for every foodie. Discover your next favorite dining spot and indulge in delicious homemade cuisine.
address: 11 31 Thanon Sathu Pradit, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Finalist: Com’On Bar
summary: Opened in 2023, Com’On Bar offers a unique vantage point with stunning 270-degree views from its seventh-floor location. The bar features area-themed drinks like the smoky 'Old Town' and a solid selection of craft beers on tap. Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere away from the city's business bustle while sipping expertly crafted cocktails inspired by local culture.
address: 114 Trok Salak Hin, Khwaeng Rong Muang, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin
summary: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin brings a lively atmosphere to Gaysorn Amarin, serving delicious Japanese cuisine and cocktails with a twist. Signature drinks like the O-Ren Ishi offer a refreshing blend of tropical flavors, ideal for sunset enjoyment. This new branch is perfect for those looking to indulge in great food while soaking in the vibrant vibe.
address: Gaysorn Amarin ชั้น 3 496 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Above Eleven
summary: Experience the vibrant fusion of Peruvian and Japanese cuisine at Above Eleven, a rooftop bar with stunning panoramic views of Bangkok. Sip on zesty pisco sours and indulge in dishes like ceviche and South American grilled platters while enjoying the sleek design inspired by Central Park. This fashionable venue offers a unique atmosphere with neon lights and even a bathroom boasting cityscape views.

name: Mer Made Cantina
summary: Mer Made Cantina introduces a fresh take on gourmet tinned seafood in Ladprao, challenging the perception of canned food. This charming tapas spot features locally sourced delicacies and an evolving menu that promises a vibrant community atmosphere. With its focus on quality ingredients and unique offerings like natural wine sangria sorbet, it’s a must-visit for adventurous diners.
address: 53, 50 Lat Phrao Rd, Khwaeng Chom Phon, Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10900, Thailand

name: Tokyo Beef
summary: Tokyo Beef offers a vibrant yakiniku experience in Box Space Ratchayothin, specializing in Thai beef. Guests can enjoy flavorful Australian chuck rolls and unique beef tongue sets, perfect for sharing with friends. Open from 5 PM to 11 PM Monday through Saturday, this lively restaurant is an ideal spot for meat lovers.
address: 12 Thanon Sala Daeng, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Luka Cafe
summary: Located in the vibrant Bang Rak area, Luka Cafe offers a cozy atmosphere with a delightful menu featuring hearty breakfasts and specialty coffee. The mix of contemporary and rustic decor enhances its charm, making it perfect for relaxation. With an emphasis on fresh, local ingredients and friendly service, this spot has become a favorite among both locals and tourists.
address: 29 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Klongtoey Nua, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Qraft
summary: Qraft in Ari offers a unique take on the croissant, blending Japanese ingredients into flaky pastries that have quickly gained popularity. Specialties include miso caramel and a butterfly-shaped croissant waffle with diverse flavors. While walk-ins aren't accepted due to high demand, pre-ordering ensures you won't miss out on these delectable treats.
address: Level 55, EA, Empire Tower, 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Tempered Cooperatives
summary: Tempered Cooperatives is a cacao lover's paradise in Bangkok, offering a unique blend of creative baked goods and exceptional hot chocolate. The cozy cafe features a renovated office space on Soi Ruamrudee 2, perfect for enjoying their new cheesy bacon roll alongside your morning coffee. Don't miss the signature Chocolate Dirty, a delightful hot chocolate topped with espresso.

name: Horsamut
summary: Discover the vibrant culinary scene of Bangkok with 50 exciting new restaurants that have opened this year. From New Orleans cuisine to innovative ramen specialties, there's something for every palate. Dive into this diverse selection and find your next favorite dining spot.
address: 8 Soi Tha Kham, Khwaeng Phra Borom Maha Ratchawang, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Angoon Garden
summary: Angoon Garden serves as a peaceful retreat amidst Bangkok's vibrant energy, featuring lush greenery that invites relaxation. A diverse menu showcases both local and international dishes, suited for casual meals or special gatherings. Live music and seasonal events enhance the lively atmosphere, making each visit memorable.

name: The Deck Bangkok
summary: A Balinese oasis in Bangkok, The Deck invites guests to unwind amidst greenery while enjoying a diverse menu crafted by top culinary talents. Comfort food takes center stage with creative twists, such as Makhani Macaroni and hybrid pizzas. Family and dog-friendly, this evolving spot is perfect for leisurely afternoons with wine and innovative dishes.
address: 15 Soi Sukhumvit 20, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: On Lok Yun
summary: Step back in time at On Lok Yun, a beloved breakfast spot with a rich 90-year history. The cafe offers a Thai twist on Western classics, featuring the must-try kanom pang sankaya and affordable coffee options. Ideal for early risers seeking both nostalgia and delicious flavors.
address: 72 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Wang Burapha Phirom, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Auriga at Cappella
summary: Auriga at Cappella offers a calm and sophisticated spa experience, perfect for those seeking relaxation. Attention to detail is evident in their luxurious treatments, from traditional Thai massages to the extravagant Ultimate Couple Hydrosense package. With prices ranging from B800 to B20,000, this spa caters to various preferences while ensuring quality service.

name: Verde Cafe and Restaurant
summary: Verde Cafe and Restaurant offers a cozy atmosphere on Sukhumvit Soi, perfect for casual dining. The menu features a variety of dishes available through Grab for convenient delivery. Enjoy a local gem that combines quality with accessibility.
address: Klong Ton, 61/46 Sukhumvit 26, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Duet
summary: Duet offers a refined French dining experience at The Ritz-Carlton, featuring an innovative farm-to-table menu. Guests can indulge in an eight-dish tasting set that highlights sophisticated flavors, all within a botanically-inspired setting. Enjoy stunning views of Lumphini Park while savoring culinary artistry from 6 PM to 10 PM daily.
address: 7th Floor, The Ritz-Carlton, Bangkok, 189 Thanon Witthayu, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Maison Dunand
summary: Maison Dunand offers a rustic, homey atmosphere reminiscent of French chalets, led by renowned chef Arnaud Dunand. With a Michelin star already in its first year, the menu features an exquisite eight-course experience highlighting fresh ingredients and creative flavors. A visit promises not only culinary delight but also a glimpse into the legacy of one of Bangkok's fine-dining legends.
address: 55 Sathon Soi 10, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Dip Onsen
summary: Dip Onsen features modern pools surrounded by a lush tropical garden, creating a youthful and relaxing atmosphere. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying quality time, the venue welcomes visitors daily from 8 am to 10 pm. General admission is available at a reasonable price in the Phaya Thai area.

name: Saras Veg
summary: Saras Veg captures the essence of a charming backstreet Indian diner with its colorful atmosphere and eclectic clientele. The extensive vegetarian menu offers beloved dishes like paneer dosa, all prepared with bold spices that excite the palate. Expect timely service in a cozy setting where every bite is delightfully indulgent.
address: 15 Soi Sukhumvit 20, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sushi Kuuya
summary: Sushi Kuuya offers a fresh take on traditional sushi, making waves in the culinary scene of Bangkok. New and innovative dishes are crafted to delight every palate, perfect for food enthusiasts seeking unique flavors. This vibrant spot is not just about food; it's an experience that celebrates the art of sushi-making.
address: 2F Vivre Langsuan 34/3 Soi Langsuan, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Kay’s
summary: Located on the vibrant Soi Sukhumvit 49, Kay's offers a cozy atmosphere ideal for both casual and special gatherings. A diverse menu features local and international dishes, complemented by a selection of beverages in a space adorned with modern and traditional Thai decor. Live music enhances the lively ambiance, making it a popular spot for entertainment in Bangkok.
address: 49 99 ถนน Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Frankie’s Rooftop
summary: Frankie’s Rooftop is an intimate venue known for its vibrant house music and lively parties. The European cuisine provides the perfect fuel for a night of dancing under the stars. Despite its small size, the energy and atmosphere make it a must-visit spot in Bangkok's nightlife scene.

name: Ailati Resto
summary: Ailati Resto, just steps from BTS Saphan Taksin, offers a cozy Italian dining experience with a stylish ambiance perfect for Instagram. Chef Antonio Cuppaiolo crafts fresh pasta and pizza daily, featuring standout dishes like strozzapreti with salsiccia and seafood tagliolini. With an extensive pizza menu and delightful desserts, Ailati is a must-visit for Italian cuisine lovers.
address: 1495 ถ. เจริญกรุง Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Mott 32
summary: Mott 32 stands out as a premier Chinese restaurant in Bangkok, located within the swanky Mahanakhon. The intimate speakeasy-style dining rooms offer an inviting atmosphere while serving exquisite dishes like Peking duck and unique dim sum creations. Expect a blend of traditional flavors with modern flair, making each meal a memorable experience.
address: The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon, 2nd Floor, 114 Narathiwas Road, 76th Floor, 114 ถนน นราธิวาสราชนครินทร์ แขวงสีลม เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Brewski
summary: Brewski offers a refreshing escape with its lush greenery and low-rise building views. The glass walls create a seamless connection to nature, enhancing the laid-back atmosphere of this sports bar. Open daily from 5 PM to midnight, it's the perfect spot for enjoying tasty drinks in a chill setting.
address: Radisson Blu Plaza 489 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Haru by Nana Coffee Roasters
summary: Haru by Nana Coffee Roasters embodies the essence of spring with its Japanese-inspired decor and a menu rich in flavor. The cafe offers an array of coffee, from classic brews to specialty drinks, crafted using both speed and slow bar techniques. Minimalistic interiors complement the vibrant coffee experience, making it a delightful spot for enthusiasts.
address: Makro, Sukhumvit Soi 22, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Makkha Health & Spa
summary: Makkha Health & Spa offers a serene escape with its sophisticated and detail-oriented approach to wellness. Treatments range from traditional Thai massages starting at B800 to an extravagant Ultimate Couple Hydrosense experience priced at B20,000. Indulge in high-tech skin treatments like the HydraFacial for a rejuvenating experience that combines luxury with personalized care.
address: 425 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Neighborhoo
summary: Neighborhoo offers a unique blend of modern spa design infused with Thai exotic art, creating a serene yet clinical atmosphere. The signature Nitra Raya treatment promises a rejuvenating experience in this inviting space. Open daily from 10 AM to 8 PM, it's an ideal escape for relaxation enthusiasts.

name: Scarlett Wine Bar & Restaurant
summary: Scarlett Wine Bar & Restaurant offers a delightful escape high above Silom, boasting stunning river views. Guests can indulge in expertly prepared French comfort food and chargrilled Aussie steaks, complemented by an extensive wine selection. Reservations are essential to secure a spot on the inviting terrace.
address: 188 Si Lom Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Samlor
summary: Samlor redefines the Thai gap glaem experience with an inviting industrial vibe and a playlist that keeps the energy high. Expect creative twists on traditional dishes, like minced prawn ceviche and smoked pork ribs, alongside a fluffy Thai omelette with a molten yolk. Affordable prices and a focus on local ingredients make this spot a must-visit for food lovers seeking something fresh and stylish.
address: 1076 ถ. เจริญกรุง Bangrak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Vilas
summary: Vilas offers a modern twist on traditional Thai cuisine, creatively reinterpreting age-old recipes with global ingredients. Located in Mahanakhon Cube, the restaurant showcases local craftsmanship in its design, enhancing the dining experience. The 12-course menu, led by a talented Spanish chef, promises bold flavors and inventive presentations that challenge conventional Thai dining.
address: Velaa Sindhorn Village, B1 Floor, E103, ถ. หลังสวน แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Tichuca
summary: Tichuca offers a vibrant escape with its multi-level rooftop adorned in lush jungle décor reminiscent of South Africa. Indulge in signature tiki drinks like the Pineapple Mule while enjoying the stunning sunset views. Arrive early to beat the crowds and soak in the tropical atmosphere as night falls.
address: ตึก ที วัน ชั้น 46, Soi Sukhumvit 40, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Tsukesoba Sense by No Name Noodle
summary: Tsukesoba Sense offers a unique take on the popular Japanese noodle dish, tsukesoba, in a cozy and welcoming atmosphere. The focus is on quality ingredients and authentic flavors that transport diners straight to Japan. Perfect for both casual meals and special occasions, this spot promises a delightful culinary experience.
address: Park Silom ชั้นที่ 2 ห้องเลขที่ L205 1 Si Lom Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Octave
summary: A visit to Octave offers breathtaking views of downtown Sukhumvit from its rooftop perch, making it an ideal spot for friends seeking a memorable skybar experience. The vibrant atmosphere and upbeat crowd enhance the enjoyment of crafted cocktails, albeit at a premium price. Located near Thonglor, this bar is perfect for socializing while soaking in the skyline.

name: Sarnies カフェ Sukhumvit
summary: Sarnies カフェ in Sukhumvit has quickly become a go-to spot for coffee enthusiasts and brunch lovers alike. The menu features comforting breakfast options like miso kombu eggs Benedict and sourdough pancakes, each crafted with care. Early crowds flock here for both the inviting atmosphere and the signature Sarnies brew.

name: Darlin You’re So Fine
summary: A unique cafe in Sathon, Darlin You’re So Fine emphasizes the versatility of apples with creative dishes like apple cranberry salad and caramelized apple bruschetta. Beyond apple-themed offerings, a selection of pastas and classic brunch items ensures there's something for everyone. Enjoy a cozy atmosphere perfect for both brunch and late-night dining.
address: 92 8 Thanon Naradhiwat Rajanagarindra, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Fishmonger
summary: Fishmonger brings Thai seafood into the limelight with innovative fish and chips made from local catches. Nestled in Banthat Thong’s GalieOasis, this eatery offers a casual vibe with outdoor seating surrounded by greenery. Dishes like the beer-battered barracuda burger showcase the potential of lesser-known fish in a delicious way.
address: 10, 6 Soi Ari 4, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Flamenco
summary: Flamenco stands out as a vibrant sky bar that captures the essence of nightlife with its Latin-themed decor and dynamic DJ sets. While the atmosphere leans towards the high-society crowd, the focus remains firmly on delivering an unforgettable party experience. Enjoy stunning views while dancing to electrifying beats in this sought-after venue.
address: 9th Floor, Building A, Em Quartier, แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Jones’ Salad
summary: Located in the heart of Bangkok, Jones’ Salad offers a vibrant atmosphere with a focus on fresh and healthy salads. Diners can customize their dishes from an array of toppings and dressings, making it perfect for both quick lunches and relaxed dinners. This eatery appeals to health-conscious locals and tourists seeking a nutritious alternative to traditional Thai cuisine.
address: เลขที่ 99 อาคาร โรงพยาบาลพระรามเก้า A Rama IX Rd, Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Bang Kapi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Hia Wan Khao Tom Pla
summary: Hia Wan Khao Tom Pla offers a vibrant taste of regional Thai cuisine, highlighted by fresh herbs and just the right amount of spice. The welcoming atmosphere makes it perfect for sharing dishes with friends or family, while the menu encourages adventurous eating. Whether it's a weeknight dinner or a bustling weekend meal, this restaurant keeps diners coming back for more.
address: 2 Thanon Chan, Khwaeng Thung Wat Don, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Blend Juicery And Smoothie Bar
summary: Blend Juicery and Smoothie Bar presents a vibrant health-focused experience in Bangkok, specializing in fresh juices and smoothies crafted from organic ingredients. The relaxed atmosphere invites both health enthusiasts and casual visitors to enjoy acai bowls and energy-boosting snacks. Committed to sustainability, the bar uses eco-friendly packaging while providing friendly service for a delightful outing.

name: 5am
summary: 5am specializes in soy milk, offering dark and light roast options that evoke nostalgic flavors. The dark roast features a smoky aroma, while the light roast recalls childhood memories of school mornings. Pair your drink with the patongko honey lemon for a delightful twist on honey toast topped with soft serve.
address: 212 Thanon Ban Mo, Khwaeng Wang Burapha Phirom, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Yen-Ta-Fo Ratchawat
summary: Yen-Ta-Fo Ratchawat (Dusit) offers a cozy atmosphere where flavor and conversation flow seamlessly. Weeknights attract locals, while weekends buzz with families and food enthusiasts enjoying seasonal dishes. The attentive staff provides gentle guidance, making it an ideal spot for light lunches or relaxed catch-ups.
address: 256 Maha Chai Rd, Khwaeng Samran Rat, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Look Chin Pla Mae Nuan
summary: At Look Chin Pla Mae Nuan, vibrant flavors and seasonal pastries create an engaging dining experience. Dishes are crafted with precision, ensuring lively textures that keep diners reaching for more. Coffee is treated with care, enhancing the overall enjoyment of each carefully curated meal.
address: QG7Q+X87, Phahon Yothin Road, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Kuma no Yakitori
summary: Kuma no Yakitori brings the essence of Osaka's fine dining to Bangkok with its omakase experience focused on skewered chicken. Enjoy a unique 16-course menu that showcases various parts of the chicken, from crispy skin to delicate sashimi. This accessible branch invites all diners to indulge in a culinary journey that celebrates every aspect of this beloved ingredient.
address: 1F, Rain Hill, 777 ซอย สุขุมวิท 47 แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Crystal Grill House
summary: Crystal Grill House offers a unique dining experience within soundproof glass domes, providing privacy amidst the vibrancy of Asiatique. The menu features impressive dishes like grilled octopus and wagyu ribeye, complemented by refreshing signature cocktails. This steakhouse elevates riverside dining with its creative ambiance and delicious fare, making it worth a visit for both locals and tourists alike.
address: Asiatique 76 Soi Charoen Krung 72, Khwaeng Wat Phraya Krai, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Chef Man
summary: Chef Man at Eastin Grand Sathorn offers a vibrant dining atmosphere with a focus on flavor and efficiency. Ideal for both quick coffee breaks and relaxed catch-ups, the menu features seasonal selections that cater to various tastes. With expertly crafted coffee and a welcoming vibe, it's a perfect blend of pit-stop and hangout.
address: 33 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Hua Seng Hong
summary: Hua Seng Hong in Samyan Mitrtown offers a vibrant dining experience centered around Cantonese cuisine. Enjoy thin-skinned dumplings and lacquered roasts in a setting where sharing is encouraged, making every meal feel festive. The attentive staff ensures that each tea service complements the dishes perfectly, creating a harmonious atmosphere.
address: ศูนย์การค้าสามย่านมิตรทาวน์ เลขที่ 944/1 ห้องเลขที่ B1H004A ชั้น B1 Thanon Rama IV, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Songwat Coffee Roaster
summary: Songwat Coffee Roaster transforms coffee enjoyment into an art form, resembling a futuristic lab rather than a typical cafe. Ideal for early risers and coffee enthusiasts, it serves delightful dishes like the Big Brekkie and indulgent French toast. This downtown gem combines quality brews with a playful food menu in a unique atmosphere.
address: 578 Song Wat Rd, Khwaeng Chakkrawat, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Hippo Dough
summary: Hippo Dough on Sukhumvit Soi 31 is a paradise for donut lovers, boasting over 100 unique flavors crafted with European and Thai ingredients. Indulge in decadent toppings and creative twists, from classic Nutella to deluxe strawberry peanut butter and signature Giotto dark chocolate. Milkshakes and cheesecakes on a stick complement the offerings, making it a must-visit for dessert enthusiasts.
address: Sawasdee, 245/14 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Infinity
summary: Infinity offers a rejuvenating escape with its signature Thai and aromatherapy massages. The 60-minute aroma treatment is priced at B1,300, while the 90-minute deep tissue option, designed to relieve muscle tension, costs B1,600. Experience improved energy flow and relaxation in a serene environment.
address: No, 22 ซ. สุขุมวิท 20 แขวงคลองเตย เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Je Ngor’s Kitchen
summary: Je Ngor’s Kitchen in Charoen Krung offers a vibrant dining experience with a focus on shared plates and quick turnover. Signature roasts and stir-fries shine alongside quality seafood, making it ideal for groups seeking variety. The attentive service ensures that every dish is enjoyed at its peak freshness.
address: 58 Thanon Maha Set, Khwaeng Si Phraya, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Penthouse Bar + Grill
summary: Perched on the 32nd floor of the Millennium Hilton, ThreeSixty Rooftop Bar offers breathtaking 360-degree views of the Chao Phraya River. Relax with a classic cocktail like the French 75 or Grand Cosmopolitan while enjoying the vibrant atmosphere enhanced by DJs and garden accents. This rooftop gem is perfect for sunset celebrations under the stars.
address: 34th - 36th Floor, Park Hyatt Bangkok, 88 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Baan Tepa
summary: Baan Tepa has transformed from a humble chef’s table into a vibrant urban farm and fine-dining restaurant, showcasing a unique zero-waste philosophy. The cozy setting combines vintage charm with modern decor, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. Chef Chudaree “Tam” Debhakam's innovative menu highlights local produce, making this culinary experience truly exceptional.
address: 561 Ramkhamhaeng Rd, Khwaeng Hua Mak, Khet Bang Kapi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10240, Thailand

name: Ega Luv Seafood NEW
summary: Ega Luv Seafood offers a delightful seafood menu with grilled, steamed, boiled, and baked options in a cozy setting. Morning visitors can also enjoy fusion Asian breakfasts, featuring unique dishes like khao kriap pak mor yuan and udon-style kao ji. This charming spot is perfect for seafood lovers seeking local flavors with a twist.

name: Fest
summary: Located on the ground floor of the Public House hotel, Fest features a revamped menu with enticing dishes like bacon pancakes and a folded breakfast pizza sandwich. Creative vegan options such as No-avocado toast and Tofu Scramble highlight their innovative approach to classic favorites. Open daily from morning until late night, this spot is ideal for brunch or casual meals away from Soi 31's traffic.

name: Sanan bakery
summary: Sanan Bakery offers a nostalgic taste of home with its family-recipe pastries, perfect for a quick grab before work or school. Signature items like the cone cream and the shio pan ham cheese highlight their commitment to comfort food. Due to high demand, reservations are recommended for this beloved spot.
address: 16 Thetsaban Songkhro Rd, Khwaeng Lat Yao, Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10900, Thailand

name: Let’s Relax Spa
summary: Let’s Relax Spa features a serene atmosphere enhanced by Thai-inspired design elements. Guests can indulge in a 120-minute Thai massage or a soothing aromatic hot stone treatment. Located on the 2nd floor of Park Lane Community Mall, this spa promises relaxation from 10am to midnight daily.
address: 5/2-3 Sukhumvit 31, (Soi Sawasdee), แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา Bangkok 10110, Thailand

name: Sanyod
summary: Sanyod (Charoen Krung) excels in serving Thai-Chinese dishes, particularly roast duck and egg noodles, complemented by a signature sweet-savory gravy. Known for its efficient service and quick turnover, this restaurant is perfect for groups seeking a variety of flavors without compromising on quality. Regulars appreciate the consistent quality across multiple branches, making it a reliable dining choice.
address: 89 Charat Wiang Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Simply Tomboy Bangkok
summary: Simply Tomboy Bangkok offers a welcoming atmosphere that invites everyone to relax and enjoy. With its stylish decor and vibrant energy, it's a great spot for socializing or unwinding after a long day. Experience the unique charm of this venue that embraces diversity and inclusivity.
address: 43/1 ช1 อาคารสีลม คอนโดมิเนียม ชั้นที่ 1 Surawong Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: 12 x 12
summary: Nestled in a serene soi off Thonglor, 12 x 12 offers an intimate atmosphere where music lovers gather. With rotating DJs and occasional live performances, the venue pulses with a vibrant, world-music energy. Cocktails like the smoky 'Oatsan' elevate the experience, making it feel like a cozy living room for night owls.

name: Villa Frantzén
summary: Swedish chef Björn Frantzén brings his Michelin-starred flair to Bangkok with Villa Frantzén, a stunning two-villa restaurant featuring modern Nordic cuisine infused with Asian flavors. Guests can indulge in an innovative 5-course tasting menu designed for shared experiences, complemented by unique cocktails inspired by Nordic and Asian ingredients. The lush garden setting and private dining options make it an ideal spot for memorable gatherings.
address: 7 Soi Yen Akat 3, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: T&K Seafood Rooftop Extension
summary: T&K Seafood Rooftop Extension offers a vibrant dining experience with Thai-Chinese seafood that shines in both flavor and presentation. Perfect for sharing, the menu features signature roasts and stir-fries designed to be enjoyed in a lively group setting. Quick service ensures that each dish is served at its peak, making it an ideal choice for a memorable evening out.
address: 49, 51 Phadung Dao Rd, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Gyukatsu Kyoto Katsugyu
summary: Gyukatsu Kyoto Katsugyu introduces a unique twist on the traditional tonkatsu by offering juicy medium rare beef cutlets. Located in the bustling Siam Center, this intimate eatery features high-quality cuts and a variety of condiments to customize your meal. With its limited seating and prime location, it's a must-visit for food lovers seeking a premium dining experience amidst the mall chaos.
address: EMQUARTIER 6F Helix Sky Dining 693 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Harnn Spa
summary: Harnn Spa invites relaxation in a serene setting adorned with modern Thai decor and ample natural light. Experience the Pranakorn therapy, a 60-minute traditional Thai massage that blends yoga-like movements to enhance mobility and relieve muscle tension. Additional treatments include aromatherapy, acupuncture, and reflexology.

name: Lek & Rut Seafood Annex
summary: Lek & Rut Seafood Annex in Yaowarat offers a delightful blend of Thai and Chinese seafood dishes, perfect for sharing among friends. The efficient service ensures that each dish is served at its peak freshness, making it an ideal choice for group dining. Signature roasts and stir-fries are complemented by rice and greens, highlighting the quality of ingredients used.
address: Phadung Dao Rd, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Prachak Duck Noodles
summary: Experience a century-old duck roaster lineage at Prachak Duck Noodles in Bang Rak, where vibrant Thai flavors and quick service create a lively atmosphere. Indulge in springy egg noodles paired with crunchy salads, flavorful soups, and aromatic curries that bring the essence of Thailand to your table. Perfect for sharing, this restaurant buzzes with energy during weekends as families and food enthusiasts gather to savor delicious dishes together.
address: 1415 ถ. เจริญกรุง Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Greyhound Café
summary: Greyhound Café at Siam Center offers a stylish setting with a playful Thai-international menu, perfect for mixed-taste groups. The café is ideal for both quick coffee breaks and longer catch-ups, featuring efficient service and an inviting atmosphere. With carefully crafted coffee and a selection of teas and sodas, it’s a great spot to relax or work during the day.
address: 1st floor 979 ศูนย์การค้า สยามเซ็นเตอร์, 979 ถ. พระรามที่ 1 แขวงปทุมวัน เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Piccolo Vicolo
summary: Nestled in a Ratchathewi alley, Piccolo Vicolo exudes vintage charm while offering a fresh café experience. With its concrete interiors and eclectic furniture, this spot invites coffee lovers to explore specialty brews from around the world. Don't miss the delightful lemon tart or Basque cheesecake for a perfect sweet pairing.
address: 535 31 ตรอก Rama VI Soi 17, Khwaeng Thanon Phetchaburi, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Kasnas
summary: Located in the vibrant heart of Bang Rak, Kasnas offers a unique blend of entertainment and relaxation for both locals and tourists. The venue features an eclectic atmosphere with a diverse menu that includes traditional Thai cuisine and international dishes. Regular live music events enhance the inviting ambiance, making it a popular gathering spot for friends and families alike.

name: Another Hound Café
summary: Coffee takes center stage at Another Hound Café, where craft and care create a welcoming atmosphere for both quick stops and leisurely afternoons. The café’s seasonal pastries and indulgent drinks cater to all tastes, inviting patrons to stay awhile. Soft lighting and an unhurried pace make it a perfect spot for catching up or enjoying a good book.
address: 622 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Apinara Thai Cuisine and Bar
summary: Apinara Thai Cuisine and Bar in CentralWorld offers a relaxed dining experience with a focus on seasonal flavors and shareable portions. Careful coffee preparation ensures a sweet profile without bitterness, enhancing the overall meal. The unhurried service and soft lighting create a cozy atmosphere perfect for enjoying authentic Thai dishes.
address: 4, 4/1 – 4/2, 4/4 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Laxmi Celebrating of Myanmar Food
summary: A hidden gem in Phra Khanong, Laxmi Celebrating of Myanmar Food offers authentic Myanmar dishes like mohinga noodles, available as early as 6am. Affordable breakfast options include Shan noodles and bean fried rice, perfect for a quick morning meal. For those seeking a flavorful start to the day, the breakfast mala curry promises to awaken your senses.

name: Cactus
summary: Cactus beer bar exudes a laid-back party vibe, perfect for unwinding with friends. An impressive range of international beers, from American crafts to Belgian classics, pairs well with Thai-style snacks like sai krok Isaan. Don't miss the refreshing Zeffer Crisp Green Apple Cider from New Zealand for a unique twist.
address: RJHC+887, ถนนนวมินทร์, Khwaeng Lat Phrao, Khet Lat Phrao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Baan Ying
summary: Baan Ying at Siam Paragon offers a vibrant dining experience where dishes are crafted for sharing and flavor. The menu emphasizes fresh textures and balanced spices, with a focus on comfort food that invites exploration. Warm wood and linen interiors create an inviting atmosphere perfect for leisurely conversations.
address: สยามเซ็นเตอร์ ชั้น 2 979 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Taling Pling
summary: Taling Pling at Central Embassy offers a vibrant dining experience with a focus on sharing and Thai flavors. Each dish bursts with freshness, featuring herbs and lime that enhance the overall enjoyment without overwhelming the palate. The attentive service ensures first-timers feel welcomed while enjoying a lively array of textures and tastes.
address: 25 Soi Sukhumvit 34, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Unagi Yondaime Kikukawa
summary: Unagi Yondaime Kikukawa stands out with its focus on authentic ramen specialties, perfect for food enthusiasts. The restaurant is part of a vibrant wave of new eateries that have opened in 2024, catering to diverse tastes. Discover your next favorite dish in this exciting culinary landscape.
address: The EmQuartier, 5A03, 6Fl, The HELIX SKY DINING, 693 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Stockroom
summary: Stockroom offers a minimalist vibe deep in Ratchathewi, perfect for brunch and casual conversations. Delight in the truffle cream toast and signature almond tart, both crafted with quality ingredients. This modern cafe strikes a balance between work-friendly ambiance and culinary pleasure.
address: 119 80 Soi Phetchaburi 18, Khwaeng Thanon Phetchaburi, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Nara Thai Cuisine
summary: Nara Thai Cuisine at CentralWorld offers a vibrant dining experience with an emphasis on fresh Thai flavors. Expect a well-balanced menu featuring crunchy salads, aromatic soups, smoky grilled dishes, and delightful curries, all crafted for sharing. Seasonal pastries add a touch of creativity, ensuring there's always something new to discover.
address: 4, 4/1 – 4/4, เซ็นทรัลเวิลด์ ชั้นที่ 7, 4 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Cheese and Dough
summary: Cheese and Dough offers a cozy dining experience with casual Indian bites that showcase fire and smoke mastery. Imported ingredients from India combined with local seasonal produce create authentic dishes like black truffle cream cheese naan and spicy lamb vindaloo. Enjoy a refreshing mimosa to start your meal in this upscale setting.

name: DYSF NEW
summary: DYSF NEW is a charming two-story cafe in Sathon, perfect for brunch or late-night bites. The menu features unique apple-infused dishes, like the signature iced tea with diced apples and a hearty fried chicken breakfast with kimchi pancakes. Experience a refreshing twist on comfort food in a cozy setting that emphasizes fresh ingredients.

name: Sukhothai Spa
summary: Sukhothai Spa offers a luxurious escape with indulgent packages that include deluxe accommodations and wellness treatments. Experience their signature 60-minute massage, which features a foot treatment, or elevate your stay with a bath ritual. Perfect for those seeking relaxation in an upscale setting.
address: 13/3 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Dos Burros NEW
summary: Dos Burros brings a delightful twist to Mexican cuisine in Thonglor, featuring an inviting breakfast menu that starts at 8am. Signature dishes like huevos rancheros and huevos a la malagena showcase the culinary expertise of brothers Itzco and Tlahui Calva. This new location promises to be a vibrant addition to Bangkok's dining scene.
address: Sukhumvit 36, 2d Soi 23 7, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: The Pablo Bangkok
summary: The Pablo Bangkok introduces a vibrant all-day dining experience inspired by South American flavors, situated on the bustling Asoke street. Signature dishes like the eggs benny and hearty breakfast plate highlight fresh ingredients with a kick from spicy sausage and thick bacon. Perfect for brunch lovers looking to indulge in a lively atmosphere.
address: 2 Soi Sukhumvit 25, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Blessing Shophouse
summary: Blessing Shophouse offers a unique cocktail experience with Chinese-Thai inspired drinks crafted from ingredients believed to bring good fortune. Guests are welcomed with complimentary oolong tea, setting a calming atmosphere for the evening. Open Wednesday to Sunday, this bar is perfect for those seeking something special in Asoke.
address: 6 5 Soi Phraek Samakkhi, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Bisou
summary: Bisou offers a refreshing departure from Bangkok's typical wine bars with its French-inspired sharing plates and a carefully curated wine list. The airy, modern decor features film posters and a unique oculus ceiling that enhances the dining experience. With standout dishes like celeriac truffle risotto and decadent dark chocolate souffle, this gastro wine bar promises both great meals and a vibrant atmosphere.
address: 68, Lumpini Sub-District, 9 Soi Langsuan, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: The Terrace Restaurant
summary: Savor exquisite flavors at The Terrace Restaurant in Siam Paragon, where meticulous coffee preparation enhances every dish. The inviting atmosphere transitions from neighborly weeknights to vibrant weekends filled with families and food enthusiasts. Enjoy a well-curated menu featuring pasta, mains, and delightful desserts in a setting that balances warmth and sophistication.
address: 155 Rajadamri Road, Second floor, กรุงเทพมหานคร ปทุมวัน Thailand 10330, Thailand

name: Sarnies Roastery
summary: Sarnies Roastery is set to expand its presence in Bangkok with a new location that boasts stunning pinewood interiors and lush greenery. Coffee lovers can look forward to an extensive selection of single-origin beans and unique blends, all crafted with care. The shop promises a visually appealing atmosphere perfect for capturing moments while enjoying high-quality coffee.
address: 34, 1 Soi Ton Son, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Cooling Tower
summary: Located on the rooftop of Carlton Hotel, Cooling Tower offers a serene escape from the bustling Asoke intersection below. Enjoy their celebrated happy hour featuring buy-one-get-one deals on a diverse selection of cocktails, wine, and beer. With stunning views and a lengthy drink menu, this venue is perfect for unwinding after a long day.
address: 34th floor, Carlton Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 491 Sukhumvit Road Klongtoey Nua, 491 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Bankara Ramen
summary: Hakata-style tonkotsu broth at Bankara Ramen (Thonglor) delights with its glossy collagen sheen and lively textures. The menu features thick, springy noodles paired with Thai herbs and calibrated heat for a vibrant dining experience. Weekdays offer a neighborly vibe, while weekends attract families and food enthusiasts alike.
address: The Manor 32/1 Soi Sukhumvit 39, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Ippudo Ramen
summary: Ippudo Ramen at Central Embassy offers a focused dining experience with its signature tonkotsu and efficient service. The clean, pork-forward broth is perfectly balanced, making each bowl satisfying and consistent. Counter seating allows for quick meals that brighten your day, ideal for both newcomers and ramen aficionados alike.
address: 55 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Nila
summary: Nila, located in the luxurious Amari Bangkok, showcases an exquisite tasting menu that highlights coastal Goan cuisine. Under the expertise of Chef Bharath S Bhat, guests can savor the rich flavors of seafood, coconut, and spices. This new dining experience is a must-visit for lovers of Indian fine dining in Bangkok.
address: 847 Thanon Phetchaburi, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Kurasu Thonglor
summary: Kurasu Thonglor offers a serene escape from the bustling streets of Bangkok, embodying a refreshing Kyoto-inspired atmosphere. The café features Thai-grown beans in its signature Bangkok Blend, complemented by rotating single-origin filter options. Anko Toast, with its fluffy bread and sweet red bean paste, pairs perfectly with any warm cup, making it a must-try for craft coffee lovers.
address: 1109/2 Sukhumvit road Khlong Tan Nue Sub, Districts, เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Lime by Us
summary: Lime by Us offers a refreshing twist on cocktails, focusing on fruity and approachable creations. As a sister project to the acclaimed Bar Us, it aims to impress with its vibrant menu. Nestled in the same building, this new bar is perfect for those seeking a lively atmosphere and innovative drinks.

name: Luna Club Bangkok
summary: Luna Club Bangkok delivers an electrifying late-night experience in the vibrant Asok–Nana area. With dazzling lighting and a lineup of guest DJs, it promises unforgettable themed nights that cater to a stylish crowd. Dress to impress and prepare for a lively atmosphere with table minimums on peak events.
address: 1 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Natura Cafe
summary: Natura Cafe in Bangkok provides a serene atmosphere with a menu centered on organic, health-conscious dishes. Both indoor and outdoor seating options create an inviting space for relaxation or socializing. Regular wellness events contribute to its vibrant community appeal.

name: Tokyo Neo
summary: Tokyo Neo reimagines the izakaya experience with a vibrant 80s retro vibe, featuring fun rolls and donburi bowls crafted by chef Goro Takatsu. Expect a delightful fusion of Japanese staples with Western influences, including signature dishes like crispy karaage and unique snacks. Currently offering delivery and takeaway, this eatery promises an exciting culinary adventure soon available for dine-in.
address: 14 Convent Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Ramen Tei
summary: Precision defines the experience at Ramen Tei (Sukhumvit 26), where each bowl is a harmonious blend of temperature, texture, and seasoning. Quick service ensures you can adjust your ramen to perfection with extras like garlic or chili. For newcomers, the signature tonkotsu offers an ideal introduction to the restaurant's exceptional style.
address: 593 23-24 Soi Sukhumvit 33/1, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: O’Shea’s Rooftop Bar and BBQ
summary: O’Shea’s Rooftop Bar and BBQ welcomes pub-goers with a lively atmosphere featuring local bands and affordable beers. Enjoy the spacious park bench seating while catching your favorite sports events in a vibrant setting. Perfect for those looking to unwind with friends, this venue combines great music with a laid-back vibe.
address: 595, 16-19 Soi Sukhumvit 33/1, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Long John Silver’s
summary: Long John Silver’s brings American fast food seafood to Bangkok, offering a taste of the ocean with dishes like crispy fish and chips. Signature items include the Bucket Shrimp and Chicken and Shrimp combo, perfect for those seeking a hearty meal. This new spot is an adventurous choice for Thai fans eager to try something different from their usual fare.
address: ชั้น 2, Megabangna, 38 หมู่ที่ 6 Thanon Bang Na-Trat Frontage, Tambon Bang Kaeo, Amphoe Bang Phli, Chang Wat Samut Prakan 10540, Thailand

name: Bang Bang Burgers
summary: Bang Bang Burgers on Soi 11 redefines the burger experience in Bangkok with a vibrant dive bar aesthetic and an homage to pop culture. The menu offers a range of delicious burgers, including the classic Duke and unique Chicky Chicky Bang Bang, complemented by creative side dishes. Enjoy outdoor seating and look forward to a future selection of beers as dining regulations evolve.
address: 30 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Honmono Sushi
summary: Honmono Sushi at Central Embassy offers a satisfying dining experience with its seasonal specials and comfortable seating. The signature tonkotsu is a must-try, showcasing the essence of their house style. Quick service ensures your bowl arrives hot, making it ideal for a focused meal in just thirty minutes.
address: อาคารศูนย์การค้าเซ็นทรัล แอมบาสซี ชั้น L5 ลุมพีนี Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Nicolo Bakery
summary: Chill vibes define Nicolo Bakery, a pet-friendly shophouse nestled between Ekkamai and Phra Khanong. Offering a delectable range of fresh breads and sweet treats like moist brownies and Petite Madeleines at wallet-friendly prices, this stylish space is perfect for morning relaxation. Ideal for dog walkers or anyone seeking a cozy spot to unwind, Nicolo Bakery promises a delightful experience.

name: Al Gatto Nero
summary: Al Gatto Nero is a charming trattoria that showcases the best of Italian cuisine, featuring freshly made pasta and pizzas from their own oven. The slow-cooked beef cheek, stewed in rich red wine sauce, offers a tender texture that's easy to enjoy with just a fork. This inviting space is perfect for those looking to indulge in authentic Italian flavors in Asoke.
address: Via Giudecca, 88, 30142 Venezia VE, Italy

name: Broccoli Revolution
summary: A vibrant plant-based haven in Thonglor, Broccoli Revolution serves up healthy delights like the broccoli-quinoa burger. The brick-walled ambiance creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere perfect for casual dining. Open daily from 10am to 10pm, this spot is a must-visit for those seeking nutritious options without sacrificing flavor.
address: 899 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Best Beef
summary: Best Beef (On Nut) offers a vibrant all-you-can-eat grill experience in a spacious open-air setting, perfect for sharing with friends. Regulars rave about the lively atmosphere and diverse menu featuring crunchy salads, hearty soups, and flavorful curries. Located near BTS On Nut, this restaurant attracts crowds after 7pm, making it ideal for a fun night out.
address: 1490, 2 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Loft Thai X Nakhon Spa
summary: A serene oasis awaits at Loft Thai X Nakhon Spa, where tranquility and refinement blend seamlessly. Offering a range of spa treatments, from traditional Thai massages to luxurious packages for couples, this spa caters to all relaxation needs. Open daily until midnight, it promises an indulgent escape any day of the week.
address: 682/6 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Klongtoey, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Websites
summary: The World Gourmet Festival 2025 is set to feature an impressive lineup of renowned chefs and culinary experiences. With a focus on gourmet dining, this event promises to showcase the best in gastronomy. Food enthusiasts should mark their calendars for this extraordinary celebration of culinary arts.
address: Monstar Hub, Room 310 302, ถ. รัชดาภิเษก แขวงคลองเตย เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: King Kong Buffet
summary: King Kong Buffet in Thonglor offers an all-you-can-eat yakiniku experience with a family-friendly atmosphere. The efficient service and clean smoke control enhance the enjoyment of sharing various Cantonese dishes, including dumplings and lacquered roasts. Weekend lunches come alive with rolling baskets, making it a festive dining adventure.
address: 582 23-24 ถนน สุขุมวิท แขวง คลองเตยเหนือ Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: You & I Premium Suki
summary: Individual hotpot broths make You & I Premium Suki a standout dining experience, complemented by premium add-ons like wagyu and river prawns. The vibrant Thai flavors shine through fresh herbs and balanced heat, creating an exciting culinary journey. With a spacious location at Mega Bangna, this restaurant caters to both lively weekends and cozy weeknight gatherings.
address: ชั้น 2, โซนข้างโรงหนัง 39 Thanon Bang Na-Trat Frontage, Tambon Bang Kaeo, Amphoe Bang Phli, Chang Wat Samut Prakan 10540, Thailand

name: Jiaozi JiubaPhoto:Jiaozi Jiuba
summary: Jiaozi Jiuba has transitioned from a beloved dumpling spot in Samyan to an exciting new venue at Gaysorn Amarin, offering signature dishes alongside creative cocktails. The Hutong Bay cocktail combines the sweet and sour essence of a piña colada with a unique kick from bay leaves and mala powder. Experience this vibrant atmosphere daily from 11 AM to 9 PM.
address: 4 Floor, 496 502 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: May Veggie Home
summary: This peaceful vegan haven on Ratchadaphisek Road has been delighting health-conscious diners since 2011. Specialties include regional dishes like plant-based panang curry and khao soi with tofu and mushrooms. A small selection of burgers and Japanese options also caters to diverse tastes.
address: 738 Soi Punna Withi, Khwaeng Bang Chak, Khet Phra Khanong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10260, Thailand

name: Mansion in Copenh
summary: Mansion in Copenh offers a serene escape reminiscent of mid-century Copenhagen, featuring high ceilings and chic color-block furniture. Guests can enjoy unique drinks like iced blueberry coffee and cream cheese tea while relaxing in cozy nooks or people-watching from elevated seating. The signature cheesecake, with its caramelized top and custard-like center, is a must-try for dessert lovers.
address: 13 ชั้น 3 Soi Nak Niwat 37 Yaek 1, Khwaeng Lat Phrao, Khet Lat Phrao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Shabu De Bear
summary: Shabu De Bear (Rama 9) offers a playful dining experience with cartoon-bear branding and customizable shabu-shabu options. The inviting atmosphere is perfect for groups, allowing diners to explore a variety of flavors while enjoying carefully crafted coffee. With friendly portions and attentive service, this restaurant ensures a satisfying meal without feeling heavy.
address: ชั้น B เลขที่ 9/9 ศูนย์การค้าเซ็นทรัล พระราม9 ห้องเลขที่ B04,B04T ชั้นที่ B1 Rama IX Rd, Khwaeng Huai Khwang, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Bonita Cafe and Social Club
summary: Bonita Cafe and Social Club serves as a welcoming hub for Bangkok's running community, promoting a healthy vegan lifestyle. The Studio Ghibli-inspired interiors provide a cozy atmosphere perfect for relaxation and connection with fellow health enthusiasts. Enjoy a variety of dishes, including their flavorful Japanese curry with brown rice.
address: 100 Soi Pramote (Silom Soi 26), Silom, แขวงสุริยวงศ์ Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500, Thailand

name: Iwane Goes Nature
summary: Healthy breakfasts have been a staple at Iwane Goes Nature since 2011, offering options like the hearty Farmer Set and spicy Korean noodles. Located in Asoke, this spot is perfect for those seeking a nutritious start to their day. With affordable prices and a cozy atmosphere, it's a local favorite for breakfast lovers.
address: 14 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Hummus Boutique
summary: Hummus Boutique offers a delightful all-Mediterranean, all-vegetarian experience in a cozy setting adorned with warm woods and patterned tiles. The signature chickpea dip shines with an array of toppings, including the unique Chickpeas Brulee. Open daily from 11:30 am to 9:30 pm, it's a perfect spot for health-conscious diners seeking innovative flavors.
address: NO.64 Sukhumvit 51 Klongtan Nua Sub-district, แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Ssamthing Together
summary: Ssamthing Together in Ekkamai offers a refreshing take on modern Korean cuisine, moving beyond the typical BBQ experience. The atmosphere is lively yet relaxed, perfect for both quick coffee stops and leisurely meals with friends or family. With an emphasis on quality ingredients and careful preparation, each dish invites diners to savor the flavors without overwhelming them.
address: 999 3 ชั้นที่ 1 Rama IX Rd, Khwaeng Suan Luang, Khet Suan Luang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10250, Thailand

name: Punjab Sweets
summary: Discover a delightful breakfast at Punjab Sweets, located in Phahurat. Indulge in crispy paneer dosa and rich barfi bites, perfectly paired with freshly brewed chai tea. This Indian coffee shop promises a unique start to your day with its tempting array of sweet treats.

name: Joy Dining Room
summary: Joy Dining Room offers a blend of grocery and dining experiences in a light, airy space adorned with soothing art. While some dishes like the firefly squid on linguine shine, others fall short of expectations, leaving mixed impressions overall. A well-curated wine list complements the inviting atmosphere, making it suitable for casual meetings or relaxed meals.
