address: 18 Soi Attha Kawi 1, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Japan-ish
summary: Japan-ish offers a unique rooftop experience in Bangkok, combining Spanish and izakaya influences. Under the guidance of Chef Jesus Pascual from the acclaimed Michelin-starred restaurant Arzak, the menu features robata grilling and fresh sushi. This spot promises vibrant events and delicious large sharing plates for an enjoyable night out.
address: 155 23-24 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: JinSeng Korean Restaurant
summary: JinSeng Korean Restaurant offers a cozy K-BBQ experience with charcoal grills and an array of generous banchan. The relaxed atmosphere encourages diners to savor each dish, from crunchy salads to flavorful curries. Coffee is brewed with care, ensuring a sweet finish without bitterness in the warm, acoustically-friendly setting.
address: 13 สุขุมวิทซอย15 โรงแรมแมนฮัตตั้น ชั้น1 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rolling Ribs Brew Bar and BBQ
summary: Rolling Ribs Brew Bar and BBQ offers a unique Memphis-style barbecue experience right in Bangkok. Enjoy a cozy yet vibrant atmosphere, with both indoor and alfresco seating, while indulging in their All Star Combo Platter featuring an array of smoked meats. This casual smokehouse combines street food vibes with the comforts of a five-star hotel, making it a must-visit for barbecue lovers.

name: Cielo Sky Bar & Restaurant
summary: Cielo Sky Bar & Restaurant offers a vibrant blend of tapas and tiki vibes atop EmQuartier, featuring tropical decor and Instagram-worthy spots. This downtown beach club ambiance invites guests to unwind in style while enjoying sunset views. Open daily from 5 PM to 1 AM, it's the perfect spot for evening relaxation or socializing with friends.
address: 1595/ 500 Sukhumvit Rd, พระโขนงเหนือ วัฒนา Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Two Hands Coffee
summary: Two Hands Coffee is a stylish new addition to Sathorn, featuring a striking blue brick facade that invites curiosity. Inside, the minimalist design complements expertly brewed Thai-Brazil medium roast and Sirinya Amarone medium-light roast coffees. This cafe is quickly becoming a go-to spot for coffee aficionados in the area.
address: 190 ซอย พิพัฒน์2 Thanon Naradhiwat Rajanagarindra, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Besides Umi
summary: Besides Umi offers a refreshing take on omakase, perfect for unwinding after work. Small plates like binjin tomato in dashi jelly and charcoal grilled bigfin reef squid complement an impressive sushi selection. Enjoy a variety of individual dishes or sharing platters in a relaxed atmosphere.
address: 87 Lang Suan Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: The Tongkeungui — Late Night
summary: Late-night cravings find their match at The Tongkeungui, where marinated short ribs and cold noodles take center stage. A blend of Cantonese flavors shines through with thin-skinned dumplings and lacquered roasts, all served with attentive tea service. The ambiance fosters easy conversations, making it a perfect spot for both festive weekends and composed weekdays.
address: 218/8 Siam Square Soi 1, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Lamaya Bangkok
summary: Perched on the 11th floor, Lamaya Bangkok offers a stunning 360-degree view of the city skyline. Enjoy an extended happy hour with drinks that change daily, making each visit unique. This rooftop bar is perfect for unwinding while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere of Bangkok.
address: 89, Floor 30, Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit, 8 ซ.สุขุมวิท 24 แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Amaris Cocktail Bar
summary: Amaris Cocktail Bar, a fresh addition to Bangkok's vibrant nightlife, brings a fruitier twist to cocktails in a stylish setting. Recently recognized as Best Cocktail Bar at the BAD Awards 2024, it complements its sister venue with an approachable drink menu that aims to impress. Guests can expect an inviting atmosphere perfect for both casual outings and special occasions.
address: 144/1 Pridi Banomyong 31 Alley, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mapo Galbi
summary: Mapo Galbi in Sukhumvit 31 offers a vibrant dining experience with its tabletop grills featuring spicy marinades and refreshing kimchi stews. Customers appreciate the efficient service and relaxed atmosphere, making it ideal for both quick meals and casual catch-ups. The thoughtful coffee selection enhances the overall experience, showcasing sweet notes without bitterness.
address: 71 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Lloyd’s ClubPhoto: Lloyd’s Club
summary: Lloyd’s Club offers an exclusive atmosphere within the Metropole Bangkok, featuring a cozy open bar on the first level. Seasonal cocktails and off-menu classics are complemented by delicious nibbles, creating a vibrant yet intimate experience. The second floor boasts private chambers ideal for personalized gatherings, making it perfect for special occasions.
address: Quant Building, Level 6, Suite. 23, Sukhumvit 25, Deang Prasert, แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Tribe
summary: Tribe Sky Beach Club offers a unique tropical escape with stunning skyline views and a vibrant atmosphere. Guests can indulge in day parties or relax by the expansive pool, complete with day beds and a swim-up bar. Swimwear and towels are provided for those who forget their suits, making it an effortless getaway in Bangkok.

name: ThreeSixty Rooftop Bar
summary: Experience a fusion of Peruvian and Japanese cuisine at ThreeSixty Rooftop Bar, where stunning sunset views complement innovative cocktails. The stylish design, inspired by Central Park, features lush artificial grass and vibrant neon lights. Signature dishes like ceviche and grilled platters make this a must-visit for food lovers seeking a unique dining experience in Bangkok.
address: 123 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Ton Sai, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Seoulchon
summary: Seoulchon (Saphan Khwai) offers a vibrant K-street food experience with cheesy tteokbokki and crispy fried chicken. The neon-trimmed decor complements the casual vibe, providing a welcoming atmosphere where first-timers receive helpful service. Regulars enjoy a well-curated selection of dishes that balance flavors and textures, ensuring each visit feels fresh yet familiar.
address: 126 49 ถ. วัชรพล ท่าแร้ง Khet Bang Khen, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10220, Thailand

name: Vanilla Sky Rooftop
summary: Vanilla Sky Rooftop offers a stylish sky bar experience with a relaxed vibe, illuminated by colorful LED lights. The cocktail menu shines with unique gin and tonic flavors like peppermint and passionfruit, making it a perfect spot for adventurous drinkers. Don't miss the nearby Mojjo bar for rum cocktails in a vibrant Cuban setting.
address: 35th Floor SKYVIEW Hotel Bangkok 12 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Tsu Na Gu
summary: Tsu Na Gu offers a unique ramen experience in Ekkamai with only eight seats and a daily limit of 35 bowls. The rich tonkotsu broth pairs beautifully with melt-in-your-mouth char-siu from Kagoshima, making their special bowl a must-try. A cozy spot for ramen lovers seeking high-quality flavors in an intimate setting.
address: 300 Sukhumvit 42 Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Okonomi
summary: Okonomi, a Brooklyn-born gem on Sukhumvit Soi 38, features a minimalist design and a serene atmosphere. The menu centers around ichiju sansai, offering a balanced meal of one soup and three dishes curated by chef David Del Pilar Potes. Embrace the cashless experience while enjoying this unique dining concept in a charming mint-green house.
address: 33/1 Soi Santi Suk, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Klongtoey, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Bonchon
summary: Bonchon (IconSiam) offers a vibrant dining experience where Thai flavors meet attentive service. The inviting atmosphere encourages guests to linger over expertly brewed coffee and flavorful dishes infused with herbs and lime. A perfect spot for both quick meals and relaxed hangouts, each visit promises a delightful journey of taste.
address: ห้องเลขที่ 604 ชั้น 6 เลขที่ 299 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Ton Sai, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Wallflowers Upstairs
summary: Ascend to a hidden rooftop oasis adorned with hanging plants and fairy lights at Wallflowers Upstairs. Delight in international cuisine paired with creative Garden of Eden-themed cocktails in a rustic setting. Open Thursday to Sunday, this bar offers a magical escape from the city below.
address: 37 39-41 Soi Ram Maitri, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Yankii Robatayaki and Bar
summary: Yankii Robatayaki and Bar offers a lively fireside dining experience where guests can grill their own ingredients alongside a full bar. The vibrant atmosphere, inspired by 50s Dagashi shops, complements the deliciously crafted Japanese dishes and signature cocktails. While prices lean towards the higher side, the unique combination of drinks and grilled bites makes it an enticing spot for casual dining or after-work drinks.
address: 12 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Red Lobster
summary: Red Lobster brings a taste of Americana to Bangkok with its classic seafood dishes and signature Cheddar Bay Biscuits. Enjoy big plates of lobster and seafood, including the luxurious Signature Feast that features multiple delicacies. Located in the Queen Sirikit Convention, this spot promises a hearty dining experience for seafood lovers.
address: ยูนิตเลขที่ GM02, GMV04 ชั้น GM ศูนย์การค้า EmSphere, เลขที่ 628 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: L’Oliva Ristorante & Pizzeria
summary: L’Oliva Ristorante & Pizzeria offers a taste of Abruzzo with its wood-oven pizzas and olive oil-forward dishes. The garden patio seating creates a cozy atmosphere, perfect for savoring seasonal picks without pressure. Enjoy conversations in a warm, tactile setting that invites relaxation and comfort.
address: Soi 36 Subsoi 2, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Jardin Du Boeuf
summary: Jardin Du Boeuf offers a fresh take on steak dining in Rama 9, focusing on ethically sourced ingredients and a vibrant atmosphere. Chef Don Sujith's menu features dry-aged beef from happy cattle and unique starters like Burnt Leeks cooked over an open flame. With spacious seating and a lively vibe, it's the perfect spot for friends to enjoy quality food and drink together.
address: 22 Thanon Ratchadaphisek, Khwaeng Huai Khwang, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Kamakiri Udon
summary: Kamakiri Udon stands out in Bangkok's culinary scene by catering specifically to udon enthusiasts with fresh noodles from Fukuoka. During lunch, savor their exclusive noodle dishes, while evenings transform the ambiance into a lively izakaya. Don't miss the Mentai Tororo Egg, a unique udon bowl that showcases mentaiko and tororo yam topped with a fresh egg.
address: S102, Live Work Asia, 31 Sukhumvit 26, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Ang Yi
summary: Celebrate milestones and catch up with friends at one of Bangkok's hottest nightlife spots. Ang Yi offers a vibrant atmosphere perfect for partying through the rest of 2024 in style. Discover the city's lively scene and make unforgettable memories together.
address: 82 Thanon Phat Sai, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Tyler Juice Directory
summary: Located in the heart of Bangkok, Tyler Juice Directory offers a vibrant atmosphere for health-conscious visitors. The extensive menu features freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, and health shots made from organic ingredients. With knowledgeable staff ready to assist, this juice bar is a refreshing oasis amidst the city's hustle.
address: 2, 10 Soi Suk Chai, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Klong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Ciao Pizza
summary: Ciao Pizza (Ari) offers a warm, family-friendly atmosphere with expertly crafted pizzas featuring light leavening and balanced toppings. The inviting decor enhances conversation, making it an ideal spot for relaxed dining. Seasonal recommendations from staff keep the experience refreshing and grounded without feeling heavy.
address: The Crystal Veranda, 2ndFloor Pradit Manutham Rd, Khwaeng Lat Phrao, Khet Lat Phrao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Pala Pizza Romana
summary: Dine at Pala Pizza Romana while enjoying stunning skyline views as the sun sets over Bangkok. The menu features fresh, citrusy cocktails and dishes that enhance the vibrant atmosphere. Smart-casual attire is recommended, making it a perfect spot for a stylish evening out.
address: Room 1 BTS/MRT Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rough & Round
summary: Rough & Round stands out in Bangkok's coffee scene with its minimalist design and community-focused ethos. The space, adorned with light wood and soft fabrics, creates a welcoming atmosphere for coffee lovers to connect. Enjoy single-origin brews from Amsterdam's Dak Coffee Roasters served in exclusive cups, making every visit a thoughtful experience.
address: Mock Address, Bangkok, Thailand

name: Mivana Organic Forest Coffee
summary: Mivana Organic Forest Coffee offers a serene escape in Bangkok, surrounded by lush greenery. Guests can indulge in organic coffee blends and healthy snacks while enjoying the café's natural decor. This eco-friendly venue is perfect for coffee lovers seeking a tranquil retreat from the city's hustle.
address: เลขที่ 1 พรีเมียร์คอร์เปอเรทปาร์ค Soi Premier 2, Khwaeng Nong Bon, Khet Prawet, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10250, Thailand

name: Il Bolognese
summary: Il Bolognese (Sathorn) offers a delightful experience with hand-rolled pasta and Emilia-Romagna classics in a cozy, brick-lined dining room. The menu features thoughtfully crafted dishes that emphasize comfort without excess, making each meal feel satisfying yet light. A well-curated wine cellar complements the food, providing options for every palate without overwhelming choices.
address: 139/3 ถนนสาทรใต้ ซอย 7 Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Medici Kitchen & Bar — Trattoria Night
summary: Experience an intimate evening at Medici Kitchen & Bar, where live performances enhance the moody ambiance. Delight in Tuscan-inspired comfort dishes crafted with restraint and served with polished hotel-level service. The warm atmosphere invites relaxed conversation, making it perfect for a memorable dining experience.
address: 55/555 โรงแรมมิวส์ กรุงเทพฯ 55, 555 Lang Suan Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Clutch Bar
summary: Clutch Bar transforms an old warehouse into a nostalgic haven filled with eclectic decor and vintage sounds. The atmosphere is rich with basslines and features antique furniture that invites you to relax and enjoy a cocktail. Step into this unique space for an unforgettable evening steeped in retro charm.

name: Rintaro
summary: Rintaro (Ari) offers a delightful selection of seasonal Japanese gelato with 18 unique flavors that change daily. Ingredients sourced from local farmers create enticing options like Chumphon cocoa with caramel nuts and Chiang Rai passion fruit. With affordable prices and a cozy atmosphere, this gelateria is perfect for sweet lovers looking to indulge in something special.
address: ซอยสายลม ซอย พหลโยธิน 8 Khwaeng Samsen Nai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Giglio Trattoria Fiorentina
summary: Giglio Trattoria Fiorentina offers a vibrant twist on Tuscan cuisine, featuring the standout bistecca alla fiorentina. The compact, neighborly space encourages sharing and experimentation with Thai-inspired flavors that tantalize the palate. With attentive service guiding your culinary journey, each dish bursts with freshness and warmth, making for an engaging dining experience.
address: 149 Sathon Soi 12, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Blaq Lyte
summary: Blaq Lyte captivates with its bold fusion of neon lights and industrial design, creating an electrifying atmosphere for electronic dance music lovers. The venue hosts local and international DJs, ensuring high-energy sets that keep the dancefloor alive. With two distinct rooms, patrons can enjoy a powerful sound experience in both a lively main space and an intimate back room.

name: BaanBan Cafe
summary: BaanBan Cafe in Siam Square One serves innovative Chinese pastries that have gained a loyal following. Signature items include their unique 'lava' pastries and dessert drinks that combine tea with khanom pia ice cream. A delightful treat for those seeking a sweet escape, this cafe promises an exciting twist on traditional flavors.
address: 340 ซ. จุฬาลงกรณ์ 1 Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: 12x12
summary: Nestled in the backstreets of Ekkamai, 12x12 is a micro-club that prioritizes intimate vibes and quality selectors over flashy spectacles. The warm analog sound and diverse music selection create a house-party atmosphere, perfect for vinyl enthusiasts and underground dancers alike. With a small capacity by design, each night feels personal, making it a go-to spot for those seeking an authentic experience away from mainstream EDM.
address: 810, 22 Soi Thara Rom 2, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Via Emilia
summary: Via Emilia offers an authentic taste of Romagna, featuring dishes like piadina and ragù in a relaxed atmosphere. With attentive staff guiding diners toward seasonal selections, each meal feels effortless and satisfying. The focus on restraint in flavors ensures comfort without heaviness, making it a delightful dining experience.
address: 1040 Soi Naradhiwas Rajanagarindra 17, Lane 5, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Enoteca Italiana
summary: Enoteca Italiana offers an intimate dining experience with expertly crafted tasting menus in a warm and inviting cellar. The restaurant's atmosphere encourages leisurely conversation, enhanced by knowledgeable pairing advice and a focus on restraint in its dishes. A perfect spot for those seeking comfort food that delights without overwhelming, making it a memorable culinary retreat.
address: 39 ถนน สุขุมวิท Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Cuckoo & Friends
summary: Cuckoo & Friends in Ekkamai offers a charming escape with its retro decor and warm lighting. Guests can relish home-cooked Thai dishes and quality coffee while enjoying slow conversations in a cozy setting. This inviting café feels like a friend’s living room, perfect for unwinding and connecting.
address: 34 ห้อง 15, 16A Thanon Ekkamai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Anju Korean Rooftop Bar
summary: Bangkok's first Korean rooftop bar, Anju offers breathtaking panoramic views from the 31st floor of the Sindhorn Midtown Hotel. K-pop music sets a lively atmosphere while guests enjoy comfort foods like cheese tteobokki and shrimp ramyun. Unique cocktails crafted with Korean spirits complement the experience perfectly, making it a must-visit for food and drink enthusiasts.
address: 68 Soi Langsuan, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Appia
summary: Roman-style porchetta and expertly crafted pastas shine in a lively, cozy setting at Appia. This restaurant balances traditional Italian flavors with a vibrant Thai twist, making every dish an exciting experience. Friendly service ensures first-timers feel welcome while sharing plates encourages tasting a variety of delightful dishes.
address: 20/4 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Klongton Nua Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Kaizen Coffee Co.
summary: Kaizen Coffee Co. (Ari) embraces coffee as an art form, showcasing sweet extractions in a relaxed atmosphere. The menu features vibrant Thai dishes perfect for sharing, with a focus on fresh herbs and balanced spice levels. Weekends buzz with families and food enthusiasts, making it a lively spot to explore diverse flavors together.
address: 55/1 Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Dos Burros
summary: Dos Burros brings a vibrant Mexican breakfast experience to the Southside of Thonglor, featuring dishes like huevos rancheros and huevos a la malagena. Open at 8am, this spot complements its offerings with fresh coffee and orange juice. The culinary legacy of brothers Itzco and Tlahui Calva shines through in every bite.
address: Sukhumvit 36, 2d Soi 23 7, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: The Key Room No.72
summary: Nestled in the Ari district, The Key Room No.72 combines a listening bar atmosphere with a cocktail den vibe. Dim lights and plush booths create an intimate setting while the drink menu features unique Thai-inspired cocktails alongside classics. With vinyl sets and attentive service, it's an ideal spot for a relaxed evening or pre-dinner drinks.
address: 19/2 Soi Ari 4 Nua, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Tang Contemporary Art
summary: Tang Contemporary Art in Bangkok showcases dynamic exhibitions by prominent Asian and international artists. Known for its critical projects and collaborations, the gallery offers a vibrant space that connects visitors to other art venues and riverside dining. Expect rotating presentations that align with the broader River City schedule.
address: Room. 201 – 206, 2nd floor, River City Bangkok, 23 ซอย เจริญกรุง 24 แขวงตลาดน้อย เขตสัมพันธวงศ์ กรุงเทพมหานคร 10100, Thailand

name: Omotesando Koffee
summary: Omotesando Koffee (EmQuartier) elevates coffee to an art form, showcasing meticulous brewing techniques that highlight sweetness without bitterness. Seasonal pastries complement the menu, enticing regulars with both staples and unique specials. Ideal for a quick caffeine fix or a leisurely read, the inviting atmosphere encourages guests to linger and savor their experience.
address: 695 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Lost in Thaislation
summary: Chinatown's Lost in Thaislation reimagines Thai flavors through innovative cocktails that blend nostalgia with modernity. A vibrant mix of neon and vintage decor sets the stage for intimate gatherings, making it a whimsical stop on your Soi Nana adventure. Expect expertly crafted drinks that balance sweetness and acidity, perfect for balmy nights.
address: 1045 1 ถนน สุขุมวิท BTS Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Take Eat Easy NEW
summary: A backyard-style eatery in Yenakart, Take Eat Easy offers all-day dining with a focus on Northern Californian cuisine. Breakfast options include a quick set with eggs and coffee for B200 or a hearty Full Breakfast for B450. Tim Butler's latest venture promises a cozy atmosphere and satisfying meals any time of day.

name: The Brass & Cigar Lounge
summary: Tucked beside the French Sathorn restaurant, The Brass & Cigar Lounge offers a stylish art nouveau ambiance. A unique drink menu reflects seasonal inspirations, featuring gin-based cocktails for spring and warm vodka absinthe concoctions for winter. This bar provides a cozy yet sophisticated atmosphere, perfect for those seeking an elegant evening out.
address: Phiphat 2, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Feaw
summary: Feaw, located within the Racquet Club, caters to both fitness enthusiasts and food lovers alike. The menu features comforting street food like crispy deep-fried pork wonton and kaprao topped with Aussie beef. This community dining spot is perfect for a post-workout meal in Thonglor.
address: 5, อาคารคิว ห้องเลขที่ อาร์คิว7007, Soi Sukhumvit 49/9, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: % Arabica
summary: % Arabica at Siam Paragon offers a crafted coffee experience with sweet extractions and a relaxed atmosphere. Ideal for both quick stops and leisurely afternoons, it features a cozy environment perfect for light lunches or catching up over a laptop. Non-coffee drinkers can also indulge in an array of teas and sodas, ensuring there's something for everyone.
address: Floor G, Siam Discovery, 989 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Starbucks Reserve Chao Phraya Riverfront
summary: Coffee is treated as an art form at Starbucks Reserve Chao Phraya Riverfront, where each cup is crafted with precision for a sweet, unbitterness experience. The inviting atmosphere encourages both quick visits and leisurely afternoons spent with laptops or friends. Seasonal pastries add a delightful twist, making it an ideal spot for coffee enthusiasts and casual diners alike.
address: ชั้นที่ 7 299 ICONSIAM, Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Ton Sai, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Potong
summary: Amid the vibrant chaos of Sampeng, Potong offers an innovative 20-course dinner that reimagines Thai-Chinese cuisine. Each dish is a sensory journey, from whimsical presentations like the orange tree dessert to expertly crafted cocktails in a unique opium bar setting. A carefully curated wine selection complements the culinary adventure, making every visit a reason to return.
address: 422 Soi Wanit 1, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: The Pablo NEW
summary: Breakfast enthusiasts will find delight at The Pablo NEW, where a diverse range of morning bites awaits. From hidden gems serving Myanmar snacks to American diners featuring PB&J milkshakes, this spot has something for everyone. Early risers can also enjoy options available before 8am.
address: 2 Soi Sukhumvit 25, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Honmono Sushi
summary: Honmono Sushi stands out in Bangkok for its refined approach to sushi and sashimi, offering a wide selection from otoro to ankimo. The ambiance caters to both families and solo diners, with comfortable seating at tables or the sushi counter. Strong value lunch sets make it a reliable choice for quality dining.
address: บริษัท ฮอนโมโน กรุ๊ป จำกัด สำนักงานใหญ่, 19 Soi Luean Oranop, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Last Call Bar
summary: Last Call Bar redefines classic cocktails with a focus on quality and simplicity. Renowned mixologist Vipop Jinaphan crafts customized drinks from a curated selection of beer, champagne, and sake. This intimate venue invites guests to enjoy expertly made beverages in a cozy atmosphere.
address: 413 10-12 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Na Aroon
summary: Na Aroon offers a serene dining experience within the elegant confines of Ariyasom Villa hotel, featuring tall windows and dark teak accents. The restaurant specializes in vegetarian Thai cuisine, with a standout tom yum hed made from fresh mushrooms. Enjoy a peaceful meal in this charming setting, where seafood is the only non-vegetarian option.
address: 65 สุขุมวิท ซ. 1 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Waki Waki
summary: Waki Waki offers a unique vegan sushi experience in Bangkok, handcrafting creative rolls with premium plant-based ingredients. Diners can enjoy both vegetarian and vegan options at an attractive sushi bar with limited seating. The innovative flavors and textures make it a must-visit for sushi lovers seeking something different.
address: 46/1 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: After You Dessert Café
summary: After You Dessert Café at Siam Square One is a haven for dessert lovers, famous for its Shibuya Honey Toast that balances crisp edges with a soft center. The café's atmosphere transitions from an efficient morning stop to a cozy afternoon retreat, perfect for light lunches or catching up over coffee. Seasonal menus and expertly crafted beverages ensure there's always something new to try, appealing to both coffee aficionados and non-coffee drinkers alike.
address: 1st floor Siam Center Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Tulum Sky Bar
summary: Cielo Sky Bar offers a unique cocktail experience just minutes from Phra Khanong BTS station. The innovative menu draws inspiration from six atmospheric levels, creating distinct flavor profiles. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere at one of the highest bars along the Sukhumvit line.
address: 559 Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Unbirthday Cafe
summary: Unbirthday Cafe in Phrom Phong invites guests to indulge in meticulously crafted minimalist desserts. With a philosophy that celebrates cake any day, the warm ambiance and thoughtful presentation create a refined experience. Perfect for those seeking a cozy spot to enjoy everyday treats without the need for a special occasion.

name: Cocoa XO
summary: Cocoa XO offers a unique experience with an all-you-can-eat chocolate buffet paired with fine cognac. Nestled between two other rooftop bars, it provides a delightful opportunity to enjoy breathtaking views and a refreshing breeze. The circular seating arrangement ensures that every patron can savor the ambiance from any spot.
address: 999, 99 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10300, Thailand

name: Cheevit Cheeva
summary: Cheevit Cheeva in Thonglor offers a delightful dessert experience focused on texture and shareable portions. The tea service complements each dish, creating a comfortable atmosphere for easy conversation. Weekend lunches are festive with an array of treats, while weekdays maintain a composed efficiency.
address: ชั้นที่ 1, ล็อต ss1001, อาคาร 1, สยามสแควร์ 388, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Little Giant
summary: Nestled near Victory Monument, Little Giant offers a serene escape from the bustling city outside. The cafe specializes in two signature coffee blends from Port Coffee, brewed with meticulous care, while trays of cakes fill the air with inviting aromas. Ideal for those seeking a moment of calm, it’s a perfect spot to enjoy a warm cup and watch the world go by.

name: Escape
summary: Escape offers a vibrant fusion of a tapas and tiki bar, perfectly embodying its 'downtown beach club' theme. The venue is adorned with tropical plants and playful flamingo decor, creating an Instagram-worthy atmosphere. Open daily from 5pm to 1am, it's an ideal spot for evening relaxation and socializing.
address: 693-695 5th Floor, Building B, EmQuartier Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Red Sky
summary: Bangkok's nightlife shines at Red Sky, a top-rated rooftop bar known for its vibrant atmosphere and diverse weekly parties. Guests can indulge in delicious food and expertly crafted drinks while enjoying stunning city views. The venue continues to innovate, making it a must-visit for both locals and travelers alike.
address: 999, 99 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Scenema Café
summary: Discover Scenema Café in Samut Prakan, a nostalgic spot that celebrates the charm of old cinemas with its vintage decor. Indulge in unique drinks like popcorn lattes and savory bites inspired by movie snacks, all served in a whimsical setting. Capture memories at the photo booth or enjoy delivery via Lineman for a taste of cinematic fun at home.
address: 34/12 Tambon Bang Pla, Amphoe Bang Phli, Chang Wat Samut Prakan 10540, Thailand

name: Patchworks BKK
summary: Patchworks BKK offers an exquisite blend of brutalist architecture and refined French patisserie, creating a striking visual and culinary experience. Seasonal desserts showcase technical finesse with premium ingredients, while an all-day brunch menu adds accessibility to its polished offerings. Coffee lovers will appreciate the diverse roasts and single-origin options available throughout the year.

name: Piccolo Vicolo at Wang Burapha
summary: Nestled along Khlong Ong Ang, Piccolo Vicolo offers a serene escape with its blend of contemporary design and lush greenery. The coffee bar serves specialty brews and light brunch options, perfect for leisurely afternoons. With various cozy seating areas and a private suite above, this spot invites both locals and travelers to unwind in a charming atmosphere.
address: 775 Maha Chai Rd, Khwaeng Wang Burapha Phirom, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Coffee Room Yaowarat
summary: Coffee Room Yaowarat offers a serene escape with its soft white interiors and the gentle hum of on-site roasting. Specialty coffees range from affordable americanos to vibrant Ethiopian pours, making it a delightful spot for both enthusiasts and casual drinkers. The upstairs co-working space doubles as an event venue, adding versatility to this hidden gem in Yaowarat.

name: Mont Nom Sod
summary: Mont Nom Sod at MBK Center offers a delightful dessert experience with shareable portions that encourage sampling. The bright and cheerful atmosphere makes it an inviting stop after dinner, while the playful menu features seasonal twists on nostalgic favorites. Desserts here balance texture and flavor, ensuring each visit is as enjoyable as the last.
address: 444 Phaya Thai Rd, Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Thong Yoy Café
summary: Thong Yoy Café at ICONSIAM celebrates coffee as an art form, offering a relaxed atmosphere perfect for sharing meals. Unhurried service ensures that each dish is paired thoughtfully with tea, enhancing the dining experience. Weekend lunches bring a festive spirit, while weekdays offer a more composed setting for efficient enjoyment.
address: 6 Floor ICONSIAM, 299 Charoen Nakhon Soi 5 Khwaeng Khlong Ton Sai, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Edspaze Cafe
summary: Edspaze Cafe embodies modern minimalism with its clean lines and whitewashed walls, creating a serene atmosphere for relaxation or productivity. The café takes coffee seriously, offering meticulously brewed single-origin drinks alongside a must-try Melted Cheesecake that took years to perfect. Ideal for both casual visits or focused work sessions, this spot is sure to impress any coffee lover.

name: Take Eat Easy
summary: Take Eat Easy is a sustainable brunch spot that emphasizes local and organic ingredients, with eggs from their own farm and vegetables grown in-house. The menu features unique dishes like organic Turkish Eggs served with homemade yogurt and cheese. Enjoy a guilt-free meal while contributing to a lower carbon footprint.
address: 19 Thanon Yen Akat, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Vertigo and Moon Bar
summary: Experience breathtaking 360-degree views of Bangkok from the legendary Moon Bar, perched atop the Banyan Tree Hotel. This iconic rooftop venue offers a unique perspective of the city's sparkling lights, making it a must-visit despite its touristy reputation. While the prices may reflect its prime location, the stunning vistas are hard to resist for any traveler.
address: 21/100 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Sirocco
summary: Sirocco, perched on the 63rd floor of State Tower, offers breathtaking skyline views along with a Mediterranean-inspired seafood menu. The terrace is perfect for golden hour, where fresh cocktails complement the vibrant atmosphere. Smart-casual attire enhances the experience as flavors and visuals beautifully align against Bangkok's neon backdrop.
address: 64th Floor, State Tower Bangkok, 1055 Si Lom Rd, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Samsara Cafe & Meal
summary: Samsara Cafe & Meal offers a hidden riverside retreat where locals unwind. The wooden deck extends over the water, providing an idyllic setting for sunset views while enjoying a diverse menu of Thai comfort food and craft beers. It's an ideal spot for a relaxed evening with friends or family.

name: BEAMCUBE
summary: High above the city, BEAMCUBE offers a sophisticated escape with stunning views and curated beats. Its elegant interiors create a refined atmosphere perfect for enjoying crafted drinks while soaking in the ambiance. As the night deepens, this venue transforms into a vibrant space that pulses with energy.

name: TEP BAR
summary: Immerse in the vibrant ambiance of TEP BAR, a unique Thai cultural bar in Yaowarat featuring live traditional music. Sip expertly crafted cocktails made with local spirits like Mekhong and Phraya rum, infused with herbs and fruits that celebrate Thailand's culinary heritage. The warm wooden decor and nightly performances create a captivating blend of entertainment and relaxation.
address: 69 ซ. นานา Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Blue Sky
summary: Blue Sky at Centara Grand offers a remarkable dining experience with stunning skyline views that complement each dish. The kitchen expertly times courses, ensuring flavors are as vibrant as the surroundings. Enjoy fresh, citrusy cocktails in a smart-casual setting that enhances both taste and atmosphere.
address: 1695 Centara Grand at Central plaza, Ladprao, 24 Fl, แขวงจตุจักร เขตจตุจักร กรุงเทพมหานคร 10900, Thailand

name: Côte by Mauro Colagreco
summary: Côte by Mauro Colagreco offers a sophisticated dining experience with Mediterranean-inspired dishes crafted by chef Davide Garavaglia. The restaurant's elegant design features floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing stunning views of the Chao Phraya River. A remarkable selection of grower champagne complements an innovative tasting menu that promises to delight every foodie.
address: 300/2 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Aire Bar
summary: Aire Bar offers a relaxed rooftop atmosphere with stunning views of Benjasiri Park, perfect for unwinding after a long day. Signature cocktails are crafted to delight, making it an ideal spot for casual gatherings. Open daily from 3 PM to 1 AM, this bar is a hidden gem in the heart of Bangkok.
address: 22 5 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio
summary: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio in Thonglor is a striking bar that has quickly gained acclaim as one of Asia’s top drinking spots. The expert team specializes in elegant ‘super classics’ that are both effortless to enjoy and refreshingly innovative. With its intimate seating around the bar and gentle, cinematic lighting, this venue fosters engaging conversations with skilled bartenders.
address: 2nd Floor SODALITY, 263 ซอย ทองหล่อ 13 แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Spectrum Dining
summary: Spectrum Dining at Hyatt Regency Sukhumvit pairs stunning skyline views with expertly timed culinary courses. Fresh, citrusy cocktails complement the atmosphere as Bangkok transitions from golden hour to neon. Smart-casual attire enhances the experience, ensuring a seamless service from start to finish.
address: Hyatt Regency Bangkok, 1 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: restaurants
summary: Ekkamai welcomes Somsak, a vibrant Thai eatery from the creators of Fatboy Izakaya, offering inventive dishes and cocktails with an Isaan flair. Chef Bank introduces Arloy in Silom, where traditional Thai cuisine meets American influences for a unique dining experience. These new spots are set to elevate Bangkok's culinary scene with their bold flavors and creative concepts.
address: 231/2 , Soi Sukhumvit 31 (Soi Sawasdee), Sukhumvit Road Khlong Ton Nuea Sub-District, แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Find The PhotoBooth
summary: Accessed through a vintage photo booth, this stylish speakeasy offers a unique cocktail experience in Nana/Sukhumvit. The menu creatively incorporates Thai ingredients into classic drinks, complemented by curated playlists that enhance the late-night vibe. Velvet banquettes and a polished bar create an inviting atmosphere for post-dinner gatherings.
address: Bantathong Rd Wang Mai, ชั้น, 1 ถนน บรรทัดทอง Khet, เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Biscotti — Chef’s Counter
summary: Biscotti at Anantara Siam offers a dynamic dining experience where seasonal flavors take center stage. A thoughtful selection of dishes, from crunchy salads to comforting curries, ensures there's something for every palate. Coffee enthusiasts will appreciate the meticulous brewing process that highlights sweetness without bitterness.
address: 155 Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Energy Station
summary: Located in Central World’s The Offices, Energy Station serves up grab-and-go bites and unique coffee blends sourced from local Thai farmers. Signature dishes include hearty sandwiches and crab super bowls, while evenings bring a selection of wines and beers. Indulge in chef Saki Hoshino’s ice creams for a sweet treat to complete your visit.
address: 272 Rama IX Soi 17, Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Dosan Dalmatian
summary: Dosan Dalmatian offers a delightful fusion of Western and Korean brunch dishes in a whimsically decorated space. Enjoy photogenic desserts and signature drinks like their adorable Dalmatian chocolate while soaking in the view from the rooftop terrace. With a promise of late-night vibes and an upcoming wine menu, this spot is perfect for a relaxed outing in Siam Square.
address: เลขที่ 424 ชั้น 2-4 Siam Square Soi 7, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Rossini’s — Seasonal Menu
summary: Rossini’s at Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit offers a tranquil dining experience with a focus on seasonal flavors. Enjoy an array of lively textures and unhurried service that invites exploration of each dish. The atmosphere is warm, complemented by a thoughtful selection of beverages beyond coffee.
address: 250 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: VIU — Dinner Service
summary: Dining at VIU offers a stunning skyline view that complements exquisite dishes, perfectly timed to enhance the experience. Golden hour transforms Bangkok into a vibrant spectacle while guests enjoy flavors that resonate with the city's ambiance. A smart-casual dress code adds to the sophisticated atmosphere without being overly formal.
address: 159 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Thirdbase
summary: A hidden gem in Ekkamai, Thirdbase offers a serene escape from Bangkok's hustle. With its thoughtfully designed interiors and soft lighting, the space encourages leisurely afternoons filled with conversation. Enjoy the calm ambiance as you savor moments that feel like an activity in themselves.
address: 38 Soi Charoen Chai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Black Cabin Bar
summary: A hidden gem off Sukhumvit, Black Cabin Bar offers a noir-inspired atmosphere with its rich reds and blacks. Enjoy live music from eclectic bands while sipping on expertly crafted cocktails that range from classics to seasonal signatures. The late-night crowd and vibrant energy make it an ideal spot for those seeking a lively yet intimate experience.
address: 466, 16 ถ. ทองหล่อ แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: The Water Library Brasserie
summary: A vibrant dining experience awaits at The Water Library Brasserie, where Thai flavors shine with freshness and zest. Dishes are crafted to keep the momentum going, featuring a dynamic mix of crunchy salads, flavorful soups, and expertly grilled mains. Enjoy a well-curated selection of wines that complement the lively atmosphere without being pretentious.
address: 1031 Central Embassy ชั้น 5 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Cabanon Wine Bistro
summary: Cabanon Wine Bistro in Sathorn serves vibrant Thai cuisine that balances herbs and lime with just the right amount of heat. Dishes arrive quickly, ensuring fresh textures and a dynamic dining experience where every bite invites another. With a friendly atmosphere on weeknights and lively weekends, it's an ideal spot for both casual diners and families.
address: 44, Narathiwat 15, ซอย แขวงทุ่งมหาเมฆ เขตสาทร กรุงเทพมหานคร 10120, Thailand

name: Waanthai
summary: Waanthai, the latest venture by Michelin-starred chef Chumpol Jangprai, offers a casual yet photogenic setting for indulging in traditional Thai desserts. The menu features innovative creations like the Thai Mon Thong durian cheese cake and Taro Custard Mille-Feuille, showcasing regional ingredients with contemporary flair. A delightful high tea set and signature dishes make this cafe a must-visit destination in Thonglor.
address: 131 Soi Sukhumvit 53, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Le Dalat
summary: Le Dalat (Ekkamai) serves up refined Vietnamese cuisine with a delightful twist on traditional flavors. The inviting atmosphere features soft lighting and a white-tablecloth elegance, making it perfect for relaxed meals or light lunches. Seasonal pastry specials keep the menu fresh and intriguing, while attentive staff enhance the dining experience without being intrusive.
address: 57 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Frog Bar
summary: Frog Bar invites patrons into a world where Japanese literature meets local flavors, creating a unique cocktail experience. Signature drinks like the Nikolaschka and Haruki Murakami-inspired creations offer a blend of classic and innovative tastes. This bar's atmosphere resonates with fans of both anime and cocktails, making it a must-visit for adventurous drinkers.
address: 237 Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Yayyyyy Record Bar
summary: Yayyyyy Record Bar serves as a cozy haven for music lovers, showcasing a diverse selection of funk, jazz, and house records. The warm ambiance encourages friendly conversations among patrons while enjoying highballs and sours. Ideal for a unique date night, this bar invites guests to immerse themselves in the joy of vinyl culture.
address: 146 Thanon Chakkraphatdi Phong, Khwaeng Wat Sommanat, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Tapas Y Vino
summary: Regional Thai cooking shines at Tapas Y Vino, where bright herbs and a gentle kick create an inviting atmosphere. The menu encourages sharing with dishes that balance flavors, making it perfect for both families and food enthusiasts. Weekdays feel neighborly, while weekends buzz with energy as diners explore the vibrant offerings.
address: 2nd floor, Hilton Bangkok Grande, 30 Thanon Asok Montri, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: GOD Bar
summary: GOD Bar, short for Genius On Drugs, presents an innovative drinking experience with a menu that pushes boundaries. The co-founders have crafted a unique concept where drinks are paired with small bites that complement and contrast each other. Expect an atmosphere that embraces the philosophy of 'excessive is necessary'.
address: 22 Si Lom Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Rogues Bar
summary: Rogues Bar invites everyone to enjoy a unique cocktail experience inspired by global capitals. Each drink, like the Gatsby-themed Salute To The World and the smoky Samurai Angel, tells a story through its flavors. A curated jazz soundtrack adds an elegant backdrop to this lively setting.
address: 10 Sukhumvit 59, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Yalla Mediterranean
summary: Yalla Mediterranean on Sukhumvit 39 offers a delightful array of bowls and wraps enhanced by bright, flavorful sauces. The warm and tactile atmosphere promotes relaxed conversations, making it a favorite lunchtime spot. Seasonal pastries keep the menu fresh and intriguing, ensuring every visit feels special.
address: 1-2 Soi Sukhumvit 39, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Buenazo
summary: Buenazo, a cozy new eatery in The Commons Thonglor, spotlights the vibrant flavors of Peruvian cuisine. With an open kitchen and sustainable decor made from sunken boats, it offers dishes like Classico Ceviche and Lomo Saltado crafted by chef Santiago Fernandez. A commitment to social responsibility and unique collaborations promises a delightful culinary experience worth returning for.
address: 335 Soi Akkhara Phatsadu, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Bar Us
summary: Bar Us on Sukhumvit Soi 26 offers an immersive drinking experience recognized as Thailand's Best Bar by Asia’s 50 Best Bars 2025. The intimate space features a creative cocktail menu inspired by culinary techniques, ensuring a blend of innovation and approachability. Guests can enjoy expertly crafted drinks made from local produce while receiving personalized guidance from the attentive staff.
address: Opposite side of security kiosk ( Glass door) Floor 1, 61/37 Floor, 1 สุขุมวิท 26 แขวงคลองตัน เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Tempura Kuroda
summary: Tempura Kuroda transforms tempura into an art form, where each piece is served fresh with a delicate balance of salt and citrus. The intimate counter seating creates a focused experience, ideal for savoring seasonal vegetables and sweetfish when available. This minimalist gem promises precise pacing and a unique culinary journey.
address: Building 36, Eight Thonglor, 88/1 Soi.Sukhumvit55, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Nomada
summary: Nomada offers a vibrant beachside dining experience with sweeping sea views and breezy outdoor seating. Under the guidance of Chilean chef Andre Josef Nweh Severino, the restaurant showcases authentic South American flavors through seasonal ingredients and live-fire cooking. Signature dishes include calamares fritos and perfectly grilled picanha, making it a must-visit for food enthusiasts in Hua Hin.
address: 116-4, 2 Thanon Sala Daeng, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Giorgio's
summary: Giorgio's offers a cozy Italian dining experience in the heart of the city, perfect for romantic dinners or friendly gatherings. The classic Mediterranean decor sets a warm atmosphere, complemented by a menu featuring traditional dishes and fine wines sourced from Italy. Live music every Friday enhances the festive vibe, ensuring each visit is memorable.
address: Siphya, 2 ถ. เจริญกรุง แขวงบางรัก เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio
summary: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio in Thonglor merges classic cocktail artistry with modern flair, creating a unique drinking experience. Ranked No.5 on Asia’s 50 Best Bars 2025, the bar's rotating menu features innovative drinks crafted with precision. Cozy counter seating allows guests to observe the intricate mixology process while enjoying engaging conversations with fellow cocktail enthusiasts.
address: 2nd Floor SODALITY, 263 ซอย ทองหล่อ 13 แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Rabbit Hole
summary: In the heart of Thonglor, Rabbit Hole offers a sophisticated cocktail experience in a cozy, timber-clad space. Expert bartenders craft balanced signatures and classic drinks, perfect for intimate conversations. With its relaxed ambiance and late-night hours, this bar is an essential stop for cocktail enthusiasts and date nights alike.
address: 125 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Larder
summary: Larder offers a unique all-day dining experience in Phrom Phong with an industrial vibe and an open kitchen. The menu features house-made charcuterie and simple yet flavorful sandwiches, perfect for a casual lunch or afternoon work session. With plans for dinner service and natural wines by the glass, this spot promises to be a local gem worth revisiting.
address: 31/2 Soi Phrom Chai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Thaipas
summary: Thaipas merges Thai and Spanish culinary traditions in a charming tapas bar at Thonglor’s Seen Space 13. Signature dishes include wild mantis shrimp croquettes and a rich black paella, all made from local produce. The venue transforms into a seafood noodle shop during lunchtime, ensuring fresh offerings throughout the day.
address: 251, 2 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Q&A Bar
summary: Q&A Bar offers an intimate speakeasy experience near Asok BTS, focusing on personalized classic cocktails with a whiskey foundation. The limited seating encourages conversation over loud crowds, making it a perfect pre- or post-dinner stop. Seasonal ingredients feature in their unique specials, enhancing the tailored drink experience.
address: 235/13 Sukhumvit 21 Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Smalls
summary: A vibrant neighborhood bar in Suan Phlu, Smalls offers a dynamic cocktail program paired with live jazz and DJ nights. Eclectic decor and cozy candlelit corners create an inviting atmosphere for late-night gatherings. With limited seating and a small stage hosting talented musicians, it's best to arrive early to enjoy the lively vibe.
address: 186/3-4 Soi Suan Phlu 1, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Taahra
summary: Charcoal grilling takes center stage at Taahra, where Thai street food classics are reimagined with flair. The bold interior contrasts with the unassuming exterior, and the chef's 13-course menu showcases innovative dishes that elevate traditional flavors. Seasonal rotations promise fresh surprises, making each visit a new culinary adventure.
address: PGG8+8HG ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Si Phraya, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Ann Tha Din Daeng
summary: Ann Tha Din Daeng specializes in Thai rice plates topped with crispy pork and zesty sauces, emphasizing a delightful mix of textures. Known for its quick service from an open kitchen, this eatery caters to those seeking a fast yet flavorful meal. Popular among locals, it offers a reliable stop for everyday dining.
address: 167 Thanon Tha Din Daeng, Khwaeng Khlong San, Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Charoen Saeng Silom
summary: Renowned for its fall-apart braised pork knuckles served over rice, Charoen Saeng Silom offers a taste of rich flavors with a glossy sauce accented by star anise. Quick counter service and a bustling atmosphere make it a popular lunchtime destination, though be prepared for long lines. This cash-only eatery near Silom is a must-visit for those craving authentic Thai comfort food.
address: 492/6 ถ.สีลม ติด Soi Charoen Krung 49, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: TAX Bar
summary: TAX Bar on Chinatown's Soi Nana offers a unique cocktail experience with its insect-inspired menu and innovative Thai ingredients. The intimate counter setting and DJ-led atmosphere create a lively backdrop for exploring the new wave of culinary mixology. Frequent collaborations with regional bars keep the offerings fresh and exciting, perfect for adventurous drinkers in Bangkok's vibrant nightlife scene.
address: 695-697 Thanon Maitri Chit, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Zao
summary: Zao in Pridi Soi 25 offers an authentic taste of Isaan, breaking away from the typical Bangkok adaptations. The café's modern design complements a menu rich with local ingredients, including unique dishes like fermented pla ra and spicy watermelon. Aiming to elevate Isaan cuisine, this spot is a must-visit for somtam enthusiasts seeking genuine flavors.
address: Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Maria Bar
summary: Maria Bar transforms Phra Khanong into a stylish destination for wine and cocktails, featuring the signature Blessing cocktail with its stunning hues. The atmosphere is perfect for sharing moments over their crowd favorite Friend's Triple Dip, which offers a trio of fries and sauces. Ideal for casual dates or hangouts, this bar blends chic vibes with local charm.
address: 4th Flr, 1511/1-4 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Independence Cocktail Bar
summary: Independence Cocktail Bar in Chinatown offers a cozy atmosphere with a unique twist on northeastern Thai flavors. Signature cocktails feature rice spirits and regional herbs, creating savory profiles that stand out from traditional bars. This intimate space attracts locals and visitors alike, making it a vibrant stop on any Soi Nana exploration.
address: 687 Thanon Maitri Chit, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Lennon’s
summary: Vinyl lovers will find their haven at Lennon’s, a stylish bar atop Rosewood Bangkok that blends mid-century design with stunning skyline views. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails alongside curated DJ sets and listening sessions, perfect for both casual visitors and audiophiles alike. The intimate setting accommodates everything from romantic date nights to gatherings with friends, making it a versatile nightlife destination.
address: 30 Floor, Rosewood Bangkok, 1041/38 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Crimson Room
summary: Located near Langsuan, Crimson Room offers a luxurious cabaret-style experience with live jazz and electronic performances. The plush interior echoes the charm of golden-age supper clubs, while expertly crafted cocktails elevate the ambiance. Reservations are recommended due to limited seating, making it an ideal spot for date nights and celebrations.
address: 87 Lang Suan Rd, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Kate's Place - Supper Club
summary: A hidden gem in a stylish shophouse, Kate's Place offers an intimate dining experience with a monthly changing set menu featuring Thai comfort food. Signature dishes like beef panang and steamed red snapper highlight a blend of traditional flavors with a modern twist. Perfect for private gatherings, the space accommodates up to 12 guests, making it an exclusive culinary escape.
address: 38/1 Sukhumvit 36, Klongton, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: TICHUCA Rooftop Bar
summary: Experience stunning panoramic views of Thonglor at TICHUCA Rooftop Bar, where a unique 'tree canopy' light installation enhances the vibrant atmosphere. Sip on visually striking cocktails while enjoying a lively mix of lounge and club vibes from resident DJs. With timed entry recommended for peak hours, this smart casual venue is perfect for birthday celebrations or a night out with friends.
address: ตึก ที วัน ชั้น 46, Soi Sukhumvit 40, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Nagiya
summary: Nagiya buzzes with a vibrant izakaya atmosphere, serving up grilled meats, hearty stews, and fresh raw dishes that arrive quickly. The earthenware decor and handwritten menus evoke a lively Tokyo after-work scene, perfect for gathering friends. A solid selection of beer, highballs, and decent sake complements the energetic late-night vibe.
address: Maha NakhonKhwaeng 2Khet 44, ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Sanji Matcha Bar (Bang Na BTS)
summary: Sanji Matcha Bar offers a serene micro-bar experience with a minimalist aesthetic, perfect for matcha enthusiasts. The menu features straight matcha, lattes, and seasonal specials alongside delicate warabi mochi or light cakes. Designed for commuters, this spot invites a quick yet thoughtful tea ceremony.
address: Soi Sukhumvit 70/3, Khwaeng Bang Na, Khet Bang Na, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10260, Thailand

name: CLARA
summary: Experience modern Italian cuisine in a beautifully restored villa, where each dish is inspired by seasonal ingredients. The unhurried atmosphere allows for meaningful conversations about sourcing and culinary techniques. Thoughtful pairings and attention to detail create a dining experience that feels both relaxed and refined.
address: 69 ซอย ประสาทสุข Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: SEEN Restaurant & Bar
summary: SEEN Restaurant & Bar offers stunning views of the Chao Phraya River and Bangkok's skyline from its sky-high terrace. A vibrant menu fuses South American and Asian flavors, complemented by a well-curated cocktail selection. The lively atmosphere, enhanced by a DJ, makes it an ideal spot for both dinner and late-night drinks.
address: AVANI Riverside Bangkok 257/1-3 Charoen Nakhon Rd, Khwaeng Samre, Khet Thon Buri, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Penthouse Bar + Grill
summary: Penthouse Bar + Grill at Park Hyatt Bangkok offers a chic ambiance with stunning views, perfect for an upscale dining experience. Guests can enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and a menu featuring premium steaks and seafood in a stylish setting reminiscent of New York lofts. Ideal for special occasions or casual evenings, the venue combines dining and nightlife seamlessly.
address: 34th - 36th Floor, Park Hyatt Bangkok, 88 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Guay Jub Mr. Joe
summary: Guay Jub Mr. Joe serves rolled rice noodles and legendary crackling pork belly in a flavorful pepper broth. This restaurant is a must-stop for anyone exploring Bangkok's vibrant food scene, showcasing the city's rich culinary heritage. Expect a warm atmosphere that highlights the local appetite for bold flavors and hospitality.
address: 313/7 Thanon Chan, Khwaeng Wat Phraya Krai, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Al Saray
summary: Al Saray in Sathorn offers a unique blend of Lebanese and Indian flavors, perfect for a satisfying lunch away from the office. The venue's intriguing 'flavor meets entertainment' concept sets the stage for an engaging dining experience. Just a short BTS ride from Silom, it's an accessible gem for food lovers.
address: 27 1 Phiphat 2, สีลม Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Pridi
summary: Songwat Coffee Roaster, crafted by the team behind Bangkok's beloved eateries, offers a delightful coffee experience. Enjoy their house blend of Brazil Cerrado, complemented by unique croissants like chestnut mont blanc and black sesame mascarpone. A cozy spot to indulge in artisanal flavors and creative pastries awaits you.
address: 155 ซ. ปรีดี พนมยงค์ 25 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: CHAR Rooftop Bar
summary: CHAR Rooftop Bar offers a stunning open-air deck atop Hotel Indigo, perfect for cozy dates and skyline views. Sip on modern cocktails and spritzes while enjoying a relaxed atmosphere that feels intimate yet central. With attentive service and seasonal promotions, this bar is an inviting choice for warm evenings.
address: 25th & 26th Floor, Hotel Indigo Bangkok, 81 ถ. วิทยุ แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Sky Beach
summary: Sky Beach offers an unparalleled experience as Bangkok's highest rooftop bar, situated atop The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon. Enjoy 360-degree views while sipping on refreshing highballs and frozen cocktails, with a menu designed for casual snacking. With DJ-led evenings and seasonal events, this spot is perfect for those seeking a lively atmosphere amidst stunning cityscapes.
address: The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon, 78th Floor, 114 ถนน นราธิวาสราชนครินทร์ แขวงสีลม เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Royal Bangkok Sports Club
summary: Royal Bangkok Sports Club is a prestigious members’ club in Pathum Wan, renowned for its extensive racquet facilities including grass tennis and squash courts. The club hosts regular tournaments and league play, making it an active hub for sports enthusiasts. Situated near Chulalongkorn University, it stands as a historic landmark in Bangkok's sporting scene.
address: 18 Thanon Witthayu, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: My Paws Backyard
summary: My Paws Backyard offers a unique blend of eco-café and community garden, serving specialty coffee in a pet-friendly setting. The atmosphere is enhanced by solar panels and no-plastic practices, creating an inviting space for both relaxation and work. Weekend mornings attract families and dog owners, while weekdays provide a serene environment for quiet sessions.
address: 7 Soi Ram Intra 34, Khwaeng Tha Raeng, Khet Bang Khen, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10220, Thailand

name: Weekend Thonglor
summary: Weekend Thonglor offers an intimate stage for indie bands, featuring a creative crowd and raw aesthetic. Highballs and easy sours complement the vibrant atmosphere during discovery nights. Expect standing room only as local talent takes the spotlight.
address: 9 23 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Aunglo by Yangrak
summary: Aunglo by Yangrak impresses with its MICHELIN-listed Thai cuisine in a modern bistro setting. Seasonal, herb-forward dishes are complemented by a selection of cocktails and local spirits, making it ideal for date nights or small gatherings. Friendly service and vibrant plating enhance the dining experience, though reservations are recommended during peak hours.
address: 174/4-6 Decho Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Sababa
summary: Sababa offers a unique fusion of Mediterranean and Japanese cuisine in a cozy Thonglor setting. Chef Maxim Baile crafts shareable dishes like Pistachio Carbonara and Challans Chicken Couscous, perfect for gatherings. This lush hideaway is ideal for those seeking a vibrant dining experience with friends and family.
address: 53 S. Torsak Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rough & Round Roastery Lab
summary: Rough & Round Roastery Lab offers coffee lovers a unique opportunity to engage in small-batch roasting and cupping within a studio-like environment. Interactive sessions encourage participants to explore brewing variables and deepen their coffee knowledge. Keep an eye on their socials for upcoming cupping events, and come prepared with your questions.
address: 496, 4 Song Wat Rd, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Kimi Sushi Bar
summary: Kimi Sushi Bar presents an outdoor omakase experience that balances quality and affordability, perfect for newcomers. With a cozy atmosphere and rotating natural wines, this spot stands out in Bangkok's Thonglor area. Expect meticulous Edomae-style sushi served in three rounds, making each visit unique and delightful.
address: 14/2 ซอย สมคิด Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Sae Phun
summary: Sae Phun offers a delightful mix of Thai-Chinese comfort food recognized by the MICHELIN Guide as a Bib Gourmand pick. The menu features braised meats and herbal rice dishes, providing a solid value for local office workers during lunch hours. With brisk service and straightforward seating, this spot is perfect for a quick takeaway near the old town.
address: 490 Thanon Tanao, Khwaeng Sao Chingcha, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: The Parlor
summary: The Parlor offers a versatile atmosphere, transforming from a daytime coffee lounge to a vibrant nightlife venue with DJ sets on weekends. Enjoy casual bites and cocktails while engaging in themed music nights and local creative takeovers. This social space is perfect for groups looking to unwind before heading to nearby attractions like Sky Beach.
address: The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon, 4th Floor, 114 Narathiwas Road, 76th Floor, 114 ถนน นราธิวาสราชนครินทร์ แขวงสีลม เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Unatoto Thailand
summary: Unatoto Thailand offers an authentic Japanese dining experience, capturing the essence of traditional eel cuisine. The restaurant features a unique grilling technique using a special charcoal stove that enhances the rich flavors of imported eel. This first international branch delivers the same beloved dishes as its 20 locations in Japan, ensuring a taste of home for those familiar with the chain.

name: Blue by Alain Ducasse — 1 star
summary: Contemporary French cuisine shines at Blue by Alain Ducasse, a Michelin-starred gem on the Chao Phraya river. Seasonal produce and polished sauces are expertly crafted into tasting menus in a sleek setting with stunning river views. Perfect for celebratory occasions, this restaurant offers refined service and a strong wine program to complement your meal.
address: Unit L101, 1st Floor, ICONLUXE ICONSIAM Shopping Centre, Klongtonsai, คลองสาน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10600, Thailand

name: Tawandang German Brewery
summary: Tawandang German Brewery blends Thai and German culinary traditions in a vibrant brewpub atmosphere. Live bands and stage shows create a celebratory vibe, making it perfect for birthdays and group gatherings. The flagship Rama 3 location features high production values and a lively ambiance, ensuring an unforgettable dining experience.
address: 462/61 Thanon Rama III, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Smizzle Burger
summary: Smizzle Burger offers a vibrant diner experience with its playful ketchup-and-mustard decor. Indulge in their signature smash burgers made from locally sourced, hormone-free beef, with options like the Oklahoma and Crusty Blondy. Don't miss out on their decadent truffle fries and unique ice cream shakes to complete your meal.
address: 695 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Saxophone Pub
summary: Saxophone Pub, a beloved Bangkok venue since the 1980s, offers an inviting atmosphere for live jazz and blues enthusiasts. With two stages featuring both renowned Thai artists and emerging talent, it promises a vibrant night out. The casual setting and full menu of Thai and pub classics make it an ideal spot to enjoy music late into the night.
address: 3, 8 Soi Ratchawithi 11, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio
summary: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio offers a dynamic drinking experience with modernist cocktails that balance innovation and drinkability. The minimalist, cinematic space enhances the immersive atmosphere, allowing guests to enjoy the artistry of cocktail-making from any seat. Collaborations and guest shifts create an evolving program, making reservations essential for weekends.
address: 2nd Floor SODALITY, 263 ซอย ทองหล่อ 13 แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: AmBar
summary: AmBar is the go-to spot on Sukhumvit Soi 11, renowned for its vibrant bachata events every Sunday. The lively atmosphere attracts both locals and visitors looking to dance the night away. Enjoy a night filled with rhythm, energy, and great company at this popular venue.
address: Sukhumvit 15, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Le Du
summary: Le Du offers a modern take on traditional Thai cuisine, focusing on seasonal ingredients and balanced flavors. The intimate yet lively atmosphere is perfect for sharing dishes like salads, grilled meats, and flavorful curries. Knowledgeable staff ensure a welcoming experience by helping diners adjust spice levels to their preference.
address: 399/3 Soi Siri Chunsawek, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Baan Tepa
summary: Baan Tepa offers a unique garden-to-table Thai dining experience that emphasizes biodiversity and culinary artistry. The menu showcases a harmonious blend of flavors with dishes designed for sharing, inviting guests to explore various salads, grills, and curries. Attentive staff assist in adjusting spice levels to ensure newcomers can enjoy the meal comfortably.
address: 561 Ramkhamhaeng Rd, Khwaeng Hua Mak, Khet Bang Kapi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10240, Thailand

name: Mikkeller Bangkok
summary: Mikkeller Bangkok is a hidden gem in Ekkamai, offering an impressive selection of craft beers from local and international sources. The relaxed, residential vibe makes it perfect for enjoying curated flights while chatting with knowledgeable staff. With outdoor seating and a cozy atmosphere, it's an ideal spot for beer enthusiasts seeking variety in a low-key setting.
address: 26 Soi Ekkamai 10, Lane 2, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Luz
summary: Luz Tapas Bar on the rooftop of Melia brings a unique blend of Thai ingredients and Spanish flavors, inspired by Chef Laia Ferrer’s Barcelona roots. Opened in September 2023, this venue features both a terrace and rooftop area for an elevated dining experience. Discover a fresh perspective on rooftop dining in On Nut, a neighborhood not traditionally known for it.
address: INNSiDE by Melia 1472 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rossini’s
summary: Rossini’s offers a grand Italian dining experience with handmade pasta and a warm, inviting atmosphere. Vaulted brick arches create a timeless setting, complemented by attentive staff who guide you through seasonal menu delights. Ideal for lingering over shared dishes and dessert, this restaurant embodies culinary finesse and comfort.
address: 250 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Indus
summary: Indus offers a delightful journey through Mughlai classics and tandoori specialties, set against the backdrop of a lush garden terrace. This Bangkok Indian institution stands out for its vibrant flavors and warm hospitality. A must-visit stop on any food crawl through the city, it perfectly captures Bangkok's culinary scene.
address: 71 Sukhumvit 26, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Soi Cowboy
summary: Soi Cowboy bursts with vibrant energy, offering a lively strip of go-go bars and beer joints that come alive after dark. Visitors can immerse themselves in the noise of commercial music and enjoy outdoor seating that spills onto the street. Just a short walk from public transport, this iconic nightlife destination is perfect for those seeking a quintessential Bangkok experience.
address: 4 Soi Cowboy, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Breeze Spa
summary: Breeze Spa offers an intimate retreat with mood lighting and stylish ocean-hued decor. The Energy Boost package combines a turmeric and lemongrass scrub, a Thai oil massage, and a rejuvenating facial for a holistic experience. Located in Amari Watergate Bangkok, it's perfect for those seeking relaxation in the heart of Pratunam.
address: 847 Petchburi Road,, Phaya Thai, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400, Thailand

name: Yao Rooftop Bar
summary: Yao Rooftop Bar stands out in Bangkok's nightlife, consistently ranked top for its vibrant atmosphere and innovative weekly events. With a blend of lively parties and exceptional food and drinks, it promises an unforgettable experience high above the city. Visitors can enjoy stunning views while indulging in meticulously crafted cocktails and dishes.
address: Rooftop of Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse 262 Surawong Rd, 262 ถ. สุรวงศ์ แขวงสี่พระยา เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Nana Plaza
summary: Nana Plaza offers a vibrant nightlife experience with its multi-level bars and adult-themed venues, tucked away in Sukhumvit Soi 4. The lively atmosphere attracts visitors to explore various bars, often moving from the ground floor to upper levels as the night unfolds. Late-night food stalls provide perfect pit stops for those looking to recharge between drinks.
address: 3, 1 Sukhumvit Rd, เขต คลองตัน, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: AMNESIA Bangkok
summary: AMNESIA Bangkok is a vibrant RCA club known for its commercial dance and hip-hop remixes, featuring live dancers and MCs. The energetic atmosphere attracts crowds on weekends, with varied entry policies and exciting guest performances. Keep an eye on their socials for the latest event line-ups and bottle service deals.
address: 21, 77 Soi Phetchaburi 47 Yaek 10, Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Bangkok Heightz
summary: Bangkok Heightz offers a refreshing escape with its lush surroundings and low-rise building views. The bar's glass wall enhances the connection to nature, creating an inviting atmosphere for sports enthusiasts. Enjoy tasty cocktails in this easy-going environment, perfect for unwinding after a long day.
address: 413 ชั้น 39, โรงแรม เดอะ คอนทิเนนท์, Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Haoma
summary: Haoma offers a unique neo-Indian fine dining experience centered around an urban farm and zero-waste philosophy. Seasonal menus showcase vivid flavors, complemented by thoughtful drink pairings that include non-alcoholic options. The calm ambiance emphasizes attention to detail, creating a space where each meal becomes a narrative of sourcing and culinary technique.
address: 231, 3 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Blue by Alain Ducasse
summary: Blue by Alain Ducasse offers a serene dining experience with contemporary French cuisine focused on seasonal produce. Each dish is elegantly plated and paired thoughtfully, ensuring both alcoholic and non-alcoholic options receive equal attention. The unhurried service invites guests to engage in conversations about sourcing and culinary techniques.
