address: Unit L101, 1st Floor, ICONLUXE ICONSIAM Shopping Centre, Klongtonsai, คลองสาน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10600, Thailand

name: Climax Nightclub
summary: Climax Nightclub offers a vibrant nightlife experience with live bands early in the evening, followed by DJs spinning late into the night. The venue attracts a diverse crowd with its themed parties and energetic atmosphere. Enjoy entry deals and drink packages while soaking up the lively vibe of Soi 11.
address: Basement floor, Ambassador Hotel, 171 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Invitation Only
summary: Sky-high views await at Invitation Only, perched on the 55th floor of Empire Tower. This bar offers nostalgic cocktails crafted from homemade ingredients and a serious food menu featuring dishes like piri piri chicken skewers. Enjoy panoramic sunsets while indulging in flavors that elevate your night out.
address: 55FL, Empire Tower, 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Baan Phadthai
summary: Baan Phadthai offers a delightful take on the iconic dish, emphasizing quality noodles and a harmonious blend of flavors. The charming heritage shophouse setting invites diners to share generous portions of pad thai alongside various salads and grilled items. With attentive staff ready to adjust spice levels, first-timers can comfortably explore this beloved eatery's menu.
address: 21, 23 Soi Charoen Krung 44, Khwaeng Bang Rak, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Mahaniyom Cocktail Bar
summary: Mahaniyom Cocktail Bar in Thonglor offers a unique cocktail experience focused on hyper-seasonal Thai ingredients. The intimate, softly lit space features counter seating, allowing for close interactions with talented bartenders as they craft elegant drinks. Expect polished yet warm service that highlights local produce without unnecessary gimmicks, perfect for discerning cocktail enthusiasts.
address: 2nd floor, 104 ถนน มหาเศรษฐ์ แขวงสี่พระยา เขตบางรัก กรุงเทพมหานคร 10500, Thailand

name: Candy Club x BOBO
summary: Candy Club x BOBO on Soi 11 offers a vibrant nightlife experience with a focus on commercial dance and hip-hop performances. The club features impressive LED staging and theatrical elements that keep the energy high on the dance floor. Reservations are essential for prime weekend nights to fully enjoy this buzzing venue.
address: 1 Soi Sukhumvit 13, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: R-HAAN — 2 stars
summary: R-HAAN, a two-star MICHELIN restaurant in Bangkok, offers an exquisite seasonal Thai dining experience rooted in regional traditions. Each meal begins with a delicate welcome bite, followed by a series of thoughtfully crafted shared dishes that emphasize balance over heat. The elegant atmosphere and attentive service create a refined setting perfect for savoring multi-course meals, making reservations essential, especially on weekends.
address: 131 ซอย ทองหล่อ 9 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Matcha Mood
summary: Matcha Mood embodies a contemporary space that celebrates the meditative essence of tea culture. Signature offerings include cold aged matcha and hojicha, both perfect for those seeking unique flavors. Pair your beverage with freshly baked madeleines for a delightful experience.
address: 50 Sri-Veng Road, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Dance Centre – School of Performing Arts
summary: Dance Centre offers a diverse range of performing arts classes in Bangkok, catering to all ages from children to adults. With a focus on ballet, jazz, hip-hop, and more, students can progress through multi-level courses while enjoying performance opportunities. Seasonal workshops and guest instructors enhance the curriculum at this well-equipped school.
address: 53/3, 33 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Rocco Club
summary: Rocco Club on Khaosan Road offers an electrifying nightlife experience with its high-energy parties and engaging sing-along electronic sets. As a multi-level venue, it attracts crowds late into the night, especially during holidays. Arriving early is advisable to secure a table and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.
address: 2 Thanon Khao San, Khwaeng Talat Yot, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Sri Trat Restaurant & Bar
summary: Sri Trat Restaurant & Bar offers a vibrant taste of Trat province with dishes that balance herbs, citrus, and sweetness. The menu features quick-serving plates designed for sharing, including crab roe dips and aromatic curries. Friendly staff assist in customizing spice levels, ensuring both newcomers and regulars enjoy their meal.
address: 90 Soi Sukhumvit 33, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: BEAM
summary: BEAM, located in Thonglor, is an underground club that emphasizes sound quality with its upgraded acoustics and a darker dance floor. Known for hosting a mix of local talent and international acts, it offers a pure techno, house, and bass music experience. Minimal frills allow the groove to take center stage in this vibrant nightlife venue.
address: 72 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Khao Kha Moo Charoen Krung 27
summary: Khao Kha Moo Charoen Krung 27 showcases Thai cuisine with a focus on fresh herbs and balanced spices, perfect for sharing. Diners are encouraged to explore a variety of dishes, from crunchy salads to flavorful curries, creating a communal dining experience. The attentive staff expertly adjust spice levels to enhance the meal without overwhelming the palate.
address: 106, 5 Thanon Charoen Wiang, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: May Kaidee Cooking School
summary: Experience the art of Thai cooking at May Kaidee Cooking School, where plant-forward dishes are crafted using vegetarian techniques. Hands-on workshops cater to beginners and cover everything from curry pastes to salads, ensuring a flavorful journey into Thai cuisine. With options for vegan and gluten-free diets, students receive practical tips and recipe handouts to recreate these vibrant dishes at home.
address: 54, 1 Soi Samsen 5, Khwaeng Wat Sam Phraya, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Independence
summary: Independence blends the vibrant spirit of Chinatown with an intimate cocktail experience. The menu features aromatic drinks infused with Thai ingredients, offering both classic and seasonal options to delight all palates. Warm woods and a lively soundtrack create a cozy atmosphere, perfect for a pre- or post-street food drink.
address: 687 Thanon Maitri Chit, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: WTF Bar & Gallery
summary: Located on Sukhumvit 51, WTF Bar & Gallery serves as a bohemian retreat for Bangkok's creative crowd. The relaxed bar atmosphere features well-crafted cocktails and an upstairs gallery showcasing contemporary art. Conversations flow freely among designers, writers, and travelers, making it an ideal spot to start or cap off your night.
address: 7 Soi Sukhumvit 51, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mikkeller Bangkok
summary: Mikkeller Bangkok is a cornerstone of Thailand's craft beer scene, showcasing a diverse array of styles from sours to imperial stouts. An understated vibe complements the expert staff who are passionate about beer, ensuring each pour is matched with simple snacks. Events and limited releases cater to both collectors and curious newcomers, making it an essential stop for beer enthusiasts in the city.
address: 26 Soi Ekkamai 10, Lane 2, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Changwon Express
summary: Changwon Express offers a vibrant blend of craft beer and Korean comfort food in a relaxed setting. With a menu featuring kimchi fries and spicy wings, it's perfect for casual gatherings or pre-game fun. Regular DJ nights enhance the lively atmosphere, making it a favorite among the indie bar crowd.
address: 37 Asoke-Dindaeng Rd., Makasan, Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10310, Thailand

name: Silver Waves
summary: Cantonese cuisine takes center stage at Silver Waves, where textures and seasoning are meticulously balanced for an exquisite dining experience. The vibrant atmosphere on weekends contrasts with the serene weekdays, inviting guests to savor each dish, particularly the thin-skinned dumplings and lacquered roasts. Tea service complements the meal beautifully, enhancing the overall enjoyment of this riverside gem.
address: 36th Floor, Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok, 28 ถ. เจริญกรุง Khwaeng Wat Phraya Krai, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Curving Dining
summary: Curving Dining captivates with its architecturally poetic design, featuring sweeping curves that create a serene atmosphere. Delight in an Ethiopian-Honduran coffee blend while basking under the luminous skylight. This cafe's unique ambiance and artistic flair make it a must-visit for coffee lovers in Bangkok.

name: Pee Aor Tom Yum Goong
summary: Indulge in rich, creamy tom yum featuring jumbo prawns at Pee Aor Tom Yum Goong. This restaurant is a must-visit for food lovers exploring Bangkok's vibrant culinary scene. It perfectly encapsulates the city's dedication to bold flavors and warm hospitality.
address: Bangkok, Thailand

name: Belga Rooftop Bar & Brasserie
summary: A lively rooftop bar and brasserie atop Sofitel Sukhumvit, Belga celebrates Belgian beer culture with an impressive selection of drafts and cocktails. Guests can enjoy moules-frites and charcuterie while soaking in stunning views over Sukhumvit, particularly enchanting at sundown. Swift service complements the convivial atmosphere, making it a perfect spot for gatherings with friends.
address: 189 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Master O Muaythai Academy
summary: Master O Muaythai Academy offers a welcoming environment for both fitness enthusiasts and families in Sathorn. Experienced trainers guide classes with a focus on technique drills and pad work, making it ideal for those looking to improve their Muay Thai skills. Conveniently located near central business districts, it's perfect for after-work training sessions.
address: 46/1 Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: El Chiringuito
summary: El Chiringuito brings a taste of Madrid to Chinatown's Soi Nana with its vibrant tapas and cocktails. The breezy atmosphere transforms from relaxed to lively, especially on weekends, making it an ideal spot for mingling. Enjoy sangria and small plates before continuing your adventure through Yaowarat.
address: 221 ซ. นานา Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Shades of Retro
summary: Shades of Retro exudes a cozy charm with its vintage decor and curated playlist, making it a staple in Thonglor. Classic cocktails flow alongside comforting plates, perfect for late-night gatherings. As the evening progresses, the atmosphere shifts from tranquil cafe to lively bar, attracting a diverse crowd of locals and creatives alike.
address: 808/12 Soi Thara Rom 2, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: BARBARBAR
summary: Experience the electrifying atmosphere at BARBARBAR, a lively club in Thonglor known for its hip-hop beats and vibrant crowds. With MC-driven performances and dazzling LED displays, the energy never wanes as patrons enjoy bottle service late into the night. This hotspot is an essential part of any Thonglor nightlife adventure.
address: ชั้น 2 , 308 A5 ห้อง ุ 6 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Widdershins
summary: Widdershins, a hidden speakeasy in Chinatown, exudes an old-world charm with its dark timber and brass decor. Bartenders expertly craft cocktails that blend classic recipes with Thai aromatics, ensuring each drink is thoughtfully prepared. Ideal for a romantic evening or as part of the Soi Nana nightlife circuit, this bar offers an inviting atmosphere without pretension.
address: 2, 438 Yaowarat Rd, Khwaeng Samphanthawong, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: 008 Bar
summary: 008 Bar exudes a Prohibition-era charm with leather booths and dark woods, creating an intimate atmosphere. The head bartender's expertise shines through in the meticulously crafted cocktails, where minimalistic garnishes let the spirits speak for themselves. Jazz-infused playlists enhance the cocooned vibe, making it a perfect spot for a sophisticated night out.
address: 88 Muu Bangkok hotel 322 ชั้น 11 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: BrewDog Ploenchit
summary: BrewDog Ploenchit infuses Bangkok with a vibrant Scottish craft beer scene, featuring 16 taps and a lively atmosphere fueled by music. Guests can enjoy hearty food options like wings and burgers while socializing at large communal tables, perfect for groups. With regular live music and sports screenings, this bar serves as a welcoming hub for beer enthusiasts and casual drinkers alike.
address: Canvas Building, Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Na-Oh (Bang Phlat/ChangChui)
summary: Experience a surreal tasting menu aboard a restored Lockheed TriStar aircraft, where creative courses meet theatrical design. Ideal for birthdays or visitors seeking something unique, this venue offers great value and stunning photo opportunities. Reserve window tables to enhance the dramatic dining experience.
address: 460/8 Sirindhorn Rd, Khwaeng Bang Phlat, Khet Bang Phlat, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10700, Thailand

name: Smalls
summary: Smalls in Suan Phlu offers a cozy, neighborhood vibe across three floors, featuring jazz and soulful DJ sets. The intimate atmosphere is enhanced by art-filled walls and excellent cocktails, creating a perfect late-night hangout. A blend of serious music and laid-back fun turns nights into spontaneous dance parties under the mezzanine.
address: 186/3-4 Soi Suan Phlu 1, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Beer Republic
summary: Beer Republic serves as a vibrant European beer hall, perfect for Bangkok's after-work crowd. A rotating selection of international and Thai beers complements a menu of hearty shareable platters. Located near BTS Chidlom, it's an ideal spot for late-night drinks after shopping.
address: 971 Thanon Phloen Chit, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Foojohn Jazz Club
summary: Foojohn Jazz Club offers an intimate setting for jazz aficionados in Talat Noi, where improvisation thrives among cozy wood and brick decor. The unique line-ups promise fresh experiences with each visit, making it a haven for live music lovers. Sip on expertly crafted cocktails or wines while immersing yourself in the vibrant sounds of Bangkok's jazz scene.
address: ชั้นที่ 2, 831 Soi Charoen Krung 31, Khwaeng Talat Noi, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: The WoodShed
summary: The WoodShed offers an intimate escape with its rustic decor and a focus on classic cocktails. Live jazz fills the air, creating a mellow atmosphere perfect for a date or quiet evening. Attentive staff enhance the experience by sharing their cocktail knowledge in this cozy nook off Sukhumvit.
address: 24, 1 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: WTF Gallery & Café
summary: WTF Gallery & Café in Sukhumvit 51 blends bar culture with an indie art space, attracting a creative crowd. The eclectic music programming and rotating exhibitions create a lively atmosphere that evolves from relaxed to dance-friendly. With personal service and classic drinks, this venue serves as a vibrant hub for artists and locals alike.
address: 7 Soi Sukhumvit 51, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sugar Ray: You’ve Just Been Poisoned
summary: Sugar Ray offers a refined cocktail experience in a cozy, low-lit setting reminiscent of Japanese listening bars. With a carefully curated soundtrack ranging from soulful jazz to 70s funk, conversations flow freely over expertly crafted drinks. This bar attracts those who appreciate quality and detail without the distraction of mainstream hype.
address: 37 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: FA Group Muay Thai Gym
summary: FA Group Muay Thai Gym stands out for its authentic clinch-heavy training, attracting both locals and visitors. Multiple daily sessions provide comprehensive practice, from runs to pad work, led by attentive coaches. Conveniently located near Chatuchak, this gym welcomes drop-ins and long-term students alike.
address: 270 Thanon Vibhavadi Rangsit, Khwaeng Chom Phon, Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10900, Thailand

name: Sasiprapa Gym
summary: Sasiprapa Gym stands as a historic establishment in Bangkok, dedicated to cultivating skilled Thai boxers through authentic training routines. The facility offers a blend of traditional exercises and modern techniques, welcoming both local and foreign students. With its focus on high-quality instruction and community, this gym is a must-visit for anyone interested in experiencing the essence of Muay Thai culture.
address: 401 Lat Phrao 130, Khwaeng Khlong Chan, Khet Bang Kapi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10240, Thailand

name: Bar Marco
summary: Bar Marco offers a unique listening experience in a cozy Thonglor townhouse, surrounded by vinyl and an intimate DJ booth. Enjoy thoughtfully crafted cocktails while immersing yourself in a diverse mix of soul, jazz, and funk, all at a respectful volume. Ideal for dates or deep music nights, this bar ensures every record feels personal.
address: 946/9 ถนน สุขุมวิท Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Modern‑Day Culture
summary: A haven for audiophiles, Modern-Day Culture in Ekkamai prioritizes great records and sound over distractions. With an eclectic mix of mellow jazz-funk to house and disco, the atmosphere is perfect for intentional listening. Friendly service complements the experience, making it a reliable spot for music lovers seeking a laid-back vibe.
address: 70 (Floor, 4 Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Bar 008
summary: Step into Bar 008, a prohibition-style hideaway that exudes elegance with its leather banquettes and classic cocktails. Expert bartenders serve up refined drinks like martinis and manhattans, all set to an old-world soundtrack. This sophisticated bar offers a serene alternative to the bustling nightlife nearby in Thonglor and Phrom Phong.
address: 88 Muu Bangkok hotel 322 ชั้น 11 Soi Thong Lo, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Two Palms Taproom
summary: Two Palms Taproom combines a serious craft beer selection with delicious pizza, making it a must-visit in Sukhumvit. This bright and modern space transforms from family-friendly by day to buzzing social hub at night. Enjoy a range of IPAs, lagers, and seasonal guest kegs in a welcoming atmosphere.
address: 591 Thanon Phra Sumen, Khwaeng Wat Bowon Niwet, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Freaking Out The Neighborhood
summary: Freaking Out The Neighborhood is a cozy listening bar on Sukhumvit 36 with a vintage JBL rig that sets the mood for soulful jazz and eclectic pop. The classic cocktails complement intimate conversations among music lovers, while weekends bring together Bangkok's indie scene. With clarity in sound and an inviting atmosphere, this bar is perfect for those who appreciate deep cuts and vinyl vibes.
address: 49 Soi Napha Sap, Lane 1, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Teppen
summary: Teppen offers a unique robatayaki dining experience where chefs skillfully fan flames while serving fresh seafood and wagyu on cedar planks. The lively atmosphere is perfect for small groups looking to enjoy energetic meals filled with smoky flavors. Be prepared for a joyful evening, but dress lightly as the charcoal will leave its mark.
address: 48 Soi Sathon 8, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Alonetogether
summary: Alonetogether offers a unique blend of live jazz and vinyl listening, creating an elegant atmosphere reminiscent of classic music bars. The intimate setting features seasoned musicians performing nightly, ensuring a fresh take on beloved standards. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails while engaging in conversation amidst the soothing sounds of jazz.
address: 29 Sukhumvit 31, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: aftersun Listening Bar
summary: aftersun Listening Bar offers a serene escape in Bang Bon, featuring 1970s décor and a meticulously curated turntable setup. The ambiance fosters long conversations over simple, refreshing drinks while mellow soul and soft rock create a warm backdrop. A small vinyl corner caters to collectors, making it an ideal spot for music lovers seeking a unique experience.
address: 80,82 ซ.กาญจนาภิเษก 6, แขวงคลองบางพราน เขตบางบอน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10150, Thailand

name: Buddha & Pals
summary: Buddha & Pals offers a cozy vintage café experience in the Nangleong area, where live jazz creates an intimate atmosphere. Enjoy classic cocktails and comfort dishes in a charming 80-year-old building that enhances the romantic vibe. This spot is perfect for a sweet, simple night of music and good company.
address: 712 Krung Kasem Rd, Khwaeng Wat Sommanat, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: PK Saenchai Muay Thai Gym
summary: PK Saenchai Muay Thai Gym stands out as a leading destination for serious practitioners in Bangkok, providing intense training sessions led by top-tier Thai coaches. The gym is known for its structured two-a-day training, emphasizing hard pad rounds and sparring, making it ideal for those looking to immerse themselves in the competitive Muay Thai scene. With drop-in sessions available and English commonly spoken, visitors can easily engage in high-level training.
address: 3713 31 ซอยตรอกนอกเขต Khwaeng Bang Khlo, Khet Bang Kho Laem, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Chu
summary: Chu stands out in Bangkok's dining scene, renowned for its delectable brunch offerings. Signature dishes like eggs benedict with Sloan’s back bacon and indulgent Belgian waffles satisfy diverse cravings. A cozy atmosphere invites guests to linger over flavorful meals, making it a beloved local spot.
address: 18/1 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 เเขวง คลองตันเหนือ, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Pimp My Salad
summary: Pimp My Salad stands out in Sathorn for its generous portions and fresh ingredients. Acai bowls are a highlight, showcasing vibrant flavors and healthy options. Open daily from 8 am to 8 pm, this spot is perfect for a nutritious meal on the go.
address: 56, 58 Soi Sathon 8, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Yummz Kulfi
summary: Yummz Kulfi stands out in Bangkok for offering a unique selection of creamy, no-churn Indian ice creams. With flavors ranging from classic chocolate almond to exotic saffron, there's a kulfi for every sweet tooth. Affordable prices and the option for delivery make it a delightful treat worth exploring.
address: อาคาร India Emporium 345 Chakkraphet Rd, Khwaeng Wang Burapha Phirom, Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10200, Thailand

name: Larder BKK
summary: Off-duty chefs flock to Larder BKK for its understated yet refined brunch offerings. The clean industrial vibe complements high-quality dishes like the standout Tuna 3000, while fresh pastries add a touch of indulgence. This hidden gem is perfect for those seeking a surprise in their morning routine.

name: Rolling Roasters NEW
summary: Rolling Roasters NEW in downtown is a haven for coffee enthusiasts, resembling a futuristic coffee lab. Beyond the expertly brewed coffee, enjoy delightful food options like the Big Brekkie and fruity french toast. This spot invites both early risers and casual visitors to savor quality flavors in a unique setting.
address: 333 Soi Sutthiphong 1, Ratchadaphisek, Khet Din Daeng, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Lobster Main Kitchen
summary: Lobster Main Kitchen offers a cozy, intimate setting in Phrom Phong with a focus on comfort food at reasonable prices. While some dishes, like the beef tongue salad, shine, others fall short of expectations, leaving diners wanting more creativity and flavor. The desserts provide a sweet end to the meal, but overall, the experience feels average and uninspired.
address: 714/7 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Klor BKK
summary: Tucked away in Ladprao, Klor BKK transforms an unremarkable house into a cozy haven for music lovers. Guests can explore shelves brimming with cassette tapes and vinyl records while enjoying the inviting ambiance of mid-century decor. A friendly dog named Klookklik adds to the charm, making every visit feel like home.

name: Plantation Cafe x Roastery
summary: Plantation Cafe x Roastery combines specialty coffee with a cozy, green-filled atmosphere in central Bangkok. The venue offers artisanal drinks and light meals, all while promoting sustainability through local sourcing. Regular events like coffee workshops and live music foster a vibrant community vibe, making it a delightful stop for locals and travelers alike.
address: Thanon Khlong Lamchiak, Khwaeng Nawamin, Khet Bueng Kum, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Bukowski & Co.Photo: Bukowski & Co. / BK Magazine
summary: Bukowski & Co. offers a unique blend of community and spontaneity, reminiscent of the iconic Shakespeare and Company bookstore in Paris. With a rotating cast of bartenders, each visit promises a personalized experience shaped by their distinct styles. The menu, inspired by films, invites patrons to enjoy a cinematic twist while socializing in this vibrant space.
address: 1338B Song Wat Rd, Khwaeng Chakkrawat, Khet Samphanthawong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: Bar.Yard
summary: Bar.Yard stands out in Bangkok’s vibrant nightlife, renowned for its exceptional rooftop experience. Celebrated for three consecutive years by the BAD Awards, it features a fresh lineup of weekly parties that cater to diverse vibes and energy levels. With great food and drinks complementing its lively atmosphere, this venue is a must-visit for nightlife enthusiasts.
address: Kimpton Maa-Lai Bangkok, 78 Soi Ton Son, Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Golden State Vegan
summary: A vibrant fusion of Japanese and Californian cuisine awaits at Golden State Vegan, where lively evenings are complemented by a cocktail bar and DJ deck. Unique vegan dishes like the WTF sushi rolls and quinoa-based burgers shine with house-made sauces, all in a colorful setting. Live music adds to the laid-back vibe, making it a perfect spot for fun and relaxation.

name: Jaja Bistro
summary: A culinary journey awaits at Jaja Bistro, where the vibrant flavors of New Orleans come alive. This hotspot features an eclectic menu that caters to every food lover's craving, from innovative ramen dishes to homemade pizzas. Discover a lively atmosphere perfect for enjoying exquisite bites with friends or family.
address: Baan Turtle, 31 Soi Suan Phlu 2, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Suananda
summary: Suananda offers a serene escape with homemade vegetarian dishes in a tranquil garden setting. The Indian-inspired menu features seasonal organic ingredients, including charitable lunch sets that support those in need. Yoga and healthy cooking classes enhance the holistic experience of this hidden gem.
address: 109 Thanon Pan, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Larb Siab
summary: Rooftop izakaya Larb Siab combines an artistic atmosphere with a unique Isaan twist on yakitori skewers. Indulge in bite-sized larb creations accompanied by craft beer while enjoying sunset views. Affordable prices and a chill vibe make this spot ideal for casual gatherings with friends.

name: Fell Boy
summary: Fell Boy offers a cozy escape just off Rama 2 Road, nestled in a lush tropical garden that invites relaxation. Inside, warm wood tones and mid-century furniture create an inviting atmosphere, perfect for enjoying local Thai coffee or their standout ceremonial-grade matcha. This hidden gem is ideal for those seeking a tranquil spot to unwind from the concrete jungle.
address: 100, 16 หมู่ที่ 1 Rama II Rd, Tambon Bang Nam Chuet, Amphoe Mueang Samut Sakhon, Chang Wat Samut Sakhon 74000, Thailand

name: Halfway Brunch & Roastery
summary: Halfway Brunch & Roastery invites you into a uniquely designed space that blends brutalist architecture with an eclectic interior. The Australian-inspired brunch menu is complemented by expertly crafted coffee, offering both nutty and fruity blends alongside indulgent smoothies and desserts. Located in Sathon, this venue feels like a charming escape, perfect for leisurely mornings.
address: 8 Soi Ngam Du Phli, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Yunomori
summary: Yunomori serves as a serene escape from the urban hustle, featuring a relaxing garden lounge and rooftop with tea and sky views. Indulge in deep sleep massages at this tranquil haven located on North Sathorn Road, Silom. Open daily from 10:00 AM to midnight, it's perfect for unwinding in a peaceful atmosphere.

Enjoy thoughtfully named single-origin blends and Japanese-inspired desserts like tiramisu and matcha pudding, alongside Neapolitan-style pizzas for lunch. A perfect spot for those seeking quality brews in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Antito
summary: Michelin-starred chef Amerigo Sesti brings a playful twist to authentic Italian cuisine at Antito. The vibrant decor and semi-open kitchen create an inviting atmosphere, perfect for enjoying dishes like prawn carpaccio and pizza fritta. Signature cocktails add to the experience, ensuring a memorable dining adventure without breaking the bank.
address: 33 โรงแรมอีสติน แกรนด์ ชั้น14 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Haps
summary: Nestled in Sukhumvit 49, Haps is a delightful brunch spot that exudes warmth and style. With a focus on creating a pet-friendly atmosphere, the inviting design features wooden accents and artistic furnishings. Enjoy good coffee and a slice of happiness in this welcoming space dedicated to relaxation.
address: 46/9 Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

summary: Honobono Ramen serves up delicious craft ramen in Udom Suk, eliminating the need to trek to Thonglor for a satisfying bowl. The shoyu ramen, featuring chicken broth and seafood, is complemented by tender sous vide chicken and marinated eggs. For those seeking a unique taste, the shio ramen offers an aromatic experience straight from the sea.

summary: Citizen Tea Canteen of Nowhere offers a unique tea experience in Bangkok's Talad Noi neighborhood, featuring locally sourced brews from various Thai provinces. With its artsy decor and meticulous brewing methods, this cozy spot empowers underdog culture while showcasing local handicrafts. Monthly specials keep the offerings fresh, inviting tea enthusiasts to return for new flavors.

name: Pulse Phra Arthit NEW

Indulge in delightful baked goods like lemon cake and matcha strawberry soft cookies, perfect for a quick snack. name: Gowin Dimsum
summary: Gowin Dimsum offers a fresh take on classic dim sum dishes, perfect for food enthusiasts craving new flavors. Located in the heart of Bangkok, this spot is part of a vibrant wave of recent culinary openings. Expect a cozy atmosphere that invites both solo diners and groups to indulge in delicious bites.

name: Charcoal Tandoor Grill & Mixology
summary: Charcoal Tandoor Grill & Mixology offers a modern take on traditional tandoor dishes paired with inventive cocktails. The moody lighting sets the stage for both intimate date nights and business dinners, ensuring an enjoyable atmosphere. Each cut is expertly prepared, complemented by attentive service that guides you through the menu's bold flavors.

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Discover new culinary gems like The Shoyu Stand and Kiri Tsukemen, offering unique dishes that delight the palate. Tsu Na Gu adds to the excitement with its innovative menu options. Explore these fresh additions for a taste of Bangkok's vibrant dining scene.

name: Caffè Olives

Enjoy dishes like Italian egg shakshuka and focaccia eggs Benedict, perfect for breakfast or lunch. Pair your meal with specialty coffee and indulge in brioche gelato for a sweet finish.

name: Jok Prince
summary: Jok Prince serves silky congee infused with wok breath in a cozy shophouse that attracts long lines nightly. A must-stop for any Bangkok food crawl, this spot epitomizes the city's vibrant flavors and warm hospitality. Experience authentic local cuisine that resonates with both flavor and culture.

Reservations are essential due to the limited seating and high demand.

name: Baan Puengchom

The inviting atmosphere blends modern design with classic elements, ideal for casual meals or special occasions. name: Oh Juice
summary: Oh Juice offers a vibrant escape in Bangkok with its colorful smoothies made from fresh fruits and veggies. Customers can choose from seven signature blends or create their own concoction in just eight steps. This lively cafe is perfect for a refreshing break from the city's heat.
address: ชั้น 2 ห้องเลขที่ 2,4 5 Thanon Ratchadamri, เเขวงปทุมวัน Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

summary: Nestled in a lush garden, Tamjai Cafe offers a serene escape with unique Kusmi teas crafted by an expert tea master. name: Saneh Jaan

name: Lumpinee Boxing Stadium
summary: Experience the thrill of elite Muay Thai at Lumpinee Boxing Stadium, a premier venue in northern Bangkok. Weekly fight nights feature modern staging and a range of seating options from general admission to VIP ringside. Special events and international bouts add excitement to the schedule, making it a must-visit for sports enthusiasts.

name: Signature Bangkok
summary: Signature Bangkok offers a unique French tasting menu that emphasizes seasonal ingredients and thoughtful pairings. The attentive service fosters an unhurried atmosphere, allowing for engaging conversations about the dishes. Immerse yourself in a calm setting where every detail enhances your dining experience.

name: Sushi Hiro
summary: Sushi Hiro in Ratchayothin excels in precision and hospitality, ensuring each bite is a harmonious blend of temperature, texture, and seasoning. name: D.K. Bakery
summary: D.K. Bakery offers a delightful escape in Bangkok with its array of freshly baked pastries and desserts. name: Baan Khanitha

The diverse menu features classic dishes made from fresh, high-quality ingredients, complemented by fine wines and cocktails. Perfect for friends and family, this restaurant captures the essence of Thailand in a sophisticated setting.
address: 14 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Vela
summary: Vela offers a vibrant dining experience in Bangkok, blending innovative local and international cuisine. name: Homu
summary: Homu offers a delightful fusion of traditional and contemporary Thai cuisine in a cozy yet modern setting. The menu features fresh, locally-sourced ingredients that elevate the dining experience, complemented by attentive service and a curated drink selection. Perfect for both casual meals and special occasions, this restaurant is a must-visit for food enthusiasts in Bangkok.

The carefully curated drinks and snacks complement the eclectic decor that blends modern aesthetics with traditional Thai elements. address: 11 Soi Si Lom 2/1, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Conkey's Bakery
summary: Conkey's Bakery brings a taste of San Francisco to Bangkok with its delightful sourdough and hearty meat pies. Sweet treats like almond chocolate twists and raspberry croissants add to the charm, making it a cozy spot in Ekkamai. Perfect for a casual brunch or coffee break, this bakery is a must-visit for locals and travelers alike.
address: 27/1 Soi Sukhumvit 33, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Sorellina
summary: Sorellina offers a fresh take on outdoor pizza dining, blending culinary expertise with innovative flavors. Signature dishes like the Soppressata pizza and burrata salad showcase unexpected combinations that elevate traditional ingredients. With a focus on quality and simplicity, this spot is set to impress pizza lovers in Sukhumvit.
address: 2, 7 Soi Sukhumvit 34, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Appia
summary: Experience authentic Roman cuisine at Appia, where hearty pastas and roasted meats are crafted with care by Chef Paolo Vitaletti. The lively open kitchen and rustic-modern décor create a welcoming atmosphere for both casual dinners and special occasions. Don't miss the signature carbonara, perfectly made with crispy guanciale and organic eggs.
address: 20/4 ซ. สุขุมวิท 31 Klongton Nua Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rush Bar
summary: Located in the heart of Silom, Rush Bar pulses with energy, offering a lively atmosphere perfect for nightlife enthusiasts. Special nights featuring male performances elevate the experience, drawing both locals and visitors to its vibrant scene. Transition seamlessly between multiple levels and enjoy a curated party experience until the early hours.
address: 60 23-24 Si Lom Rd, Khwaeng Suriya Wong, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Sereechai Puttes/Time Out Bangkok
summary: Dai Lou offers a modern twist on Cantonese dining in Ari, Bangkok, combining stylish decor with a menu inspired by Hong Kong. Signature dishes like crispy pork belly and sesame-coated seared tuna provide a unique culinary experience. The lively atmosphere, complete with charming dog-themed touches, makes it perfect for family gatherings.
address: 30/2 Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Gaston
summary: Gaston transforms the traditional hotel dining experience into a lively French bistro nestled in Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok. With a casual ambiance and chef David Senia's engaging presence, the menu highlights comforting classics like steak frites and duck foie gras. This revamped space offers a refreshing alternative to Bangkok's fine dining scene, focusing on approachable French cuisine.
address: Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok — LL Floor 494 Rajdamri Road Khwaeng Lumphini, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Hair of the Dog
summary: Located in a small soi near Phrom Phong, Hair of the Dog is a craft beer bar that combines dark humor with a unique aesthetic reminiscent of a medical asylum. With 13 rotating taps and an extensive bottle selection on the first floor, it caters to both casual drinkers and hardcore enthusiasts. The upstairs area, known as The Clinic, features a gin and tonic bar, making it a lively spot for beer lovers from 11am to midnight daily.

name: Mok Cafe
summary: Nestled on Prasert-Manukitch Rd, Mok Cafe offers a tranquil garden pond setting perfect for relaxation. Indulge in Thai favorites like red braised chicken noodles and refreshing iced orange espresso. Open daily from 9 am to 8 pm, it’s an ideal spot for friends or remote work.
address: Thanon Prasert-Manukitch, Khwaeng Ram Inthra, Khet Khan Na Yao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Thaan Charcoal Cooking
summary: Thaan Charcoal Cooking, situated in Sukhumvit Soi 31, offers a relaxed dining atmosphere with a focus on high-quality charcoal-grilled steaks. The menu features Australian beef and local himawari-gyu, along with unique dishes like grilled beef brisket and fusion seafood options. Ideal for casual meals or gatherings, this steakhouse combines flavor and ambiance effortlessly.
address: 68/6 Sukhumvit 31 Yaek 4, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mensho Tokyo
summary: Mensho Tokyo brings the authentic taste of Japan to Bangkok with its farm-to-bowl ramen concept. Fresh, handmade noodles are paired with sous vide or fire-roasted meats and a rich milky broth, creating a cozy dining experience. Perfect for friends looking to enjoy quality Japanese cuisine in the heart of Watthana.
address: 571 อาร์เอสยู ทาวเวอร์ (RSU Tower) ห้อง G-03 ชั้น G Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Yellow Lane Cafe
summary: Nestled in a house on Soi Ari 1, Yellow Lane Cafe offers a serene outdoor space perfect for enjoying coffee amidst greenery. A menu featuring brunch plates, poke bowls, and sandwiches complements the cozy atmosphere. Ideal for casual meet-ups or solo relaxation, this cafe invites you to unwind with every sip.
address: 2, 92 Soi Phahon Yothin 5, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Good Chā (Thonglor 13 – compact bar)
summary: Good Chā offers a grab-and-go experience while maintaining a focus on high-quality matcha. The compact bar features an efficient design with a clear menu and seasonal specials that keep customers intrigued. Perfectly positioned in Thonglor, it serves as an ideal pit stop for café crawls.
address: 263 Soi Thong Lo 13, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Siam Amazing Park – Water World
summary: Siam Amazing Park is Bangkok's largest water and amusement park, featuring the Guinness-record wave pool and various family-friendly zones. Thrill-seekers will enjoy the exhilarating slides while families can relax in shaded seating areas. With day passes covering multiple attractions, it's an ideal destination for full-day outings with loved ones.
address: 203 Thanon Suan Sayam, Khwaeng Khan Na Yao, Khet Khan Na Yao, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10230, Thailand

name: Tulum Sky Bar
summary: Tulum Sky Bar captures the essence of Tulum with its jungle rooftop setting on the 29th floor of Movenpick Ekkamai. Experience vibrant entertainment including DJs and performances, while sipping on tequila-based cocktails inspired by the Mexican Caribbean. The lush decor features Mayan sculptures and Aztec patterns, creating an enchanting atmosphere for a night out in Bangkok.

name: Fake Club Bangkok
summary: Fake Club Bangkok offers a vibrant nightlife experience with its spacious layout, impressive lighting, and sound systems. Live bands perform popular Thai and international hits, followed by dynamic DJ sets that keep the energy high into the early hours. Trendjacking nights featuring male models in themed costumes add a unique twist to the club's appeal.
address: 60/1 Soi, 4 ถ. รัชดาภิเษก แขวงห้วยขวาง เขตห้วยขวาง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10310, Thailand

name: Roberta's
summary: Roberta's delivers a vibrant culinary experience with its New Orleans fare and unique ramen specialties. Homemade pizzas add to the charm, making it a must-visit for food lovers. Discover your next favorite dish in this exciting new restaurant scene.
address: Unit 301, Siam Discovery, 989 Rama I Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Canton Disco
summary: Canton Disco reimagines Cantonese cuisine with a trendy flair, featuring vibrant decor and a lively atmosphere. Delight in small bites like siu long bao and spicy wasabi prawns, or savor main dishes such as black pepper Wagyu beef. Unique cocktails and mocktails complement the authentic flavors, making this spot a must-visit for food lovers in Bangkok.
address: P23 Building, 11/2 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Susan Croissant
summary: A visit to Susan Croissant reveals a delightful café atmosphere perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack. Freshly baked croissants and pastries, with flavors ranging from classic butter to inventive fillings, await guests in a cozy setting. Friendly service enhances the experience, making it a favorite among both locals and tourists in Bangkok's Sukhumvit area.
address: 359-359/1 Thanon Ekkamai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Yogatique Bangkok – Sukhumvit 23
summary: Yogatique Bangkok offers a welcoming space for yoga enthusiasts on Sukhumvit 23, featuring classes in vinyasa flow and gentle formats. The studio serves a diverse community with English-friendly sessions and workshops suitable for all levels. Easily accessible from BTS Asok and MRT Sukhumvit, it’s a neighborhood gem that remains active into 2025.
address: 116/8 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Mil Toast House
summary: Mil Toast House transports Bangkok diners to Seoul with its charming bakery atmosphere and delectable offerings. Signature items include the souffle French toast and Bangkok-exclusive steamed Nutella brioche, alongside savory delights like ham and corn-stuffed buns. Family-friendly milk drinks in flavors such as Hershey Nutella add a sweet touch to this cozy spot.
address: G floor Building B, EmQuartier, 693 ถ. สุขุมวิท แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Haroy
summary: Haroy offers a taste of southern Thailand with its iconic Hat Yai fried chicken, available in both wraps and larger sets. Nestled in a vibrant foodie area, this lively restaurant is perfect for quick bites or casual gatherings with friends. Open daily from 11 am to 11 pm, it's a must-visit for chicken lovers seeking authentic flavors.
address: 42, 44 ซอย จุฬาฯ 14 Khwaeng Wang Mai, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Grain
summary: Grain in Bangkok serves vibrant meals with a focus on health, featuring their signature Grain Bowl with blackened chicken and organic quinoa. The inviting atmosphere complements dishes like the spicy tuna pesto sandwich and authentic acai bowls. Ideal for those seeking nutritious options, this restaurant is a delightful find in Sukhumvit.
address: 66/4 ชั้น G โครงการ Mile Malle Soi Sukhumvit 20, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Kizuna
summary: Kizuna offers an authentic taste of Edo-style hand-rolled sushi, featuring premium seafood and wagyu beef from Japan. Signature dishes like lobster ikura and crispy unagi showcase a delightful fusion that appeals to both traditionalists and adventurous eaters. Located in Ekkamai, this cozy restaurant is perfect for friends looking to enjoy a unique dining experience.
address: Soi Ekkamai 19, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Good Old Times
summary: Good Old Times offers a unique nightlife experience that evolves from a cozy speakeasy to an energetic nightclub featuring 80s and 90s hits. Signature cocktails like the Bee’s Knees and Low ABV Espresso Martini showcase creative twists on classic flavors. An ideal spot for those looking to enjoy a nostalgic night out with friends.
address: 97 Soi Sukhumvit 24, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Nobu
summary: Perched on the 57th to 60th floors of Empire Tower, Nobu offers breathtaking skyline views alongside its renowned Japanese-Peruvian fusion cuisine. Signature dishes like black cod miso and yellowtail jalapeno create an upscale dining experience perfect for special occasions. Reservations are recommended to enjoy this sophisticated atmosphere designed by New York's Rockwell group.
address: 57-58 fl, The Empire, 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Kuma no Yakitori
summary: A hidden gem in Bangkok, Kuma no Yakitori offers an exclusive omakase experience featuring a 13-course meal centered on grilled chicken skewers. With cozy seating for just twelve at the counter and a private room for seven, it creates an intimate atmosphere perfect for friends. Access requires a secret password, adding to its allure and uniqueness.
address: 1F, Rain Hill, 777 ซอย สุขุมวิท 47 แขวงคลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Le Du Kaan
summary: Perched on the 56th floor of The Empire, Le Du Kaan offers a unique dining experience with its Michelin-starred chef and stunning city views. The menu showcases bold Thai flavors through innovative dishes crafted from locally sourced ingredients. A modern design infused with traditional elements creates a captivating atmosphere for an unforgettable meal.
address: 56th Floor The Empire, 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Kopi Hub Prime Ari
summary: Kopi Hub Prime Ari elevates dimsum with unique ingredients like ikura and truffles, enhancing traditional flavors. Enjoy their famous patongko, deep fried for extra crunch, alongside a variety of flavorful fried tarot options. The Bak Kuh Teh offers a hearty experience that redefines comfort food in a modern setting.
address: 31, 1 Soi Ari 2, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Simple Natural Kitchen
summary: A cozy retreat in Bangkok, Simple Natural Kitchen serves wholesome international dishes that delight the senses. The inviting ambiance resembles a personal residence, perfect for enjoying superfood smoothie bowls and unique offerings like kra prao quinoa. With private parking and homemade baked goods, this spot is ideal for those seeking quality and comfort.
address: 31 Soi Sawatdi, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Somewhere Bookshop
summary: Step into a flower-adorned haven at Somewhere Bookshop, where self-published titles invite mindful escapism. This cozy space offers not just books but also a chance to enjoy a drink and soak in the ambiance. Perfect for book lovers looking for a tranquil retreat in Bangkok Yai.
address: 158 7 Phet Kasem Rd, Khwaeng Wat Tha Phra, Khet Bangkok Yai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10600, Thailand

name: Dukedon
summary: Dukedon elevates pla duk into a gourmet experience in the unassuming Soi Inthamara 31. The chefs employ Japanese techniques to enhance the fish's umami, offering dishes like grilled catfish with kabayaki glaze and torch-seared climbing perch. Reservations are highly recommended due to their meticulous sourcing and preparation process.
address: 31 Soi Inthamara 23, Khwaeng Samsen Nai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Burger X
summary: Burger X has made a tasty debut at La Villa in Ari, known for its big, juicy burgers. Signature offerings include the BLT Burger and a crispy onion variant, with health-conscious options like the Naked X Burger. A buy-one-get-one-free promotion is available until August 31 from 11:00 to 20:00, making it a great spot for friends and family alike.
address: 662 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Virgin Active – Siam Discovery
summary: Located within Siam Discovery, Virgin Active is a premier health club featuring a lap pool, vitality pools, and extensive fitness classes. Professionals and shoppers alike can enjoy a variety of workouts, from yoga to cycle classes, complemented by towel service and an on-site cafe. Membership also offers access to other Virgin Active locations across Bangkok.
address: 5th Floor Siam Discovery Center 194 Phaya Thai Rd, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Sokozy NEW
summary: Nestled near BTS Asoke, Sokozy NEW is a cozy Thai vintage house perfect for starting your day. Enjoy vibrant bowls like the Asok Acai or Pacific Bowl, paired with fresh coffee or buttery croissants. The inviting wooden decor adds to the charm, making it an ideal spot for a relaxed morning meal.
address: 3, 7 Soi Sukhumvit 18, Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: House of Heals
summary: Perched on the 33rd floor of the Renaissance Hotel, House of Heals dazzles with its creative cocktails and vibrant drag performances. This lively bar is a prime spot for LGBTQ gatherings, inviting guests to dress up and soak in its glamorous atmosphere. A visit here promises an unforgettable night filled with entertainment from talented DJs and artists.
address: ชั้น 33 โรงแรมเรเนซองส์ 518/8 Thanon Phloen Chit, ปทุมวัน Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Tanisorn Vongsoontorn/Time Out Bangkok
summary: FICS Film Inspired Coffee Shop in Phrom Phong offers a unique blend of cinema and café culture across three floors. Enjoy creatively crafted drinks named after iconic films while surrounded by rare movie posters and film-themed decor. A must-visit for film enthusiasts seeking a cozy yet vibrant atmosphere.
address: 2/6 Soi Sukhumvit 41, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: El Willy Spanish Kitchen
summary: El Willy Spanish Kitchen introduces a vibrant dining experience to Bangkok, showcasing the charismatic flair of chef Guillermo Trullas Moreno. The cozy atmosphere features an open kitchen and colorful decor, perfect for enjoying family-style tapas like seafood paella and Basque cheesecake. A wine pairing option enhances the meal, making it an exciting culinary destination on Sukhumvit Soi 51.
address: 42, 5 Thanon Ekkamai, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Homeland
summary: Homeland offers a unique dining experience that celebrates local Thai ingredients and the stories behind them. The inviting atmosphere feels like a chic grandmother's kitchen, making it perfect for cozy meals. Signature dishes such as the Thai pumpkin soup and Sansai Pasta highlight seasonal produce while prioritizing sustainability.
address: 1st floor, Citi Resort Sukhumvit 39, NEW WING 99/9, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Baan Puengchom
summary: Baan Puengchom, a hidden gem in Ari, delights with its authentic Thai flavors and cozy atmosphere. The pad sam men salad stands out for its unique blend of aromatic vegetables, making it a must-try. Long favored by locals, this restaurant offers a genuine taste of Thailand away from the tourist crowds.
address: 38 Soi Phahon Yothin 7, แขวง พญาไท Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Fran's
summary: Fran's offers a cozy brunch experience in a stunning glasshouse setting, drawing both foodies and locals. Despite some inconsistencies in the menu, particularly with dishes like eggs benedict, its charm keeps visitors coming back. A long reservation wait speaks to its popularity as a must-visit spot in Bangkok.
address: 58 Soi Ngam Du Phli, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Tokki
summary: Tokki offers a unique blend of Korean dining that sits between casual and fine dining. The menu features playful dishes like Corn Kimchi Jeon and Bulgogi Fries, complemented by traditional liquor pairings such as honey coconut makgeolli. With a minimalist decor full of indoor plants, it's an inviting space for lovers of Korean cuisine.
address: 4th Floor, Donki mall, Soi Sukhumvit 63, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Allso Bar
summary: Affordable craft cocktails await at Allso Bar, a hidden gem in the Thonglor area. With a focus on mixology takeovers and unique theme nights, this shophouse bar aims to make quality drinks accessible to all. Signature offerings like the Thaipirina showcase creativity without breaking the bank.
address: 46/12, Sukhumwit 36, 8 Soi Sansabai, แขวงพระโขนง เขตคลองเตย กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Senryoku
summary: Rich, simmered Japanese curry awaits at Senryoku, where a variety of toppings like Wagyu beef and fried shrimp elevate the experience. Located in Phaya Thai, this cozy restaurant is perfect for those seeking hearty comfort food. Open daily from 11 AM to 9 PM, it's an ideal spot for lunch or dinner.
address: 71, 10 Soi Phahon Yothin 7, Khwaeng Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: Mivana Organic Forest Coffee
summary: Mivana Organic Forest Coffee offers a serene escape within Bangkok's lush greenery, perfect for nature lovers and coffee enthusiasts alike. Sip on their delightful Thai-style iced coffee while surrounded by towering trees and vines, creating a picturesque setting ideal for photography. Open daily from 7:30 am to 6:30 pm, this chill cafe invites guests to disconnect and unwind in a tranquil atmosphere.
address: เลขที่ 1 พรีเมียร์คอร์เปอเรทปาร์ค Soi Premier 2, Khwaeng Nong Bon, Khet Prawet, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10250, Thailand

name: Tribe Sky Beach Club
summary: A stylish tropical oasis, Tribe Sky Beach Club offers a unique sky beach experience in Bangkok. Guests can lounge by the expansive pool or dance to vibrant music as the sun sets, creating an electrifying atmosphere. Enjoy Neapolitan pizza and fruity cocktails while soaking in stunning skyline views.

name: Wagyuism
summary: Wagyuism offers a premium dining experience in Soi Ari, specializing in high-grade A4 and A5 wagyu beef from Kobe and Hokkaido. The Japanese chef curates dishes like wagyu soba and smoked steak amidst loft-style interiors that feature wood furnishings and art. A private party space enhances its appeal for gatherings, though parking isn't available.
address: 110 9 Thanon Rama VI, Phaya Thai, Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand

name: De Nada
summary: Nestled in a refurbished Thai bungalow off Sukhumvit Soi 56, De Nada offers a tranquil escape with a distinctly French ambiance. Indulge in a variety of pastries, including Nutella-drenched croissants and savory options filled with ham and cheese. This pet-friendly café provides the perfect setting for remote work or leisurely mornings away from the hustle.
address: 3/93 บ้านสวนริมคลอง กรุงเทพกรีฑา 9, Hua Mak Rd, แขวงหัวหมาก บางกะปิ กรุงเทพมหานคร 10240, Thailand

name: Veggiology
summary: Veggiology redefines clean eating with its mid-century charm and a focus on artisanal, nutrient-dense juices sourced from local farmers. The cafe promotes a slow, conscious lifestyle, offering unique experiences like a juice flight featuring ten organic shots. Expect a warm atmosphere where nourishment extends beyond just food.
address: 8 Soi Sukhumvit 41, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Fitness First – Platinum Q House Lumpini
summary: Fitness First – Platinum Q House Lumpini offers a premium fitness experience with extensive strength and cardio zones. The club features signature group classes, including Les Mills and cycling sessions, all accessible 24/7 for maximum convenience. Located near Lumpini Park, it’s an ideal choice for those seeking a top-notch workout facility in the heart of Bangkok.
address: 3rd Fl, Life Center, 1 S Sathon Rd, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Et 1.5
summary: Et 1.5 offers a unique all-day brunch experience with a commitment to sustainability, sourcing produce from their own farm and local suppliers. Enjoy dishes like organic Turkish Eggs, featuring poached eggs and homemade yogurt, crafted from fresh ingredients. This eatery not only satisfies cravings but also promotes eco-friendly practices.
address: 53, ET1.5 50 Lat Phrao Rd, Khwaeng Chom Phon, จตุจักร Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10900, Thailand

name: Fran’s
summary: Fran's offers a delightful brunch experience with its unique twists on classic dishes like velvet egg and bacon. The bistro-like atmosphere caters to both sweet and savory cravings, making it a perfect spot for friends to gather. High-quality food and service keep the queues long at this popular Sathon location.
address: 58 Soi Ngam Du Phli, Khwaeng Thung Maha Mek, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand

name: Anotai
summary: Anotai offers a refined atmosphere for vegetarians, featuring expertly crafted dishes from fresh produce sourced directly from the chef's farm. The menu highlights Thai flavors with options like tamarind chili fried rice paired with salted egg, showcasing creativity in vegetarian cuisine. Open daily from 10 AM to 9 PM, this spot promises a delightful culinary experience.
address: 976/17 Rama IX Rd, Khwaeng Bang Kapi, Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10310, Thailand

name: Susan Croissant
summary: An artful bakery in Sukhumvit, Susan Croissant serves fresh croissants with playful twists like Thai tea custard and pandan custard. Cozy indoor seating invites guests to enjoy unique treats such as the six-eye spectre cookie. Perfect for a casual bite or coffee break, this spot blends creativity with comfort.
address: 5/9 Soi Phromsri, ซ. สุขุมวิท 39 Klongton-nua, เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110, Thailand

name: Butterbear
summary: Butterbear Café has evolved from a dessert shop into a cultural phenomenon, captivating fans with its charming mascot. Located in Emsphere, this spot not only offers delightful treats but also hosts meet-and-greet events with Butterbear on weekends. The café's popularity is fueled by its vibrant social media presence and connections to the T-pop scene.

name: aftersun Listening Bar
summary: Located in Bang Bon, aftersun Listening Bar offers a vintage ambiance with its 1970s décor and a serene atmosphere perfect for unwinding. Patrons can enjoy mellow soul, soft rock, jazz, and city pop while sipping simple yet refreshing drinks, ideal for extended conversations. A corner dedicated to collectible vinyl highlights the bar's commitment to music enthusiasts.
address: 80,82 ซ.กาญจนาภิเษก 6, แขวงคลองบางพราน เขตบางบอน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10150, Thailand

name: Juksunchae
summary: Juksunchae introduces a fresh take on Korean haute cuisine in Ruamrudee, blending traditional dishes with modern techniques. The restaurant features an 11-course experience that includes unique offerings like lobster jook and bibimbap with sea urchin custard. With its striking brutalist design and a selection of soju starting at B70, dining here is both a culinary and aesthetic delight.
address: PHMG+4PR Town Hall, Sukhumvit 49, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Veganerie
summary: Veganerie transforms the vegan bakery experience into a full-fledged restaurant, offering modern-rustic decor and a diverse plant-based menu. Indulge in creative dishes like mushroom 'pulled pork' burgers and decadent desserts such as cashew cheesecakes. This beloved spot promises a delightful culinary journey for vegans and non-vegans alike.
address: 35 2 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan, Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Son of Saigon
summary: Son of Saigon celebrates Vietnamese heritage through vibrant murals and a menu inspired by family recipes. Signature dishes like bánh mì and bún thịt nướng showcase fresh ingredients and traditional flavors, while drinks feature unique options like coconut freeze cold brew. This cafe offers a cozy atmosphere perfect for enjoying authentic Vietnamese coffee and cuisine.
address: 87, Velaa Building @ Sindhorn Village Room, B111 ถ. หลังสวน แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพมหานคร 10330, Thailand

name: Rad Meats
summary: Rad Meats specializes in high-quality, additive-free sausages and cured meats crafted by chef Radek Zarebinski. Charcuterie platters offer a delightful selection perfect for home gatherings, featuring unique items like smoked duck prosciutto and locally sourced cheeses. Enjoy same-day delivery from Monday to Saturday, making it easy to elevate your dining experience.
address: 591 16 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Khlong Tan Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Roots at Sathon
summary: Roots at Sathon offers a calm retreat for coffee enthusiasts, featuring expertly brewed espresso and seasonal filters. The clean, wooden interiors create a warm atmosphere perfect for short meet-ups or solo work sessions. With friendly baristas ready to assist and a selection of pastries and ice-cream sandwiches, this cafe is a reliable choice in the neighborhood.
address: 33,31 Bhiraj Tower at Sathon, Unit No. A.1.2 1st Floor, South, 12 ถ. สาทรใต้ แขวงยานนาวา เขตสาทร กรุงเทพมหานคร 10120, Thailand

name: Rarinjinda
summary: Rarinjinda offers a luxurious spa experience with three distinct massage options, each designed to rejuvenate the body and mind. The standout RarinJinda royal touch combines multiple relaxing treatments for a comprehensive pampering session. name: La Cabra
summary: La Cabra offers a vibrant dining experience in Bangkok, blending local and international flavors in a stylish setting. name: Harvest
summary: Harvest stands out in Bangkok for its commitment to fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and a seasonal menu that reinterprets Thai cuisine. name: Mezze Lebanese Eatery
summary: Authentic Lebanese flavors come alive at Mezze Lebanese Eatery, where traditional dishes like mezze platters and grilled meats take center stage. name: Simple Natural Kitchen
summary: Simple Natural Kitchen offers a wholesome dining experience with a menu focused on fresh, healthy ingredients. Emphasizing sustainability and organic produce, this restaurant stands out in Bangkok's culinary scene.

Combine fun with shopping at this affordable entertainment destination, especially lively on weekends and holidays.

name: Li-bra-ry Cafe Sukhumvit 24
summary: Li-bra-ry Cafe Sukhumvit 24 offers a cozy library-themed atmosphere perfect for casual meetings or quiet reading. summary: Messenger Service captivates with its innovative cocktail narratives, each drink crafted to evoke a unique experience. The dimly lit space fosters connection, allowing conversations to flow effortlessly amid contemporary tunes. Ideal for those seeking an adventurous yet distinctly Bangkok bar scene.
address: 306 Thanon Santiphap, Khwaeng Pom Prap, Khet Pom Prap Sattru Phai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10100, Thailand

name: The Local by Oamthong Thai Cuisine
summary: Experience the rich tapestry of Thai flavors at The Local, where family recipes are brought to life in a warm, teak-house setting. Each dish is crafted with care, balancing herbs and citrus for a delightful taste that encourages sharing among friends and family. The attentive staff ensures newcomers feel at home as they navigate the vibrant menu filled with grilled delights and comforting curries.
address: 32 32/1 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Somtam Nua
summary: Somtam Nua at CentralWorld showcases vibrant regional Thai cuisine that balances herbs and lime with a manageable heat. Dishes are designed for sharing, encouraging a communal experience where each bite bursts with flavor. Friendly service enhances the experience, guiding newcomers while maintaining the restaurant's culinary edge.
address: Level 3 4, 4 Thanon Ratchadamri, Khwaeng Pathum Wan, Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10330, Thailand

name: Thien Duong
summary: Thien Duong is a MICHELIN Guide restaurant specializing in authentic Vietnamese cuisine. Fresh herbs and generous portions create a satisfying dining experience, perfect for families. With attentive service and vegetarian options, it's a must-visit for those seeking flavorful dishes in Bangkok.
address: 116-3 Thanon Sala Daeng, Si Lom, Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10500, Thailand

name: Silver Sand Silom
summary: Located in Silom Soi 4, Silver Sand Silom radiates a vibrant party atmosphere with house and techno beats. The cocktail bar features a generous happy hour from 10pm to midnight and hosts exciting themed nights and drag shows. Experience an unforgettable night out in this lively tropical haven.
